summer stretching on the grass summer dresses pass in the shade of a willow tree creeps are crawling over me over me and over you stuck together with god's glue it is going to get stickier too it is been a long hot summer let us get undercover do not try too hard to think do not think at all i am not the only one starin' at the sun afraid of what you would find if you took a look inside not just deaf and dumb staring at the sun not the only one who is happy to go blind there is an insect in your ear if you scratch it will not disappear it is going to itch and burn and sting do you want to see what the scratching brings? waves that leave me out of reach breaking on your back like a beach will we ever live in peace? because those that can not do often have to and those that can not do often have to preach to the ones staring at the sun who'd rather go blind intransigence is all around military still in town armour plated suits and ties daddy just will not say goodbye referee will not blow the whistle god is good but will he listen? i am nearly great but there is something missing i left it in the duty free, ah but you never really belonged to me you are not the only one if you stepped back inside i am not sucking on my thumb i am staring at the sun

the more you see, the less you know the less you find out as you go i knew much more then than i do now neon-heart, day-glow eyes a city lit by fireflies they are advertising in the skies for people like us and i miss you when you are not around i am getting ready to leave the ground oh, you look so beautiful tonight in the city of blinding lights do not look before you laugh look ugly in a photograph flash bulbs, purple irises the camera can not see i have seen you walk unafraid i have seen you in the clothes you made can you see the beauty inside of me? what happened to the beauty i had inside of me? time, time, time, time, time will not leave me as i am but time will not take the boy out of this man the more you know, the less you feel some pray for, others steal blessings are not just for the ones who kneel luckily

the sea wants to kiss the golden shore the sunlight warms your skin all the beauty that is been lost before wants to find us again i can not fight you anymore it is you i am fighting for the sea throws rock together but time leaves us polished stones we can not fall any further if we can not feel ordinary love and we cannot reach any higher if we can not deal with ordinary love birds fly high in the summer sky and rest on the breeze the same wind will take care of you and i we will build our house in the trees your heart is on my sleeve did you put there with a magic marker for years i would believe that the world could not wash it away because we can not fall any further are we tough enough for ordinary love tough enough for love

green light, seven eleven you stop in for a pack of cigarettes you do not smoke, do not even want to hey now, check your change dressed up like a car crash your wheels are turnin' but you are upside down you say when he hits you, you do not mind because when he hurts you, you feel alive oh dear, is that what it is? red lights, grey morning you stumble out of a hole in the ground a vampire or a victim it depends on who is around you used to stay in to watch the adverts you could lip synch to the talk shows and if you look, you look through me and when you talk, you talk at me and when i touch you, you do not feel a thing if i could stay, then the night would give you up stay, and the day would keep its trust stay, and the night would be enough faraway, so close up with the static and the radio with satellite television you can go anywhere miami, new orleans london, belfast and berlin and, if you listen, i can not call and, if you jump, you just might fall and, if you shout, i will only hear you stay, then the day would keep its trust stay with the demons you drowned stay with the spirit i found oh-oh-oh, ooh three of the clock in the morning it is quiet, there is no one around just the bang and the clatter as an angel runs to ground as an angel hits the ground

the heart is a bloom shoots up through the stony ground there is no room no space to rent in this town you are out of luck and the reason that you had to care the traffic is stuck and you are not moving anywhere you thought you would found a friend to take you out of this place someone you could lend a hand in return for grace it is a beautiful day sky falls, you feel like do not let it get away you are on the road but you have got no destination you are in the mud in the maze of her imagination you love this town even if that does not ring true you have been all over and it is been all over you it is a beautiful day (oooh, ooh) touch me take me to that other place teach me love i know i am not a hopeless case see the world in green and blue see china right in front of you see the canyons broken by cloud see the tuna fleets clearing the sea out see the bedouin fires at night see the oil fields at first light and see the bird with a leaf in her mouth after the flood all the colors came out day, day it was a beautiful day beautiful day reach me what you do not have, you do not need it now what you do not know, you can feel it somehow do not need it now was a beautiful day

yeah, yeah high, higher than the sun you shoot me from a gun i need you to elevate me here at the corner of your lips as the orbit of your hips, eclipse you elevate my soul i have got no self-control been living like a mole now going down, excavation i and i in the sky you make me feel like i can fly so high, elevation a star, lit up like a cigar strung out like a guitar maybe you can educate my mind explain all these controls can not sing but i have got soul the goal is elevation a mole, digging in a hole digging up my soul now love lift me up out of these blues will not you tell me something true? i believe in you elevation

if you twist and turn-away if you tear yourself in two again if i could, yes i would if i could, i would let it go surrender, dislocate if i could throw this lifeless life-line to the wind leave this heart of clay, see you walk, walk-away into the night, and through the rain into the half light and through the flame if i could, through myself, set your spirit free i would lead your heart away, see you break, break-away into the light and to the day ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh to let it go and so to fade-away to let it go and so fade-away i am wide-awake i am wide-awake, wide-awake i am not sleeping, oh no, no, no if you should ask, then maybe they would tell you what i would say true colours fly in blue and black bruised silken sky and burning flak colours crash, collide in blood-shot eyes if i could, you know i would this desperation, dislocation separation, condemnation revelation, in temptation isolation, desolation let it go and so to fade-away i am wide-awake, i am wide-awake, wide-awake i am not sleeping oh no, no, no

i was chasing down the days of fear chasing down a dream before it disappeared i was aching to be somewhere near your voice was all i heard i was shaking from a storm in me haunted by the spectres that we had to see yeah, i wanted to be the melody above the noise, above the hurt i was young, not dumb just wishing to be blinded by you, brand new and we were pilgrims on our way i woke up at the moment when the miracle occurred heard a song that made some sense out of the world everything i ever lost, now has been returned the most beautiful sound i would ever heard we got language so we can not communicate religion so i can love and hate music so i can exaggerate my pain and give it a name we can hear you (hear you) we can hear you i get so many things i do not deserve all the stolen voices will someday be returned your voices will be heard

all is quiet on new year's day a world in white gets underway i want to be with you, be with you, night and day nothing changes on new year's day, on new year's day i will be with you again under a blood red sky a crowd has gathered in black and white arms entwined, the chosen few the newspaper says, says, say it is true, it is true and we can break through though torn in two, we can be one i, i will begin again

song: I Still Haven t Found What I m Looking For
lyrics: i have climbed highest mountains i have run through the fields only to be with you i have run i have crawled i have scaled these city walls these city walls but i still have not found what i am looking for i have kissed honey lips felt the healing in her fingertips it burned like fire this burning desire i have spoke with the tongue of angels i have held the hand of a devil it was warm in the night i was cold as a stone i believe in the kingdom come then all the colors will bleed into one bleed into one but yes i am still running you broke the bonds and you loosed the chains carried the cross of my shame oh my shame you know i believe it

song: Who s Gonna Ride Your Wild Horses
lyrics: you are dangerous, 'cos you are honest. you are dangerous, you do not know what you want. well you left my heart empty as a vacant lot for any spirit to haunt. you are an accident waiting to happen you are a piece of glass left there on a beach. well you tell me things i know you are not supposed to then you leave me just out of reach. who is going to ride your wild horses? who is going to drown in your blue sea? who is going to fall at the foot of thee? well you stole it 'cos i needed the cash and you killed it 'cos i wanted revenge. well you lied to me 'cos i asked you to. baby, can we still be friends? ah, the deeper i spin ah, the hunter will sin for your ivory skin. took a drive in the dirty rain to a place where the wind calls your name under the trees, the river laughing at you and me. hallelujah! heaven's white rose the doors you open i just can not close. do not turn around, do not turn around again. do not turn around your gypsy heart. do not turn around, and do not look back. come on now love, do not you look back. who is going to taste your saltwater kisses? who is going to take the place of me? who is going to tame the heart of thee?

you got a face not spoiled by beauty i have some scars from where i have been you have got eyes that can see right through me you are not afraid of anything they have seen i was told that i would feel nothing the first time i do not know how these cuts heal but in you i found a rhyme if there is a light you can not always see and there is a world we can not always be if there is a dark now we should not doubt and there is a light do not let it go out and this is a song a song for someone this is a song you let me into a conversation a conversation only we could make you break and enter my imagination whatever's in there it is yours to take i was told i would feel nothing the first time you were slow to heal but this could be the night within and without this is a song for someone yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah and i am a long way from your hill of calvary from where i was, where i need to be if there is a kiss i stole from your mouth

song: Where the Streets Have No Name
lyrics: i want to run, i want to hide i want to tear down the walls that hold me inside i want to reach out and touch the flame where the streets have no name i want to feel sunlight on my face i see the dust-cloud disappear without a trace i want to take shelter from the poison rain we are still building and burning down love burning down love and when i go there i go there with you (it is all i can do) the city's a flood, and our love turns to rust we are beaten and blown by the wind trampled in dust i will show you a place high on a desert plain our love turns to rust we are beaten and blown by the wind, blown by the wind oh, and i see love see our love turn to rust and we are beaten and blown by the wind, blown by the wind oh when i go there

lyrics: tough you think you have got the stuff you are telling me and anyone you are hard enough you do not have to put up a fight you do not have to always be right let me take some of the punches for you tonight listen to me now i need to let you know you do not have to go it alone and it is you when i look in the mirror and it is you when i do not pick up the phone sometimes you can not make it on your own we fight all the time you and i, that is alright we are the same soul i do not need, i do not need to hear you say that if we were not so alike you would like me a whole lot more i know that we do not talk i am sick of it all can you hear me when i sing? you are the reason i sing you are the reason why the opera is in me hey now still got to let you know a house does not make a home do not leave me here alone and it is you that makes it hard to let go sometimes you can not make it best you can do, is to fake it

somebody stepped inside your soul little by little they robbed and stole till someone else was in control you think it is easier to put your finger on the trouble when the trouble is you and you think it is easier to know your own tricks well, it is the hardest thing you will ever do i have a will for survival so you can hurt me and then hurt me some more i can live with denial but you are not my troubles anymore to give up on the trouble if the trouble is destroying you but before you throw me a rope it was the one thing i could hold on to god knows it is not easy i am taking on the shape of someone else's pain god now you can see me i am naked and i am not afraid my body's sacred and i am not ashamed

song: Until the End of the World
lyrics: have not seen you in quite a while i was down the hold just passing time last time we met was a low-lit room we were as close together as a bride and groom we ate the food, we drank the wine everybody having a good time except you you were talking about the end of the world i took the money i spiked your drink you miss too much these days if you stop to think you lead me on with those innocent eyes you know i love the element of surprise in the garden, i was playing the tart i kissed your lips and broke your heart you, you were acting like it was the end of the world love, love, love love, love (love, love, love) in my dream i was drowning sorrows when my sorrows, they learned to swim surrounding me, going down on me spilling over the brim waves of regret and waves of joy i reached out for the one i tried to destroy you, you said you would wait till the end of the world

you say you want diamonds on a ring of gold your story to remain untold but all the promises we make from the cradle to the grave when all i want is you you say you will give me a highway with no-one on it treasure, just to look upon it all the riches in the night eyes in the moon of blindness a river in a time of dryness a harbour in the tempest your love to work out right to last with me through the night your love not to grow cold all the promises we break you all i want is you

lyrics: when you look so good, the pain in your face does not show when you look so good and baby, you do not even know when the world is ours but the world is not your kind of thing full of shooting stars, brighter as they are vanishing oh you have seen enough to know it is children who teach you are still free enough to wake up on a bed or a beach you are the best thing about me the best thing that ever happened a boy i am the kind of trouble that you enjoy the best things are easy to destroy the best thing about me i been crying out: how bad can a good time be? shooting off my mouth, that is another great thing about me i have everything but i feel like nothing at all there is no risky thing for a man who is determined to fall why am i why am i walking away? (walking away) why am i walking away? i can see it all so clearly i can see what you can not see i can see you love her loudly when she needs you quietly

it was a cold and wet december day when we touched the ground at jfk snow was melting on the ground on bls i heard the sound of an angel new york, like a christmas tree tonight this city belongs to me angel soul love, this love will not let me go so long, angel of harlem birdland on fifty-three the street sounds like a symphony we got john coltrane and a love supreme miles, and she is got to be an angel lady day got diamond eyes she sees the truth behind the lies angel of harlem she says it is heart, heart and soul yeah, yeah (yeah) yeah, yeah (right now) blue light on the avenue god knows they got to you an empty glass, the lady sings eyes swollen like a bee sting blinded you lost your way through the side streets and the alleyway like a star exploding in the night falling to the city in broad daylight an angel in devil's shoes salvation in the blues you never looked like an angel yeah, yeah, angel of harlem angel, angel of harlem

the world is spinning fast tonight you can hurt yourself tryin' to hold on to what you used to be i am so glad the past is all gone? been out in the wild been out in the night been out of your mind do you live here or is this a vacation volcano, you do not want to, you do not want to know volcano something in you must to blow you do not want to, you do not want to know your eyes were like landing lights they used to be the clearest blue now you do not see so well the future's going to land on you you are on a piece of ground above a volcano you were alone and now you are not alone you are rock'n'roll you and i are rock'n'roll

johnny, take a walk with your sister the moon let her pale light in to fill up your room you have been living underground, eating from a can you have been running away, from what you do not understand (look) she is slippy, you are sliding down she will be there, when you hit the ground it is all right, it is all right, it is all right she moves in mysterious ways she moves in mysterious ways, oh johnny, take a dive with your sister in the rain let her talk about the things you can not explain to touch is to heal, to hurt is to steal if you want to kiss the sky, better learn how to kneel on your knees, boy she is the wave, she turns the tide she sees the man inside the child she moves in mysterious ways, yeah she moves in mysterious ways, yeah, oh, ah lift my days, light up my nights, oh one day you will look back, and you will see where you were held now by this love while you could stand there you could move on this moment follow this feeling (it is all right, it is all right, it is all right) (she moves in mysterious ways) move you, spirits move you (it is all right, it is all right, it is all right) move, spirits move you, oh, yeah (she moves in mysterious ways) does it move you, she moves with it (it is all right, it is all right, it is all right) lift my days, and light up my nights, oh

song: Ultra Violet Light My Way My Way
lyrics: sometimes i feel like i do not know sometimes i feel like checking out i want to get it wrong can not always be strong and love it will not be long ... oh sugar, do not you cry oh child, wipe the tears from your eyes you know i need you to be strong and the day is dark, as the night is long feel like trash you make me feel clean i am in the black can not see or be seen baby baby baby light my way alright now, baby baby baby light my way you bury your treasure where it can not be found but your love is like a secret that is been passed around there is a silence that comes to a house where no-one can sleep i guess it is the price of love i know it is not cheap oh come on, baby baby baby light my way i remember when we could sleep on stones now we lie together in whispers and moans when i was all messed up and i heard opera in my head your love was a light bulb hanging over my bed baby baby baby

song: Stuck in a Moment You Can t Get Out Of
lyrics: i am not afraid of anything in this world there is nothing you can throw at me that i have not already heard i am just trying to find a decent melody a song that i can sing in my own company i never thought you were a fool but darling, look at you (ooh) you got to stand up straight, carry your own weight these tears are going nowhere baby you have got to get yourself together you have got stuck in a moment and now you can not get out of it do not say that later will be better now you are stuck in a moment and you can not get out of it i will not forsake the colors that you bring the nights you filled with fireworks they left you with nothing i am still enchanted by the light you brought to me i listen through your ears through your eyes i can see you are such a fool to worry like you do. oh i know it is tough and you can never get enough of what you do not really need now my, oh my oh love, look at you now you have got yourself stuck in a moment i was unconscious, half asleep the water is warm 'til you discover how deep i was not jumping, for me it was a fall it is a long way down, to nothing at all and if the night runs over and if the day will not last and if your way should falter along the stony paths and if, and if the night runs over and if, the day will not last along this stony paths it is just a moment this time will pass

i was running down the road the fear was all i knew i was looking for a soul that is real then i ran into you and that cherry blossom tree was a gateway to the sun and friendship once it is won it is won... it is one northside just across the river to the southside that is a long way here all the green and all the gold the hurt you hide, the joy you hold the foolish pride that gets you out the door up on cedarwood cedarwood road sleepwalking down the road and not waking from these dreams because it is never dead it is still my head it was a warzone in my teens i am still standing on that street still need an enemy the worst ones i can not see you can... you can from the southside the hurt you hide and the joy you hold the foolish pride that sends you back for more if the door is open it is not theft you can not return to where you have never left blossoms falling from a tree they cover you and cover me symbols clashing, bibles smashing paint the world you need to see and sometimes fear is the only place that we can call our home and a heart that is broken is a heart that is open open, open

the star, that gives us light has been gone a while but it is not an illusion the ache in my heart is so much a part of who i am something in your eyes took a thousand years to get here took a thousand years, a thousand years hold me close, hold me close and do not let me go. hold me close like i am someone that you might know hold me close the darkness just let us us see who we are i have got your life inside of me iris... iris... once we are born, we begin to forget the very reason we came but you i am sure i have met long before the night the stars went out we are meeting up again hold me close, the darkness just let us us see the stars are bright but do they know the universe is beautiful but cold you took me by the hand i thought that i was leading you but it was you made me your man machine i dream where you are iris standing in the hall she tells me i can do it all iris wakes to my nightmares do not fear the world it is not there iris playing on the strand she buries the boy beneath the sand, iris says that i will be the death of her it was not me she said: "free yourself, to be yourself if only you could see yourself" free yourself, to be yourself if only you could see...

and if the terrors of the night come creeping into your days and the world comes stealing children from your room guard your innocence from hallucination and know that darkness always gathers around the light if there is a light we can not always see and there is a world we can not always be if there is a dark now we should not doubt and there is a light do not let it go out when the wind screams and shouts and the sea is a dragon's tail and the ship that stole your heart away sets sail when all you have left is leaving and all you got is grieving and all you know is needing because this is a song a song for someone someone like me i know the world is done but you do not have to be i have got a question for the child in you before it leaves are you tough enough to be kind? do you know your heart has its own mind? darkness gathers around the light hold on there is a light if there is a world that we should not doubt and this is a song this is a song

every breaking wave on the shore tells the next one there'll be one more and every gambler knows that to lose is what you are really there for summer i was fearlessness now i speak into an answer phone like every fallen leaf on the breeze winter would not leave it alone, alone if you go if you go your way and i go mine are we so are we so helpless against the tide? baby, every dog on the street knows that we are in love with defeat are we ready to be swept off our feet and stop chasing every breaking wave every sailor knows that the sea is a friend made enemy and every shipwrecked soul knows what it is to live without intimacy i thought i heard the captain's voice but it is hard to listen while you preach like every broken wave on the shore this is as far as i could reach the sea knows where are the rocks and drowning is no sin you know where my heart is the same place that yours has been we know that we fear to win and so we end before we begin before we begin

morning, your toast, your tea and sugar read about the politician's lover go through the day like knife through butter why do not you you dress in the colours of forgiveness your eyes as red as christmas purple robes are folded on the kitchen chair you are going to sleep like a baby tonight in your dreams, everything is alright tomorrow dawns like someone else's suicide dreams it is a dirty business, dreaming where there is silence and not screaming where there is no daylight, there is no healing, no no tomorrow dawns like a suicide but you are going to sleep like a baby tonight hope is where the door is when the church is where the war is where no one can feel no one else's pain sleep like a baby tonight like a bird, your dreams'll take a flight like st. francis covered in light

i tried my best to be just like the other boys in school i tried my best to get it right and died at every duel this mountainside is suicide this dream will never work still the sign upon my headstone, write "a champion of the world" i tried my best to stay alight fly like a firework i tried my best at taking flight but my rocketship reversed oh, referee, do not stop the fight everyone can see, i am hurt but i will stand before conquistadors 'til i am champion of the world (when i sail) and when i sail i am sailing west (though i might fail) knowing i might fail but, still i am hoping for the best (in my dreams) and in my dreams onto my chest she will pin the colours and say "i wandered the whole wide world but baby, you are the best" so i am flying on my bicycle heading upwards from the earth i am jumping with no parachute out into the universe i have e.t. on my bicycle because giving up will not work i am riding on my rocketship and i am champion of the world

i used to rule the world seas would rise when i gave the word now in the morning i sleep alone sweep the streets i used to own i used to roll the dice feel the fear in my enemy's eyes listen as the crowd would sing "now the old king is dead! long live the king!" one minute i held the key next the walls were closed on me and i discovered that my castles stand upon pillars of salt and pillars of sand i hear jerusalem bells a ringing roman calvary choirs are singing be my mirror, my sword and shield my missionaries in a foreign field for some reason i can not explain once you go there was never never an honest word and that was when i ruled the world it was the wicked and wild wind blew down the doors to let me in shattered windows and the sound of drums people could not believe what i would become revolutionaries wait for my head on a silver plate just a puppet on a lonely string oh who would ever want to be king? i know saint peter will not call my name but that was when i ruled the world

i turn the music up i have got my records on i shut the world outside until the lights come on maybe the streets alight maybe the trees are gone i feel my heart start beating to my favorite song and all the kids they dance all the kids all night until monday morning feels another life i am on a roll this time and heaven is in sight i got my records on from underneath the rubble sing a rebel song do not want to see another generation drop i would rather be a comma than a full stop maybe i am in the black maybe i am on my knees maybe i am in the gap between the two trapezes but my heart is beating and my pulses start cathedrals in my heart and we saw this light i swear you emerge blinking into to tell me it is alright as we soar wall every siren is a symphony and every tear's a waterfall is a waterfall oh oh, oh, oh is a is a waterfall every tear so you can hurt hurt me bad but still i will raise the flag it was a waterfall a waterfall every teardrop is a waterfall

was a long and dark december from the rooftops, i remember there was snow, white snow clearly, i remember from the windows, they were watching while we froze down below when the future's architectured by a carnival of idiots on show you would better lie low if you love me, will not you let me know? when the banks became cathedrals and a fox became god priests clutched onto bibles hollowed out to fit their rifles and the cross was held aloft bury me in armor when i am dead and hit the ground my nerves are poles that unfroze and if you love me, will not you let me know? i do not want to be a soldier who the captain of some sinking ship would stow, far below so if you love me, why'd you let me go? i took my love down to violet hill then we sat in snow all that time she was silent still so if you love me, will not you let me know?

oh, they say people come say people go this particular diamond was extra special and though you might be gone and the world may not know still i see you, celestial like a lion you ran a goddess you rolled like an eagle you circle in perfect purple so how come things move on? how come cars do not slow? when it feels like the end of my world when i should, but i can not, let you go? but when i am cold, cold oh, when i am cold, cold there is a light that you give me when i am in shadow there is a feeling you give me, an everglow like brothers in blood sisters who ride and we swore on that night we would be friends 'til we die but the changing of winds and the way waters flow life is short as the falling of snow and now i am going to miss you, i know in water rolled, salt i know that you are always with me and the way you will show and you are with me wherever i go and you give me this feeling this everglow oh, what i would give for just a moment to hold yeah, i live for this feeling, it is everglow so if you love someone you should let them know oh, the light that you left me will everglow

when you try your best, but you do not succeed when you get what you want but not what you need when you feel so tired, but you can not sleep stuck in reverse and the tears come streaming down your face when you lose something, you can not replace when you love someone, but it goes to waste could it be worse? lights will guide you home and ignite your bones and i will try to fix you and high up above or down below when you are too in love to let it go but if you never try, you will never know just what you are worth tears stream down your face when you lose something, you cannot replace tears stream down your face and i i promise you, i will learn from my mistakes

daddy, are you out there? daddy, will not you come and play? daddy, do you not care? is there nothing that you want to say? i know you are hurting, too but i need you, i do daddy, if you are out there daddy, all i want to say you are so far away oh, you are so far away that is okay i am okay daddy, why'd you run away? daddy, are you okay? look dad, we got the same hair and daddy, it is my birthday and all i want to say is you are so far away will not you come and will not you stay? please, stay oh, please, stay one day just one day

once upon a time somebody ran somebody ran away saying fast as i can i got to go once upon a time we fell apart you are holding in your hands the two halves of my heart once upon a time we burned bright now all we ever seem to do is fight on and on and on, and on, and on once upon a time on the same side... once upon a time on the same side, in the same game now why'd you have to go? have to go and throw water on my flame i could have been a princess, you would be a king could have had a castle and worn a ring but no, you let me go you stole my star because you really hurt me no, you really hurt me oh-oh, you really hurt me

my song is love love to the loveless shown and it goes up you do not have to be alone your heavy heart is made of stone and it is so hard to see clearly you do not have to be on your own and i am not going to take it back and i am not going to say i do not mean that you are the target that i am aiming at and i will get that message home my song is love unknown and i am on fire for you clearly and i am nothing on my own got to get that message home and i am not going to stand and wait not going to leave it until it is much too late on a platform, i am going to stand and say that i am nothing on my own and i love you please come home my song is love is love unknown and i have got to get that message home

song: All I Can Think About Is You
lyrics: one, two, three fish fell out of water birds stuck on the ground chaos giving orders everything is upside down the whole world on a flight path i wonder where they will go, ah trouble's on the outside, i know but now, all i can think about is you all i can think about is you if all that i am on earth to do is solo then what a lone poor shoe i want to walk in a two go it is all i can it is all i can do everything is falling all around you love is the only thing left that is true

because you are a sky, because you are a sky full of stars i am going to give you my heart because you light up the path i do not care, go on and tear me apart i do not care if you do, ooh because in a sky, because in a sky full of stars i think i saw you i want to die in your arms, oh because you get lighter the more it gets dark i am going to give you my heart, oh i do not care if you do, oh because in a sky, because in sky full of stars i think i see you because you are a sky, you are a sky full of stars such a heavenly view you are such a heavenly view, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

i think of you i have not slept i think, i do but, i do not forget my body moves goes where i will but though i try my heart stays still it never moves just will not be led and so my mouth waters, to be fed and you are always in my head you are always in my head always in my head always in my... this, i guess is to tell you, you are chosen out from the rest

my father said, "never give up, son" just look how good cassius become muhammad, mahatma and nelson not scared to be strong (man, what if they say i am no good) (what if they say, "get out of here kid, you got no future") now you could run and just say they are right no, i will never be no one in my whole life or you could turn and say "no wait, they are wrong" and get to keep on dancing all life long my father said, "never give up son" just look what amelia and joan done oh rosa, teresa, their war won yeah, you could be someone special you have got bright in your brains and lightning in your veins you will go higher than they have ever gone in you i see you have got fire in your eyes and when you realize, you will go further than we have ever gone look just turn it on i paid my intuition, i could not afford tuition my funds was insufficient, it felt like i am in prison until i realized i had to set my mind free i was trusting statistics more than i trust me get a degree, good job, 401k but i am trying to turn k's to m's, what does it take? and maybe i could be the new ali of music prolly instead of doing it just as a hobby, like these boys told me to i guess you either watch the show, or your show and prove prove it to them or you prove it to yourself but honestly it is better if you do it for yourself never complacent until we hit the oasis one life do not waste it, feel my heart racing success i taste it, ah we on the verge of getting every single thing that we deserve you have got fire in your eyes, i see heaven inside you will go further than we have ever gone you have got bright in your brains, you can break through these chains you will go higher than we have ever gone do not go to war with yourself just turn, just turn, just turn it on and you can not go wrong

a whisper, a whisper, a whisper, a whisper i hear the sound of the ticking of clocks remember your face and remember too when you are wrong come back and look for me, look for me when i am lost just a whisper, a whisper, a whisper, a whisper night turns to day and i still have these questions please just refrain should i go forwards or backwards? and i still can not go back to you

call it magic call it true i call it magic when i am with you and i just got broken broken into two still i call it magic when i am next to you and i do not, and i do not, and i do not, and i do not no, i do not, it is true no, i do not, no, i do not, no, i do not, no, i do not want anybody else but you cut me into two and with all your magic i disappear from view and i can not get over can not get over you such a precious jewel want to fall i fall so far i want to fall fall so hard and i call it magic and i call it true and if you were to ask me after all that we have been through still believe in magic well, yes, i do oh, yes, i do of course, i do

what in the world are we going to do? look at what everybody's going through what kind of world do you want it to be? am i the future or the history? because everyone hurts, everyone cries everyone tells each other all kinds of lies everyone falls, everybody dreams and doubts got to keep dancing when the lights go out how in the world i am going to see you as my brother, not my enemy? everyone sees the colour in each other's eyes everyone loves, everybody gets their hearts ripped out going to keep dancing when the lights go out hold tight for everyday life but at first light, throw my arms out open wide hallelujah, hallelujah hallelu, halle-hallelujah

so i look in your direction but you pay me no attention, do you? i know, you do not listen to me because you say, you see straight through me, do not you? but on and on, from the moment i wake 'til the moment i sleep i will be there by your side just you try and stop me i will be waiting in line just to see if you care oh, did you want me to change? well, i changed for good and i want you to know that you will always get your way i wanted to say do not you shiver shiver sing it loud and clear i will always be waiting for you so you know how much i need you but you never even see me, do you? and is this my final chance of getting you if you care and i wanted to say yeah, i will always be waiting for you for you i will always be waiting and it is you, i see but you do not see me and it is you, i hear so loud and so clear i sing it loud and clear and i will always be waiting for you but you pay me no attention and you know how much i need you but you never even see me

fixing up a car to drive in it again searching for the water hoping for the rain up and up, up and up down upon the canvas, working meal to meal waiting for a chance to pick your orange field see a pearl form, a diamond in the rough see a bird soaring high above the flood it is in your blood, it is in your blood underneath the storm an umbrella is saying "sitting with the poison takes away the pain" up and up, up and up it is saying we are going to get it, get it together, i know i am going to get it, get it together somehow we are going to get it, get it together and flower woah, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh we are going to get it, get it together i know we are going to get it, get it together and flow i am going to get it, get it together and go up and up and up lying in the gutter, aiming for the moon trying to empty out the ocean with a spoon how come people suffer, how come people part? how come people struggle, how come people break your heart? break your heart, ohh yes i want to grow, yes i want to feel yes i want to know, show me how to heal it up heal it up see the forest there in every seed angels in the marble waiting to be freed just need love just need love when the going is rough saying and you can say what is, or fight for it close your mind or take a risk you can say it is mine and clench your fist or see each sunrise as a gift when you are in pain when you think you have had enough do not ever give up

how long before i get in? before it starts, before i begin how long before you decide? before i know what it feels like where to, where do i go? if you have never tried then you will never know how long do i have to climb- up on the side of this mountain of mine? look up, i look up at night planets are moving at the speed of light climb up, up in the trees every chance that you get is a chance you seize how long am i going to stand- with my head stuck under the sand? i will start before i can stop or before i see things the right way up all that noise, and all that sound all those places i got found and birds go flying at the speed of sound to show you how it all began birds came flying from the underground if you could see it then you would understand ideas that you will never find all the inventors could never design the buildings that you put up japan and china, all lit up the sign that i could not read or a light that i could not see some things you have to believe but others are puzzles, puzzling me ah, when you see it then you will understand all those signs, i knew what they meant some things you can not invent some get made, and some get sent birds go flying at the speed of sound

the lights go out, and i can not be saved tides that i tried to swim against brought me down upon my knees oh i beg, i beg and plead, singing come out of things unsaid shoot an apple off my head and a trouble that can not be named a tiger's waiting to be tamed, singing you are confusion never stops closing walls and tickin' clocks, going to come back and take you home i could not stop that you now know, singing come out upon my seas cursed missed opportunities, am i- a part of the cure? or am i part of the disease? singing and nothing else compares oh no, nothing else compares home, home where i wanted to go home, home (you) where i wanted to go (are) where i wanted to go are (are)

there is a wild wind blowing down the corner of my street every night there the headlights are glowing there is a cold war coming, on the radio i heard baby it is a violent world oh, love, do not let me go will not you take me where the streetlights glow i can hear it coming i can hear the siren sound now my feet will not touch the ground time came a-creeping oh and time's a loaded gun every road is a ray of light it goes o-o-o-on time'll leak and lead you on still it is such a beautiful night oh oh love, do not let me go like a serenade of sound gravity release me, and do not ever hold me down

she comes on like a stone but you do not know where from she was thrown like a burning meteor from miles high looking for a place to land she said, "have you got yourself some sand?" and whatever you replied, she took as yes now she comes after thee with her newly planted seeds and soon you are prone down on your knees and there you dig and then before you know the weeds are obesely overgrown with all the wild seed she sows in your sleep you got to know you will never let her go she is a lightning bolt lightning bolt always something and never nothing is not that the way we are taught to be, to be? flipping through the worn out pages and stages when you knew not who to be 'til the lightning strike sets you free the crashing stormy waves erode her shoreline everyday until the castle of her ways turn to sand she holds her lovely breast as the birds fall from the nest flying towards the great northwest, yeah yeah yeah and with no repair in sight there is no god with such might as to open her world wide with subterfuge your death will soon arrive as she finally decides that all her problems, they will not die with you oh yeah she is your lightning bolt never let her go she is true she is rock 'n roll never let go uncontrollable she is just like you

you got me through these feelings that separates me from you i put myself through a beating i need you to pull me through i will break through these feelings i will break through the ceiling i always take the long way, the long way i always take the long way, that leads me back to you now's the time to resurface take back me and you the hammer will fall on purpose our time, our truth plant a seed in your mind, what is yours is mine show me how to live divine, what is yours is mine back to a moment in your mind, go back in time

hey, oh sheets of empty canvas, untouched sheets of clay were laid spread out before me as her body once did all five horizons revolved around her soul as the earth to the sun now the air i tasted and breathed has taken a turn oh, and all i taught that was everything oh, i know she gave me all that she wore and now my bitter hands chafe beneath the clouds of what was everything? oh, the pictures have all been washed in black, tattooed everything i take a walk outside i am surrounded by some kids at play i can feel their laughter, so why do i sear oh, and twisted thoughts that spin round my head i am spinning, oh, i am spinning how quick the sun can drop away and now my bitter hands cradle broken glass all the pictures have all been washed in black, tattooed everything all the love gone bad, turned my world to black tattooed all i see, all that i am, all that i will be, yeah uh huh, uh huh, oh i know someday you will have a beautiful life, i know you will be a star in somebody else's sky, but why, why, why? can not it be, can not it be mine we belong, we belong together, together!

son, she said have i got a little story for you what you thought was your daddy was nothing but a... while you were sittin' home alone at age thirteen your real daddy was dyin' sorry you did not see him but i am glad that we talked oh i, o-oh i am still alive hey, hey i, o-oh i am still alive hey i, o-oh i am still alive hey, oh while she walks slowly across a young man's room she said, "i am ready for you" i can not remember anything to this very day 'cept the look, the look oh, you know where now i can not see, i just stare i, i am still alive yeah, yeah, i, o-oh i am still alive yeah, yeah, i, o-oh i am still alive, yeah "is something wrong?", she said of course there is "you are still alive", she said oh, do i deserve to be? is that the question? and if so, if so who answers, who answers? i, o-oh i am still alive yeah, yeah, i, mmh i am still alive yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah wow aha, yeah aha ooh wow, come on! yeah, aha yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah!

seven of the clock in the morning, got a message from afar down under an oasis where there are dreams still being born and summer spoke to winter relaying all encouraging words and i was fully grateful mutant messages were heard moved on from my despondency and left it in the bed do i leave it there still sleeping ot maybe kill it better yet? for this is no time for depression or self-indulgent hesitance this fucked-up situation calls for all hands, hands on deck freedom is as freedom does and freedom is a verb they giveth they taketh and you fight to keep that what you have earned we saw the destination, got so close before it turned swim sideways from this undertow and do not be deterred floodlight dreams go drifting past all the lives we could have had distant loves floating above close these eyes, they have seen enough caught the butterfly, broke its wings then put it on display stripped of all its beauty once it could not fly high away still alive like a passer-by overdosed on gamma rays another god's creation destined to be thrown away sitting bull and crazy horse, they forged the north and west then there is sitting bullshit as our sitting president talking to his mirror, what is he say, what is it say back? a tragedy of errors, who will be the last to have a laugh? his best days gone, hard to admit throwing angry punches with nothing to hit luminous thoughts were once all he had fading lights, lost eloquence there is still a fire in the engine room knows relief will be coming soon what is to be done carve a path for rivers reign much to be done oceans rising with the waves so, held by these thoughts they refuse to slip away oh, hangman in dreamland about to call your name much to be

song: Elderly Woman Bahind the Counter in a Small Town
lyrics: i seem to recognize your face haunting, familiar, yet i can not seem to place it cannot find the candle of thought to light your name lifetimes are catching up with me all these changes taking place i wish i would seen the place but no one's ever taken me hearts and thoughts they fade, fade away i swear, i recognize your breath memories like fingerprints are slowly raising me, you would not recall for i am not my former it is hard when you are stuck upon the shelf i changed by not changing at all small town predicts my fate perhaps that is what no one wants to see i just want to scream, hello my god, it is been so long never dreamed you would return but now here you are and here i am hearts and thoughts they fade away hearts and thoughts they fade

hear the sirens hear the circus so profound i hear the sirens more and more in this here town let me catch my breath to breathe and reach across the bed just to know we are safe i am a grateful man the slightest bit of light and i can see you clear have to take your hand and feel your breath for fear this someday will be over i pull you close, so much to lose knowing that nothing lasts forever i did not care, before you were here i danced in laughter with the ever after but all things change let this remain covering distance in the night the sound echoing closer will they come for me next time for every choice mistake i have made it is not my plan or to send you in the arms of another man and if you choose to stay i will wait i will understand it is a fragile thing this life we lead if i think too much i can get over-whelmed by the grace by which we live our lives with death over our shoulders want you to know that should i go i always loved you held you high above, true i study your face and the fear goes away if i think too much i can get over- whelmed by the grace with death over our shoulder the fear goes away aah ah, oh oh

hey, hey, yeah, uh sheets of empty canvas, untouched sheets of clay were laid spread out before me as her body once did all five horizons revolved around her soul, as the earth to the sun now the air i tasted and breathed has taken a turn, ooh ooh, and all i taught her was everything ooh, i know she gave me all that she wore and now my bitter hands chafe beneath the clouds of what was everything oh, the pictures have all been washed in black tattooed everything i take a walk outside, i am surrounded by some kids at play i can feel their laughter, so why do i sear? oh and twisted thoughts that spin 'round my head i am spinning, oh i am spinning how quick the sun can drop away and now my bitter hands cradle broken glass all the pictures have all been washed in black all the love gone bad turned my world to black tattooed all i see, all that i am, all that i will be, yeah oh, oh, ooh i know someday you will have a beautiful life i know you will be a star in somebody else's sky, but why why, why can not it be, oh can not it be mine? ooh, ah yeah, ah ooh

i took a drive today time to emancipate i guess it was the beatings made me wise but i am not about to give thanks, or apologize i could not breathe, holdin' me down hand on my face pushed to the ground enmity gaged, united by fear forced to endure what i could not forgive i seem to look away wounds in the mirror waved it was not my surface most defiled head at your feet, fool to your crown pissed on my plate, swallowed it down enmity gauged, united by fear tried to endure saw things clearer clearer once you, were in my rearviewmirror i gather speed from you fucking with me once and for all i am far away i hardly believe finally the shades, are raised, hey yeah saw things so much clearer once you, once you (rearviewmirror) once you, oh yeah

i got blood blood on my hands the stain of of a human i finally awoke to my mother's wrath call lights bed sores and sponge baths firstly do no harm then put your seatbelt on buckle up the drapes pull back reveal her wound her boy on her lap a murderer groomed antiquities lost lost to the nile a sudden slip a fall on the time

if i ever were to lose you i would surely lose myself everything i have found dear i have not found by myself try and sometimes you will succeed to make this man of me all my stolen missing parts i have no need for anymore i believe and i believe because i can see our future days days of you and me back when i was feeling broken i focused on a prayer you came deep as any ocean did something out there hear? all the complexities and games no one wins but somehow they are still played all the missing crooked hearts they may die but in us they live on when hurricanes and cyclones raged when winds turned dirt to dust when floods they came or tides they raised ever closer became us all the promises at sundown i have meant them like the rest all the demons used to come round i am grateful now they have left so persistent in my ways hey angel i am here to stay no resistance, no alarms please, this is just too good to be gone you and me

at home drawing pictures of mountain tops with him on top lemon yellow sun arms raised in a v and the dead lay in pools of maroon below daddy did not give attention oh, to the fact that mommy did not care king jeremy the wicked oh, ruled his world jeremy spoke in class today clearly i remember pickin' on the boy seemed a harmless little fuck but we unleashed the lion gnashed his teeth and bit the recess lady's breast how could i forget and he hit me with a surprise left my jaw left hurting dropped wide open just like the day oh, like the day i heard daddy did not give affection, no and the boy was something that mommy would not wear oh ruled his world try to forget this (try to forget this) try to erase this (try to erase this) from the blackboard jeremy spoke in spoke in

large fingers pushing paint you are god and you have got big hands colors blend the challenges you give man seek my part devote myself my small self like a book amongst the many on a shelf sometimes i know, sometimes i rise sometimes i fall, sometimes i do not sometimes i cringe, sometimes i live sometimes i walk, sometimes i kneel sometimes i speak of nothing at all sometimes i reach to myself hear god

yeah, hey, hey when something's dark, let me she would a little light on it when something's cold, let me put a little fire on it if somethings old, i want to put a bit of shine on it when something's gone, i want to fight to get it back again yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, fight to get it back again yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah when something's broke, i want to put a bit of fixin' on it when something's bored, i want to put a little exciting on it if something's low, i want to put a little high on it when something's lost, i want to fight to get it back again when signals cross, i want to put a little straight on it if there is no love, i want to try to love again i will say your prayers, i will take your side i will find us a way to make light i will dig your grave, we will dance and sing what is saved could be one last lifetime hey, hey, hey yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah fight to get it back again, yeah, yeah, yeah

you can not hide the lies in the rings of a tree if your heart still beats free keep it for yourself when you want to run and leave some part unrevealed like the flight of the bee it is alright, to be alone to listen for a heartbeat, it is your own it is alright, to quiet up to disappear in thin air, it is your own should your living truth die could be an acid trip leave the eucharist whole if you tire of the game hit the road towards the clouds find your groove in the sound keep in for yourself it is alright, to say no be a disappointment in your own home it is alright to turn it off ignore the rules of the state, it is your own it is alright, to shut it down disappear in thin air, it is your home you can not hide your eyes

i always thought i would cross that river the other side, distant now as i got close it turned and widened horizon now, fading out drifting off in the undertow can not spot a figure on dry land and afterthoughts of safety when in truth, none to be had none to be had i used to tell time by my shadow 'til the thunderclouds, they took the stage these days will end as do the light's rays another read of the same page wide awake through this deepest night still waiting on the sun as the hours seem to multiply find a star to soldier on living beneath a lion's paw knowing nothing can be tamed can be tamed i want this dream to last forever a wish denied to lengthen our time i wish this moment was never ending let it be a lie that all future's die while the government thrives on discontent and there is no such thing as clear proselytizing and profitizing as our will all but just disappears folded over, forced in a choke hold outnumbered and held down and all these talk of rapture look around at the promise now here and now can not hold me down will not hold us down live it out let it out get it out shout it out share the light

if i keep holding out will the light shine through? under this broken roof, it is only rain that i feel i have been wishing out the days. come back i have been planning out all that i would say to you since you slipped away. know that i still remain true i have been wishing out the days. please say, that if you had not of gone now i would not have lost you another way from wherever you are. come back and these days, they linger on and in the night i have been waiting for the real possibility i may meet you in my dream i go to sleep if i do not fall apart will my memories stay clear so you had to go and i had to remain here but the strangest thing to date so far away and yet you feel so close and i am not going to question it any other way there must be an open door for you to come back and the days, they linger on and every night, what i am waiting for is the real possibility i may meet you in my dreams and sometimes you are here and you are talking back to me come the morning i could swear you are next to me and it is okay. it is okay i will be here come back

freezin' rests his head on a pillow made of concrete again oh, feelin' maybe he will see a little betters, any days oh, hand out faces that he sees time again are not that familiar oh, dark grin he can not help, when he is happy he looks insane even flow, thoughts arrive like butterflies oh, he do not know, so he chases them away oh, someday yet he will begin his life again life again, life again kneelin' lookin' through the paper though he does not know to read oh, prayin' now to something that has never showed him anything understands the weather of the winter's on its way oh, ceilings few and far between all the legal halls of shame whispering hands gently lead him away him away, him away yeah, ooh, ah yeah, fuck it up ah, someday yet he will begin his life again yeah, ooh

do you see the way that tree bends? does it inspire? leaning out to catch the sun's rays a lesson to be applied are you getting something out of this all-encompassing trip? you can spend your time alone redigesting past regrets, oh or you can come to terms and realize you are the only one who can not forgive yourself, oh makes much more sense to live in the present tense have you ideas on how this life ends? checked your hands and studied the lines? have you ever believed that the road ahead ascends off into the light? seems that needlessly it is getting harder to find an approach and a way to live are we getting something out of this all-encompassing trip? you are the only one who cannot forgive yourself, oh

only love can make it rain the way the beach is kissed by the sea like the sweat of lovers laying in the fields love, reign o'er me love, reign on me, rain o'er me rain on me only love can bring the rain that makes you yearn to the sky that falls like tears from on high love, reign o'er me, rain on me on the dry and dusty road the nights we spend apart alone i need to get back home to cool, cool rain i can not sleep and i lay and i think the night is hot and black as ink wooh god, i need a drink of cool, cool rain reign o'er me, o'er me love

oh, please do not go out on me do not go on me now never acted up before i swear i never took it for granted just thought of it now suppose i abused you just passing it on go now once fastened, servile now you are getting sharp moving oh so swiftly with such disarm i pulled the covers over him should have pulled the alarm turned to my nemesis a fool not a fucking god no time suck my please, do not go on me do not go on me suck blood touch, please tunnel vision tuck, time see please, please, please do not you want me?

i wish i was a neutron bomb, for once i could go off i wish i was a sacrifice but somehow still lived on i wish i was a sentimental ornament you hung on the christmas tree, i wish i was the star that went on top i wish i was the evidence, i wish i was the grounds for 50 million hands upraised and open toward the sky i wish i was a sailor with someone who waited for me i wish i was as fortunate, as fortunate as me i wish i was a messenger and all the news was good i wish i was the full moon shining off your camaro's hood i wish i was an alien at home behind the sun i wish i was the souvenir you kept your house key on i wish i was the pedal brake that you depended on i wish i was the verb to trust and never let you down i wish i was a radio song, the one that you turned up

oh, where oh where can my baby be? the lord took her away from me she is gone to heaven, so i got to be good so i can see my baby when i leave this world we were out on a date in my daddy's car we had not driven very far there in the road, straight up bend a car was stalled, the engine was dead i could not stop, so i swerved to the right i will never forget, the sound that night the screamin' tires, the bustin' glass the painful scream, that i heard last when i woke up, the rain was pourin' down there were people standing all around something warm flowin' through my eyes but somehow i found my baby that night i lifted her head, she looked at me and said "hold me darling, just a little while" i held her close, i kissed her our last kiss i found the love, that i knew i had missed but now she is gone, even though i hold her tight i lost my love, my life that night ooh, ooh ooh ooh, ooh ooh ooh oh, oh, oh oh, oh

unsealed on a porch a letter sat then you said, i want to leave it again once i saw her on a beach of weathered sand and on the sand i want to leave it again, yeah on a weekend want to wish it all away and they called and i said that i want what i said and then i call out again and the reason, oughtta leave her calm, i know i said, i do not know whether i am the boxer or the bag oh yeah, can you see them out on the porch yeah, but they do not wave i see them 'round the front way, yeah and i know and i know i do not want to stay make me cry i see i do not know, there is something else i want to drum it all away oh, i said, i do not, i do not know whether i am the boxer or the bag yeah but they do not wave 'round the front way and i know and i know i do not want to stay, oh i do not want to stay i do not want to stay, oh, no yeah oh...

he could have tuned in, tuned in but he tuned out a bad time, nothing could save him alone in a corridor, waiting, locked out he got up outta there, ran for hundreds of miles he made it to the ocean, had a smoke in a tree the wind rose up, set him down on his knee a wave came crashing like a fist to the jaw delivered him wings, "hey, look at me now" arms wide open with the sea as his floor oh, power, oh he is flying whole high, wide, oh he floated back down because he wanted to share his key to the locks on the chains he saw everywhere but first he was stripped, and then he was stabbed by faceless men, well, fuckers he still stands and he still gives his love, he just gives it away the love he receives is the love that is saved and sometimes is seen a strange spot in the sky a human being that was given to fly high, flying oh, oh oh, high oh, oh, oh, oh

the direction of the eye so misleading the defection of the soul nauseously quick i do not question our existence i just question our modern needs i will walk with my hands bound i will walk with my face blood i will walk with my shadow flag into your garden garden of stone after all is done and we are still alone i will not be taken yet i will go with my hands bound i do not show i do not share i do not need what you have to give oh, i will walk with my hands bound garden i will walk into your garden i do not know i do not care you for me to live

reconnaissance on the corner in the old world not so far first we took an aeroplane then a boat to zanzibar queen cracking on the blaster and mercury did rise came along where we all belonged you were yours and i was mine yeah, yeah had to quick escape had crossed the border to morocco kashmir then marrakech the lengths we had to go to then to find a place trump had not fucked up yet living life on the back porch lifting rocks to make a wage every sunset paid attention to not a starry night went to waste and here we are, the red planet craters across the skyline a sleep sack in a bivouac and a kerouac sense of time and we think about the old days of green grass, sky and red wine should have known so fragile avoided this one-way flight

alone, listless breakfast table in an otherwise empty room young girl, violence center of her own attention the mother reads aloud, child tries to understand it tries to make her proud the shades go down, it is in her head painted room, can not deny there is something wrong do not call me daughter, not fit to the picture kept will remind me do not call me she holds the hand that holds her down she will rise above do not call me daughter, not fit to me (the shades go down) (the shades go, go) (go)

high or low, where did you go are you stuck in the middle? a spectral invisible ghost i am here juxtaposed like images of angels in the snow our courage melts away, it comes then goes where you been? can i find a glimpse of my friend do not know where or when one of us left the other behind divisions came and troubles multiplied incisions made by scalpel blades of time comes then goes can i say, how ya been? i can guess and conjecture my altered perceptions unclear please interfere sadness comes with it a sea of tears would some love be best had it not appeared? is this you? here i stand intense recollections of pain, self-neglecting again like you, i keep it in thought you found a game where you could win yeah, it is all vivisection in the end high or low, try again she fell off the altar a vision you caught of her but then a woodcut in red i wish it was not you that she had led selfish navigation with no end where did you sleep? can i find a deeper connection in the face of rejection i am trying i am trying evidence in the echoes of your mind leads me to believe we missed the signs can i try, one last time? could all use a saviour from human behavior sometimes and the kids are alright the queen of collections took your time sadness comes because some of it was mine

confusion is to commotion what love is to our devotion imperceptibly big, big as the ocean and equally hard to control so save your predictions and burn your assumptions love is friction ripe for comfort endless equations and tugging persuasions doors open up to interpretation expecting perfection leaves a lot to ignore when the past is the present and the future's no more when every tomorrow is the same as before the looser things get the tighter you become tighter not one man can be greater than the sum that is not a negative thought i am positive, positive, positive falling down, not staying down could'a held me up rather than tearing me down drown in the river leaves a lot to endure numbers keep falling off the calendar's floor we are stuck in our boxes windows open no more could not lift up the forget-me-nots not recalling what they are for i am in love with clairvoyants because they are out of this world i know the girls want to dance fall away their circumstance i know the boys want to grow their dicks and fix and file things clairvoyants in a trance stand back when the spirit comes stand back away their circumstance

comes the summer rain cue the lightning and far off thunder again projecting through the clouds meditations, drifting off in the sound the more mistakes, the more resolve it is going to take much more than ordinary love to lift this up stars align they say when things are better than right now feel the retrograde spin us round, round seven seas are raising forever futures fading out feel the retrograde all around, round accelerate the change feeling equal and opposite all the same momentum rearranged shout, the echo, returning back but now changed the rusted shapes refuse to fall times are better than right now hear the sound in the distance, now could be thunder or a crowd

state of love and trust as i busted down the pretext sin still plays and a-preaches, but to half an empty court, uh-huh and the signs are passin', grip the wheel, cannot read it sacrifice receiving the smell that is on my hands, hands, yeah and i listen for the voice inside my head nothing, i will do this one myself lay her down as priest does, should the lord be a-countin' will be in my honor, make it pain-, painfully quick, uh-huh promises are whispered in the age of darkness want to be enlightened like i want to be told the end, yeah, yeah and the barrel shakes aimed, oh, directly at my head oh, help me, help me from myself and i listen from both sides of a friend oh, nothing, i will do this one myself and the barrel waits, trigger shakes, aimed right at my head state of love and a trust and a state of love and state of love and a trust

i felt the earth on monday it moved beneath my feet in the form of a morning paper laid out for me to see saw his face in a corner picture i recognized the name could not stop staring at the face i would never see again it is a shame to awake in a world of pain what does it mean when a war has taken over? it is the same every day i heard my name what can be saved and who will be left to hold her? the whole world world over it is a world wide suicide medals on a wooden mantle next to a handsome face that the president took for granted writing checks the whole world pays and in all the madness thought becomes numb and naive too much to talk about and nothing for to say it is the same every day and the wave will not break tell you to pray while the devil's on his shoulder laying claim to the take that our soldiers save does not equate, and the truth's already out there looking in the eyes of the fallen you have got to know there is another another, another, another, another way what does it mean when the war has taken over it is the same every day and the wave will not break tell you to pray while the devil's on his shoulder

one, two, three, four what the fuck is this world running to, you did not leave a message, at least i could have heard your voice one last time daily minefield, this could be my time by you would you hit me? oh oh, ow all the bills go by, and initiatives are taken up by the middle there are not going to be any middle any more and the cross i am bearing home are not indicative of my place left the porch left the porch, oh, oh hear my name take a good look this could be the day hold my hand lie beside me i just need to say walk beside me i could not take uh, just one day i know that i would not ever touch you, hold you, feel you in my arms ever again yeah mmmh

superblood wolfmoon took her away too soon i can hear you singin' in the distance i can see you when i close my eyes once you were somewhere and now you are everywhere i am feeling selfish and i want what is right i ask for forgiveness i beg of myself feeling every night that i see right now i feel a lack of innocence searchin' for reveal hypnotonic residence i feel not much of anything and the because is life or death a life of hopelessness, focus on you focusness i have been hopin' and i hope that lasts i do not know anything, i question everything this life i love is going way too fast both my eyes are swollen, my face is broken and i am hope that i hurt you hope that i hurt you she was a stunner and i am stunned and the first thought or second thought "could be the one" i was a prisoner of keys and the cuffs yeah, i was feeling fortunate to be locked up but the world got to spinnin' always felt like it was endin' and love right, it was standin' we are each of us feelin' angry now, get off the stage focus on you focusness, turn around for hopelessness i have been hopin' and all hope was lost

drowning in their dissertations random speakers in my mind yeah, they never stop their fortifications and blocking my precious time you used to let it go and let it float away you do not get to speak with twice as much to say it is all delivery i said the messenger who is now dead was all on the periphery i did not see him but i heard what he said aw, sideways talk, poisoning our thoughts everyone walks and it is no one's fault whoever said it is all been said gave up on satisfaction home is where the broken heart is every scar is blinking stars, beneath you roam room to tomb and cradle to grave all the answers will be found in the mistakes that we have made one bad ear and one eye blind it takes a village but do not take mine living forwards in a backwards town i feed  them drinks just to watch  them drown swallow my pencil and bleed out my pen surrender the wish, we will be together again but i will not give up no, i will not give up on satisfaction satisfaction pull myself aside on a sleepless night sadness blurs, i am in need of a light out of balance, balance, balance this time i am feeling fading, calling as i am falling out of sight as the silence gets louder, my heart gets pounding and ventricles pumping, working overtime our freedom's fraught with danger being circumscribed a life cut short and circumcised a rubble of commandments from the road, step aside a rubble of commandments in the road, step aside

i admit it what is to say i will relive it without pain backstreet lover on the side of the road i got a bomb in my temple that is going to explode i got a sixteen gauge buried under my clothes, i pray once upon a time i could control myself ooh, once upon a time i could lose myself, yeah oh, try and mimic what is insane i am in it where do i stand? indian summer and i hate the heat i got a backstreet lover on the passenger seat i got my hand in my pocket, so determined, discreet i pray you think i got my eyes closed but i am looking at you the whole fucking time i could love myself, yeah i could love you, yeah, yeah, yeah once yeah. once, once. yeah yeah yeah. yeah, yeah. yeah, yeah. oww

everyone's a critic looking back up the river every boat is leaking in this town everybody is thinking they can all be delivered sitting in a box like lost and found but i found my place and it is all right we are all searching for a better way get this off my plate it is all right, i got my own way to believe find a lighthouse in the dark stormy weather we all could use a sedative right now holy rollers sitting with their backs to the middle all alone and sinking the bow and if you want to have to pray, it is all right we all be thinking with our different brain get this off my plate it is all right, i got my own way to believe, it is okay sometimes you find yourself having to put all your faith in no faith mine is mine and yours will not take its place now, make your getaway science says we are making love like the lizards try and say that fossils are not profound silence says we are not allowed to consider silence says stand up sit down you are out but i found my place and it is all right, i am bearing witness to some better things, get this off my plate it is all right, i have got my own way to believe it is okay, sometimes you find yourself being told to change your ways there is no way, mine is mine and yours will not take its place, now make your getaway it is okay, sometimes you find yourself having to put all your faith in no faith now make your getaway, it is okay sometimes you find yourself being told to change your ways for god's sake, mine is mine and yours will not take its place

hey hey in my rearview mirror my life is gettin' clearer the sunset sighs and slowly disappears these trinkets once were treasure life changes like the weather you grow up, grow old or you hit the road round here so i drive watchin' white lines passin by with my plastic dashboard jesus waitin' there to greet us i have finally found my way say goodbye to yesterday hit the gas, there are not no brakes on this lost highway hell, i busted loose, i am lettin' go out on this open road it is independence day do not know where i am going but i know where i have been i am afraid of going back again years and miles are flyin' by and waitin' there to greet us is my plastic dashboard jesus oh patron saint of lonely souls tell this boy which way to go guide the car, you got the keys farewell to mediocrity kickin' off the cruise control and turnin' up the radio got just enough religion and a half a tank of gas come on let us go i am busted loose, i am lettin' go when i am out on this open road
