(whoa, oh, oh)

song: Unbroken ft The Invictus Games Choir
lyrics: i was born to be of service basic training felt like home i had honor, i found purpose sir, yes, sir that is what i know they sent us to a place i never heard of weeks before when you are nineteen, it are not hard to sleep in the desert on god's floor close your eyes, stop counting sheep you are not in basic anymore we were taught to shoot our rifles then in one, then side-by-side thought we would be made as liberators in a thousand year old fight i got this painful ringing in my ear from an i.e.d. last night but no lead light humvee war machine, could save my sargeants life three more soldiers, six civilians need these words to come out right god of mercy, god of light save your children from this life here these words, this humble plea for i have seen the suffering and with this prayer i am hoping that we, can be unbroken it is 18 months that i have been back now with this medal on my chest but there are things i can not remember and there are things i will not forget i lie awake at night with dreams of devils should not see i want to scream, but i can not breathe and christ, i am sweating through these sheets where is my brothers? where is my country? where is my how things used to be? my service dogs done more for me than the medication would there are not no angel that is coming to save me but even if they could today, 22, would die from suicide just like yesterday, they are gone i live my life for each tomorrow so their memories will live on once we were boys, and we were strangers now we are brothers and we are men someday you will ask me, was it worth it to be of service in the end? well the blessing and the curses, yeah i would do it all again whoa...

song: Someday I ll Be Saturday Night
lyrics: hey, man i am alive i am takin' each day and night at a time i am feelin' like a monday but someday i will be saturday night hey, my name is jim where did i go wrong my life's a bargain basement all the good shit's gone i just can not hold a job where do i belong i am sleeping in my car my dreams move on my name is billy jean my love was bought and sold i am only sixteen i feel a hundred years old my foster daddy went took my innocence away the street life are not much better but at least i get paid and tuesday just might go my way it can not get worse than yesterday thursdays, fridays are not been kind but somehow i will survive yeah, i am down but i know i will get by hey-hey-hey-hey, man i am got to live my life like i are not got nothing but this roll of the dice now i can not say my name and tell you where i am i want to blow myself away do not know if i can i wish that i could be in some other time and place with someone else's soul someone else's face oh, tuesday just might go my way i am going to pick up all the pieces and what is left of my pride saturday night here we go some day i will be saturday night i will be back on my feet i will be doing alright it may not be tomorrow baby, that is ok i are not going down going to find a way hey-hey-hey o-o-oh

this are not a song for the broken-hearted no silent prayer for faith-departed and i are not going to be just a face in the crowd you are going to hear my voice when i shout it out loud it is my life it is now or never but i are not going to live forever i just want to live while i am alive (it is my life) my heart is like an open highway like frankie said, "i did it my way" yeah, this is for the ones who stood their ground for tommy and gina, who never backed down tomorrow's getting harder, make no mistake luck are not even lucky, got to make your own breaks and it is now or never i are not going to live forever because it is my life better stand tall when they are calling you out do not bend, do not break, baby, do not back down because i are not going to live forever

if you could see inside my heart then you would understand i would never mean to hurt you baby, i am not that kind of man i might not say i am sorry yeah, i might talk tough sometimes and i might forget the little things or keep you hanging on the line in a world that do not know romeo and juliet boy meets girl and promises we can not forget we are cast from eden's gate with no regrets into the fire we cry i would die for you i would cry for you i would do anything i would lie for you you know it is true baby, i would die for you if it came right down to me and you baby i would die for you i might not be a savior and i will never be a king i might not send you roses or buy you diamond rings but if i could see inside you maybe i would know just who we are because our love is like a hunger without it we would starve baby, it is only for you it is only for you

hey god, i am just a little man; i got a wife and family but i almost lost the house; i bought into the dream we are barely holdin' on, when i am in way too deep we are two paychecks away from living out on the streets she is a workin' single mom; like a saint she do not complain she never says a word but she thinks that she is to blame her son just got convicted; he blew some cop away she did her best to raise him, but the world got in the way hey god tell me what the hell is going on it seems like all the good shit's gone it keeps on getting harder hanging on hey, hey, hey, hey god there is nights you know i want to scream these days you have even harder to believe i know how busy you must be but hey, hey, hey do you ever think about me born into the ghetto in 1991 just a happy child playing beneath the summer sun a vacant lot's his playground, by 12 he is got a gun the odds are bet against him, junior do not make 21 tell me, what the hell is going on i know how busy you must be, but hey, hey, hey, hey god i would get down on my knees i am going to try this thing your way i have seen a dying man too proud to beg spit on his own grave was he too gone to save did you even know his name are you the one to blame ha, i got something to say well, hey god, hey god think about me god, hey god, hey god

song: This Ain t a Love Song
lyrics: should have seen it coming when the roses died should have seen the end of summer in your eyes should have listened, when you said goodnight you really meant goodbye baby are not it funny how we never ever learnt to fall? you are really on your knees you think you are standing tall but only fools, are know-it-alls and i played that fool for you i cried and i cried there were nights that i died for you baby i tried and i tried to deny love drove me crazy, baby if the love that i have got for you's gone if the river i cried are not that long then i am wrong, yeah i am wrong this are not a love song baby i thought you and me would stand the test of time like we got away with the perfect crime but we were just a legend in my mind i guess that i was blind remember those nights dancing at the masquerade clowns wore smiles, that would not fade you and i were the renegades, some things, never change it made me so mad because i wanted it bad for us baby and now it is so sad that whatever we had are not worth saving oh-ooh, oh-oooh if the love that i got for you's gone and if the river i have cried are not that long if the pain that i am feeling's so strong is the reason, i am holding on oooh-oh i tried and i tried to deny your love drove me crazy, baby then i am wrong yeah i am wrong

i was walking around, just a face in the crowd trying to keep myself out of the rain saw a vagabond king wear a styrofoam crown wondered if i might end up the same there is a man out on the corner singing old songs about change everybody's got their cross to bear, these days she came looking for some shelter with a suitcase full of dreams to a motel room on the boulevard i guess she is trying to be james dean she is seen all the disciples and all the want to be's no one wants to be themselves these days still there is nothing to hold on to but these days these days the stars seem out of reach these days there are not a ladder on the streets oh no, no, no these days are fast, nothing lasts in this graceless age there are not nobody left but us these days jimmy shoes busted both his legs, trying to learn to fly from a second story window, he just jumped and closed his eyes his momma said he was crazy, he said "momma, i have got to try do not you know that all my heroes died and i guess, i would rather die than fa, fa, fade away, yeah" these days the stars are not out of reach, yeah but these days there are not a ladder on the streets these days are fast, love do not lasts in this graceless age even innocence has caught the midnight train and there are not nobody left but us these days i know rome's still burning though the times have changed this world kept turning round, and round, and round, and round these days these days the stars seem out of reach, yeah but these days there are not a ladder on these streets these days are fast, nothing lasts there are not no time to waste there are not nobody left to take the blame are not nobody left but us these days

song: We Weren t Born to Follow
lyrics: this one goes out to the man who mines for miracles this one goes out to the ones in need this one goes out to the sinner and the cynical this are not about no apology this road was paved by the hopeless and the hungry this road was paved by the winds of change walking beside the guilty and the innocent how will you raise your hand when they call your name? yeah, yeah, yeah we were not born to follow come on and get up off your knees when life is a bitter pill to swallow you got to hold on to what you believe believe that the sun will shine tomorrow and that your saints and sinners bleed you got to stand up for what you believe let me hear you say yeah, yeah, yeah, oh yeah this one's about anyone who does it differently this one's about the one who cusses and spits this are not about our livin' in a fantasy this are not about givin' up or givin' in we were not born to follow, oh yeah (yeah, yeah, yeah, oh yeah)

this romeo is bleeding but you can not see his blood it is nothing but some feelings that this old dog kicked up it is been raining since you left me now i am drowning in the flood you see, i have always been a fighter but without you, i give up i can not sing a love song like the way it is meant to be well, i guess i am not that good anymore but baby, that is just me and i will love you, baby, always and i will be there forever and a day, always i will be there 'til the stars do not shine 'til the heavens burst and the words do not rhyme and i know when i die, you will be on my mind and i will love you, always now your pictures that you left behind are just memories of a different life some that made us laugh, some that made us cry one that made you have to say goodbye what i would give to run my fingers through your hair to touch your lips, to hold you near when you say your prayers, try to understand i have made mistakes, i am just a man when he holds you close, when he pulls you near when he says the words you have been needing to hear i wish i was him with these words of mine to say to you 'til the end of time that i will love you baby, always if you told me to cry for you, i could if you told me to die for you, i would take a look at my face there is no price i will not pay to say these words to you well, there are not no luck in these loaded dice but baby if you give me just one more try we can pack up our old dreams and our old lives we will find a place where the sun still shines i know when i die, you will be on my mind always, always

come see a living, breathing spectacle only seen right here it is your last chance in this lifetime the line forms to the rear you will not believe your eyes your eyes will not believe you are ears get your money out, get ready step right up, yeah you, come here you are not seen nothing like him he is the last one of the breed better hold on to your honey honeys, do not forget to breathe enter at your own risk, mister it might change the way you think there is no dancers, there is no diamonds no this boy he do not lip-synch here's the last man standing step right up, he is the real thing the last chance of a lifetime come and see, hear, feel ... the real thing see those real live calloused fingers wrapped around those guitar strings kiss the lips where hurt has lingered it breaks the heart to hear him sing the songs were more than music they were pictures from the soul so keep your pseudo-punk, hip-hop, pop-rock junk and your digital downloads take your seats now, folks. it is showtime hey, patrick - hit the lights there is something in the air there is magic in the night now here's the band, they really play i will count the first one in i do not know where it is going well all know where it is been the last man standing come see, hear, feel... the real thing.

wake up, everybody wake up here we go, it is just another day another buzz, another beep scrub your face and brush your teeth out the door, into the street i fell out of my sleep a million different faces, all from different places swimming in the sea tryna keep your head above water on a night like this one prayer, one wish step out off the edge, it is worth the risk life is limitless, limitless limitless, limitless morning comes, you will do it all again you know the song, it is on repeat found your shoes, can not find your feet grab your wallet and your keys better not forget to breath sweat until you are soaking do not let them see you choking a teardrop in the sea you are tryna keep your head above water limitless left to figure out, what it is all about when the sun comes up and the sun goes down is there something more than it was before? there is an open door, what are you waitin' for? step out on the edge, it is worth the risk one touch, one kiss

i do not need no license to sign on no line and i do not need no preacher to tell me you are mine i do not need no diamonds i do not need no new bride i just need you, baby to look me in the eyes i know they have a hard time and your daddy do not approve but i do not need your daddy telling us what we should do now there is a million questions i could ask about our lives but i only need one answer to get me through the night so i say baby, can you tell me just where we fit in i call it love they call it living in sin is it you and me or just this world we live in i say we are living on love they say we are living in sin is it right for both our parents who fight it out most nights then pray for god's forgiveness when they both turn out the lights or wear that ring of diamonds when your heart is made of stone you can talk but still say nothing you stay together but alone or is it right to hold you and kiss your lips goodnight they say the promise is forever if you sign it on the dotted line baby, can you tell me just where we fit in we are living on love they say we are living in sin i do not know just where we fit in sometimes it scares me i do not know where to begin i do not know where we fit in living in sin

rumor has it that your daddy's coming down he is going to, pay the rent tell me baby, is this as good as this life is, going to get it feels like there is a stranger, whose standing in these shoes but i know i can not lose me, because then i would be losing you yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah i know i promised baby i would be the one who would make our, dreams come true i are not too proud of all the struggles and the hard times we have been through when this cold world comes between us please tell me you will be brave because i can not realize the danger when forgiveness fades away if you do not love me lie to me because baby you are the one thing i believe let it all fall down around us if that is what is meant to be right now if you do not love me baby lie to me pour another cup of coffee babe, i got something to say to you i are not got the winning ticket not the one that is going to pull us through no one said that it would be easy let your old man take you home but know that if you walk out on me, that darling i would be gone if you do not love me right now if you can not love me baby baby i can take it it is a bitch, yeah, life's a roller coaster ride the ups and downs will make you scream sometimes it is hard believing that the thrill is gone but we got to go around again so let us hold on because baby you are the one thing that i believe let it all fall down around us if that is what is meant to be right now if you can not love me baby, lie to me yeah, yeah go on, lie to me yeah, yeah, yeah come on, lie to me go on and lie to me go on lie to me yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah yeah tell me everything's going to be alright come on and get me through the night

song: You Give Love a Bad Name
lyrics: shot through the heart and you are to blame darlin', you give love a bad name an angel's smile is what you sell you promised me heaven, then put me through hell chains of love got a hold on me when passion's a prison, you can not break free whoa, oh, oh you are a loaded gun there is nowhere to run no one can save me, the damage is done you give love a bad name (bad name) i play my part and you play your game hey, you give love a bad name paint your smile on your lips blood red nails on your fingertips a schoolboy's dream, you act so shy your very first kiss was your first kiss goodbye no one can save me the damage is done you give love, oh you give love a bad name you give love bad name

if you were born again tomorrow! this are not a test, that is what you wanted are not going to say the sky is falling you got to read between the lines stop waiting for a sign who is going to live your life? yeah, you do not have to look back to see where we are the future's looking brighter than a handful of stars you got to hold on, hold on, be strong! if you were born again tomorrow, would you live your life like yesterday? i would not live my life any other way! do not have to end up whee you started heaven loves the brokenhearted you learn from your mistakes bones grow stronger where they break who said the scars do not fade? you got to hold on, hold on, you got to be strong would you relive every moment? would you tear out any page? i would not live my life any other way any other way, hey, hey, any other way, hey, hey any other way (born again tomorrow) if you were born again tomorrow

why you want to tell me how to live my life? and who are you to tell me if it is black or white? mama, can you hear me? try to understand is innocence the difference between a boy and a man? my daddy lived a lie, it is just the price that he paid sacrificed his life, just slavin' away ooh, if there is one thing i hang onto that gets me through the night i are not going to do what i do not want to i am going to live my life shining like a diamond, rolling with the dice standing on the ledge, i show the wind how to fly when the world gets in my face i say, have a nice day have a nice day take a look around you, nothing's what it seems we are living in the broken home of hopes and dreams let me be the first to shake a helping hand anybody brave enough to take a stand i knocked on every door down every dead end street looking for forgiveness and what is left to believe? oh, oh, if there is one thing i hang onto have a nice day, have a nice day when the world keeps trying to drag me down got to raise my hands, going to stand my ground i say, hey, have a nice day

looking at the pages of my life faded memories of me and you mistakes you know i have made a few i took some shots and fell from time to time baby, you were there to pull me through we have been around that block a time or two i am going to lay it on the line ask me how we have come this far the answer's written in my eyes every time i look at you baby, i see something new that takes me higher than before and makes me want you more i do not want to sleep tonight dreamin's just a waste of time when i look at what my life's been comin' to i am all about loving you i have lived, i have loved, i have lost, i have paid some dues baby, we have been to hell and back again through it all you are always my best friend for all the words i did not say and all the things i did not do tonight i am going to find a way you can take this world away you are everything i am just read the lines upon my face i am all about all about loving you

shot through the heart it is all part of the game that we call love would you be content to see me crying after all those little games you put me through after all i have done for you you are lying would not it be nice to tell the truth did not somebody somewhere say you are going to take a fall i gave you everything now here's the curtain call and i am shot through the heart as i lay there alone in the dark through the heart now you have come back here to say you are sorry i just do not know who you are talking to it could be the man i used to be, girl but i have grown up and now i am over you standing there just a live wire with nowhere left to turn you were going to set the world on fire but you never learned? and i am shot... baby does what baby please and baby must have what she sees but not this time, the tables turned baby, you just got burned

sitting here wasted and wounded at this old piano trying hard to capture the moment this morning i do not know because a bottle of vodka's still lodged in my head and some blonde gave me nightmares think that she is still in my bed as i dream about movies they will not make of me when i am dead with an ironclad fist i wake up and french kiss the morning while some marching band keeps its own beat in my head while we are talking about all of the things that i long to believe about love, the truth, what you mean to me and the truth is baby you are all that i need i want to lay you down in a bed of roses for tonight i will sleep on a bed of nails oh i want to be just as close as the holy ghost is and lay you down on a bed of roses well i am so far away each step that i take is on my way home a king's ransom in dimes, i would give each night to see through this payphone still i run out of time or it is hard to get through till the bird on the wire flies me back to you i will just close my eyes and whisper "baby, blind love is true" well this hotel bar's hangover whiskey's gone dry the barkeeper's wig's crooked and she is giving me the eye well i might have said yeah but i laughed so hard i think i died ooh yeah now as you close your eyes know i will be thinking about you while my mistress she calls me to stand in her spotlight again tonight i will not be alone but you know that do not mean i am not lonely i have got nothing to prove for it is you that i would die to defend i want to be just as close as the holy ghost is and lay you down on a bed of roses

song: You Want to Make a Memory
lyrics: hello again, it is you and me kinda always like it used to be sippin' wine, killing time trying to solve life's mysteries how is your life, it is been a while god, it is good to see you smile i see you reaching for your keys looking for a reason not to leave if you do not know if you should stay if you do not say what is on your mind baby just breathe, there is nowhere else tonight we should be you want to make a memory? i dug up this old photograph look at all that hair we had it is bittersweet to hear you laugh your phone is ringing, i do not want to ask if you go now, i will understand if you stay, hey, i have got a plan you want to steal a piece of time? you can sing the melody to me and i can write a couple of lines and you do not say what is on your mind baby just breathe, there is nowhere else tonight we should be (we should be) we should be

it is hard for me to say the things i want to say sometimes there is no one here but you and me and that broken old street light lock the doors we will leave the world outside all i have got to give to you are these five words tonight thank you for loving me for being my eyes when i could not see for parting my lips when i could not breathe i never knew i had a dream until that dream was you when i look into your eyes the sky's a different blue cross my heart i wear no disguise and if i tried, you would make believe that you believed my lies you pick me up when i fall down you ring the bell before they count me out if i was drowning you would part the sea and risk your own life to rescue me yeah yeah yeah yeah leave the world outside when i could not fly oh, you gave me wings you parted my lips oh, for loving me

you want commitment take a look into these eyes they burn with fire, yeah until the end of time and i would do anything i would beg, i would steal, i would die to have you in these arms tonight baby, i want you like the roses it want the rain you know i need you like the poet needs the pain and i would give anything my blood, my love, my life if you were in these arms tonight i would hold you, i would need you i would get down on my knees for you and make everything all right if you were in these arms i would love you, i would please you i would tell you that i would never leave you and love you 'til the end of time if you were in these arms tonight, oh yeah we stared at the sun and we made a promise a promise this world would never blind us and these were our words our words were our songs our songs are our prayers, these prayers keep me strong and i still believe your clothes are still scattered all over our room this whole place still smells like your cheap perfume everything here reminds me of you there is nothing i would not do they keep me strong, baby if you were in these arms, baby like the roses need the rain like the seasons need to change like the poets need the pain i need you in these arms tonight

it is all the same only the names will change everyday it seems we are wasting away another place where the faces are so cold i drive all night just to get back home i am a cowboy on a steel horse i ride i am wanted dead or alive wanted sometimes i sleep sometimes it is not for days the people i meet always go their seperate ways sometimes you tell the day by the bottle that you drink and times when you are alone all you do is think i am wanted (wanted) wanted (wanted) oh, i ride i walk these streets a loaded six-string on my back i play for keeps because i might not make it back i been everywhere, oh yeah still i am standing tall i have seen a million faces and i have rocked them all because i am a cowboy but i am a cowboy i got the night on my side and i am wanted (wanted) dead or alive and i ride (and i ride), dead or alive i still drive (still drive), dead or alive

rainy night and we worked all day we both got jobs because there is bills to pay we got something they can not take away our love, our lives close the door, leave the cold outside i do not need nothing when i am by your side we got something that'll never die our dreams, our pride my heart beats like a drum (all night) flesh to flesh, one to one (and it is alright) and i will never let go because there is something i know deep inside you were born to be my baby and baby, i was made to be your man we got something to believe in even if we do not know where we stand only god would know the reasons but i bet he must have had a plan because you were born to be my baby light a candle, blow the world away table for two on a tv tray it are not fancy, baby that is ok our time, our way so hold me close better hang on tight buckle up, baby, it is a bumpy ride we are two kids hitching down the road of life our world, our fight if we stand side by side (all night) there is a chance we will get by (and it is alright) and i will know that you will be live in my heart till the day that i die and my heart beats like a drum (all night) baby you were born to be my baby

once upon a time not so long ago tommy used to work on the docks union's been on strike he is down on his luck, it is tough so tough gina works at diner all day working for her man she brings home her pay for love for love she says: we have got to hold on to what we have got it does not make a difference if we make it or not we have got each other and that is a lot for love we will give it a shot wooah we are half way there woah-oh living on a prayer take my hand and we will make it, i swear tommy got his six string in hock now he is holding in what he used to make it talk, so tough it is tough gina dreams of running away when she cries in the night, tommy whispers baby it is okay someday we have got to hold on to what we have got take my hand, we will make it, i swear living on a prayer! we have got to hold on ready or not you live for the fight when it is all that you have got

should i? could i? have said the wrong things right a thousand times if i could just rewind, i see it in my mind if i could turn back time, you would still be mine you cried, i died i should have shut my mouth, things headed south, and as the words slipped off my tongue, they sounded dumb if this old heart could talk, it would say you are the one i am wasting time when i think about it i should have drove all night would have run all the lights i was misunderstood i stumbled like my words did the best i could damn misunderstood could i? should i? apologize for sleeping on the couch that night staying out too late with all of my friends you found me passed out in the yard again you cried, i tried to stretch the truth, but did not lie it is not so bad you think about it misunderstood, intentions good it is you and i just think about it i am hanging outside your door i have been here before, misunderstood

oooh yeah! you - you got a nasty reputation we are in a sticky situation it is down to me and you so tell me - is it true? they say there are not nobody better well now that we are together show me what you can do you are under the gun out on the run going to set the night on fire under the gun and playin' to win raise your hands when you want to let it go when you want to let a feeling show from new york to chicago from new jersey to tokyo whoa-whoa, raise your hands... i - i have been out on the front line where you will go down if you waste time they will walk all over you but i - i are not here looking for surrender i will raise the flag if you will defend her it is up to you you have got to - whoa-whoa, raise your hands all right, let us go!... raise your haaaaaaaands... (raise your hands) detroit! vancouver! hey, london! salem, new jersey!

i wake up in the morning and i raise my weary head i have got an old coat for a pillow and the earth was last night's bed i do not know where i am going only god knows where i have been i am a devil on the road a six gun lover a candle in the wind when you are brought into this world they say you are born in sin well at least they gave me something i did not have to steal or have to win well they tell me that i am wanted yeah i am a wanted man i am colt in your stable i am what cain was to abel mister catch me if you can i am going down in a blaze of glory take me now but know the truth lord i never drew first but i drew first blood i am no ones son call me young gun you ask about my conscience and i offer you my soul you ask if i will grow to be a wise man well i ask if i will grow old you ask me if i known love and what it is like to sing songs in the rain well, i have seen love come and i have seen it shot down i have seen it die in vain shot down in a blaze of glory i am the devil's son each night i go to bed i pray the lord my soul to keep no i are not looking for forgiveness but before i am six foot deep lord, i got to ask a favor and i will hope you will understand because i have lived life to the fullest let this boy die like a man staring down the bullet let me make my final stand i am no one's son i am young gun young gun yeah yeahh

song: I ll Be There for You
lyrics: i guess this time you are really leaving i heard your suitcase say 'goodbye' well, as my broken heart lies bleeding you say true love, it is suicide you say you have cried a thousand rivers and now you are swimming for the shore you left me drowning in my tears and you will not save me anymore i pray to god you will give me one more chance, girl i will be there for you these five words, i swear to you when you breathe, i want to be the air for you i would live and i would die for you i would steal the sun from the sky for you words can not say what love can do i know you know we have had some good times now they have their own hiding place well, i can promise you tomorrow but i can not buy back yesterday and baby you know my hands are dirty but i wanted to be your valentine i will be the water when you get thirsty, baby when you get drunk i will be the wine, oh! these five words i swear to you when you breathe i want to be the air for you i was not there when you were happy and i was not there when you were down did not mean to miss your birthday, baby i wish i would seen you blow those candles out i will be there for steal the sun from the sky for you whoa-oh-oh whoa-oh-oh-oh

song: This House Is Not For Sale
lyrics: these four walls have got a story to tell (oh-oh, oh-oh) the door is off the hinges, there is no wishing them well outside the sky is coal black, the streets are on fire the picture windows cracked, and there is no where to run i know, i know, this house is not for sale i set each stone and i hammered each nail this house is not for sale where memories live and the dreams do not fail coming home, i am coming home drove a spike into the ground and i staked my claim standing on the dirt where they will dig my grave now what built these walls is in my veins no time for lookin' back, the wolf is at the door this heart, this soul, this house is not for sale where memories live and the dream do not fail this house was built on trust that is what it is, it always was no wrecking ball could knock it down this house was built on higher ground (this house is not for sale) (i am) coming home, i am coming home (this house is not, is not for sale)

i was born to be of service camp lejeune just felt like home i had honor, i found purpose sir, yes, sir that is what i know they sent us to a place i never heard of weeks before when you are nineteen, it are not hard to sleep in the desert on god's floor close your eyes, stop counting sheep you hear them bootcamp anymore we were taught to shoot our rifles then in one, then side by side thought we would be made as liberators in a thousand year old fight i got this painful ringing in my ear from an ied last night but no lead light humvee war machine, could save my sargeants life three more soldiers, six civilians need these words to come out right god of mercy, god of light seek your children from this life here these words, this humble plea for i have seen the suffering and with this prayer i am hoping that we, can be unbroken it is 18 months now, i have been stateside with this medal on my chest but there are things i can not remember and there are things i will not forget i lie awake at night with dreams of devils should not see i want to scream, but i can not breathe and christ, i am sweating through these sheets where is my brothers? where is my country? where is my how things used to be? my service dogs done more for me then the medication would there are not no angel that is coming to save me but even if they could today, 22, would die from suicide just like yesterday, they are gone i live my life for each tomorrow so their memories will live on once we were boys, and we were strangers now we are brothers and we are men someday you will ask me, was it worth it to be of service in the end? well, the blessing, and the curses, yeah, i would do it all again whoa-oh whoa-oh (whoa)

mother, mother, tell your children that their time has just begun i have suffered for my anger there are wars that can not be won father, father, please believe me i am laying down my guns i am broken like an arrow forgive me forgive your wayward son (everybody needs somebody to love) mother, mother (everybody needs somebody to hate) please believe me (everybody's bitching because they do not get enough) and it is hard to hold on when there is no one to lean on (faith!) you know you are going to live through the rain lord, we have got to keep the faith (faith!) do not you let your love turn to hate now we have got to keep the faith keep the faith tell me baby, when i hurt you do you keep it all inside? do you tell me all's forgiven and just hide behind your pride? yeah! (everybody needs somebody to love) mother, father (everybody needs somebody to hate) please do not leave me (everybody's bleeding because the times are tough) well it is hard to be strong when there is no one to dream on (faith!) do not you know it is never too late? right now we have got to keep the faith oh, we have got to keep the faith lord, we got to keep the faith ooh yeah, ooh yeah yeah yeah yeah! "i been walking in the footsteps of society's lies i do not like what i see anymore sometimes i wish i was blind sometimes i wait forever to stand out in the rain so no one sees me cryin' trying to wash away this pain" mother, father (everybody needs somebody to love) there is things i have done i can not erase (everybody needs somebody to hate) every night we fall from grace (everybody's bitching because they do not get enough) it is hard with the world in your face (everybody needs) trying to hold on, trying to hold on (everybody, keep the faith) lord, you have got to keep the faith (faith!) keep the faith try to hold on, trying to hold on, yeah everybody keep the faith yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah (everybody needs somebody to love) (faith!) (everybody needs somebody to hate) (faith!) (everybody needs somebody to love) (everybody needs) (everybody, keep the faith)

your love is like bad medicine bad medicine is what i need shake it up, just like bad medicine there are not no doctor that can cure my disease (bad medicine) i are not got a fever, got a permanent disease and it will take more than a doctor to prescribe a remedy i got lots of money but it is not what i need going to take more than a shot to get this poison out of me and i got all the symptoms, count  them one, two, three first you need (that is what you get for falling in love) then you bleed (you get a little but it is never enough) and when you are on your knees (that is what you get for falling in love) now this boy's addicted because your kiss is the drug bad medicine is what i need, whoa bad, bad medicine i do not need no needle to be giving me a thrill and i do not need no anesthesia or a nurse to bring a pill i got a dirty down addiction that does not leave a track i got a jones for your affection like a monkey on my back there are not no paramedic going to save this heart attack when you need (that is what you get for falling in love) so let us play doctor, baby, cure my disease is what i want it is what i need i need a respirator because i am running out of breath but you are an all night generator wrapped in stockings and a dress when you find your medicine you take what you can get because if there is something better, baby, well they have not found it yet your love, bad medicine your love's the potion that can cure my disease (that is what i want) i got to do it again wait a minute hold on i am not done one more time with feel! come on! i forgot help me out now! you have got the potion that can cure my disease your kiss was what i need

the world is cracked the sky is torn i am hanging in you are holding on i can not pretend that nothings changed living in the shadows of the love we made back... when we were beautiful before the world got small before we knew it all back... when we were innocent i wonder where it went let us go back and find it sha la la sha la la hey sha la la some dreams live some will die but the you and me is still alive now am i blessed? or am i cursed? because the way we are are not the way we were (solo) so much less meant so much more

they say that to be able to free your body you got to free your mind so come on check this out lay your hands on me, lay your hands on me, lay your hands on me come on! if you are ready, i am willing and able help me lay my cards out on the table you are mine and i am yours for the taking right now the rules we have made are meant for breaking what you get are not always what you see but satisfaction is guaranteed they say what you give is always what you need, whoa-whoa if you want me to lay my hands on you all you got to do is now listen up! i am a fighter, i am a poet, i am a preacher i have been to school, oh baby, i have been the teacher if you show me how to get up off the ground i can show you how to fly and never ever come back down everything you want is what i need your satisfaction is, um... guaranteed but the ride do not never ever come for free, no-oh-oh lay your hands on me, lay your hands on me, lay your hands on me, yeah now, now, now baby do not you know i only aim to please? what you got to do is (lay your hands on me), lay  them on me (lay your hands on me), come on, come on, come on (lay your hands on me), everybody's going to help me now (lay your hands on me), i can feel the people sing (lay your hands on me), i can feel my heart sing (lay your hands on me), if you want to lay them on, baby, come on now whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh, whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh, lay your hands on me (if you want me to) whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh (all you got to do), whoa-oh-oh-oh-oh, lay your hands on me and remember (lay your hands on me) well, move it on (lay your hands on me) oh, turn around now (lay your hands on me) lay, lay, lay, yeah (lay your hands on me) (lay your hands on me) lay your hands on me

i can still remember when i was just a kid when friends were friends forever and what you said was what you did well, it was me and danny and bobby we cut each other's hands and held tight to a promise only brothers understand but we were so young (so young) one for all and all for one (for one) just as sure as the river's going to run blood on blood one on one we would still be standing when all was said and done and i will be here for you till kingdom come well, bobby was our hero because he had a fake i.d. i got busted stealing cigarettes and he took the rap for me danny knew this white trash girl we each threw in a ten she took us to this cheap motel and turned us into men we were so young (so young) when all is said and done now bobby, he is an uptown lawyer danny, he is a medicin man and me, i am just the singer in a long haired rock'n'roll band through the years and miles between us it is been a long and lonely ride but if i got a call in the dead of the night i would be right by your side blood on blood, like blood on blood just like blood, blood on blood blood on blood, blood on blood just like blood, when all is said and done

you will take my life, but i will take yours too you will fire your musket, but i will run you through so when you are waiting for the next attack you would better stand, there is no turning back the bugle sounds, the charge begins but on this battlefield, no one wins the smell of acrid smoke and horses' breath as i plunge on into certain death the horse, he sweats with fear, we break to run the mighty roar of the russian guns and as we race towards the human wall the screams of pain as my comrades fall we hurdle bodies that lay on the ground and the russians fire another round we get so near, yet so far away we will not live to fight another day we get so close, near enough to fight when a russian gets me in his sights he pulls the trigger and i feel the blow a burst of rounds take my horse below and as i lay there gazing at the sky my body's numb and my throat is dry and as i lay forgotten and alone without a tear, i draw my parting groan

let me tell you a story to chill the bones out of things that i saw one night wandering in the everglades i would one drink but no more i was rambling, enjoying the bright moonlight gazing up at the stars not aware of a presence so near to me watching my every move feeling scared and i fell to my knees as something rushed me from the trees took me to an unholy place and that is where i fell from grace then they summoned me over to join in with them to the dance of the dead into the circle of fire i followed them into the middle i was led as if time had stopped still i was numb with fear but still i wanted to go and the blaze of the fire did no hurt upon me as i walked onto the coals and i felt i was in a trance and my spirit was lifted from me and if only someone had the chance to witness what happened to me and i danced and i pranced and i sang with them all had death in their eyes lifeless figures, they were undead all of them they had ascended from hell as i danced with the dead my free spirit was laughing and howling down at me below my undead body just danced the circle of dead until the time came to reunite us both my spirit came back down to me i did not know if i was alive or dead as the others all joined in with me by luck then a skirmish started and took the attention away from me when they took their gaze from me was the moment that i fled i ran like hell faster than the wind but behind i did not glance one thing that i did not dare was to look just straight ahead when you know that your time has come around you know you will be prepared for it say your last goodbyes to everyone drink and say a prayer for it when you are lying in your sleep, when you are lying in your bed and you wake from your dreams to go dancing with the dead to this day i guess i will never know just why they let me go but i will never go dancing no more 'til i dance with the dead

from the coast of gold, across the seven seas i am travelin' on, far and wide but now it seems, i am just a stranger to myself and all the things i sometimes do, it is not me but someone else i close my eyes and think of home another city goes by in the night, are not it funny how it is you never miss if til' it is gone away and my heart is lying there and will be til' my dying day so understand do not waste your time always searching for those wasted years face up, make your stand and realize you are living in the golden years too much time on my hands, i got you on my mind can not ease this pain, so easily, when you can not find the words to say it is hard to make it through another day and it makes me want to cry and throw my hands up to the sky face up, make this stand

you will take my life, but i will take yours too you will fire your musket, but i will run you through so when you are waiting for the next attack you would better stand, there is no turning back the bugle sounds, the charge begins but on this battlefield, no one wins the smell of acrid smoke and horses' breath as i plunge on into certain death, oh, oh the horse, he sweats with fear, we break to run the mighty roar of the russian guns and as we race towards the human wall the screams of pain as my comrades fall we hurdle bodies that lay on the ground and the russians fire another round we get so near, yet so far away we were meant to fight another day, oh, oh we get so close, near enough to fight when a russian gets me in his sights he pulls the trigger and i feel the blow a burst of rounds take my horse below and as i lay there gazing at the sky my body's numb and my throat is dry and as i lay forgotten and alone without a tear, i draw my parting groan, oh, oh

i am a man who walks alone and when i am walking a dark road at night or strolling through the park when the light begins to change i sometimes feel a little strange a little anxious when it is dark fear of the dark, fear of the dark i have a constant fear that something's always near i have a phobia that someone's always there have you run your fingers down the wall? and have you felt your neck skin crawl when you are searching for the light? sometimes when you are scared to take a look at the corner of the room you have sensed that something's watching you have you ever been alone at night thought you heard footsteps behind and turned around and no one's there? and as you quicken up your pace you find it hard to look again because you are sure there is someone there watching horror films the night before debating witches and folklores the unknown troubles on your mind maybe your mind is playing tricks you sense, and suddenly eyes fix on dancing shadows from behind when i am walking a dark road

kill for gain or shoot to maim but we do not need a reason the golden goose is on the loose and never out of season some blackened pride still burns inside this she will of bloody treason here's my gun for a barrel of fun for the love of living death the killer's breed or the demon's seed the glamour, the fortune, the pain go to war again, blood is freedom's stain but do not you pray for my soul anymore 2 minutes to midnight the hands that threaten doom to kill the unborn in the womb the blind men shout let the creatures out we will show the unbelievers the napalm screams of human flames of a prime time belsen feast... yeah! as the reasons for the carnage cut their meat and lick the gravy we oil the jaws of the war machine and feed it with our babies the body bags and little rags of children torn in two and the jellied brains of those who remain to put the finger right on you as the madmen play on words and make us all dance to their song to the tune of starving millions to make a better kind of gun midnight it is all night midnight... all night!

there goes the siren that warns of the air raid there comes the sound of the guns sending flak out for the scramble we have got to get airborne got to get up for the coming attack jump in the cockpit and start up the engines remove all the wheelblocks, there is no time to waste gathering speed as we head down the runway got to get airborne before it is too late running, scrambling, flying rolling, turning, diving, going in again rolling, turning, diving run live to fly fly to live do or die will not you run aces high move in to fire at the mainstream of bombers let off a sharp burst and then turn away roll over, spin 'round to come in behind them move to their blindsides and firing again bandits at 8 of the clock move in behind us ten me-109's out of the sun ascending and turning our spitfires to face them heading straight for them i press down my guns

white man came across the sea he brought us pain and misery he killed our tribes, he killed our creed he took our game for his own need we fought him hard, we fought him well out on the plains, we gave him hell but many came, too much for cree oh, will we ever be set free? riding through dust clouds and barren wastes galloping hard on the plains chasing the redskins back to their holes fighting them at their own game murder for freedom, a stab in the back women and children and cowards attack run to the hills run for your lives soldier blue in the barren wastes hunting and killing's a game raping the women and wasting the men the only good injuns are tame selling them whiskey and taking their gold enslaving the young and destroying the old

and if you are taking a walk through the garden of life what do you think you would expect you would see? just like a mirror reflecting the moves of your life and in the river reflections of me just for a second, a glimpse of my father i see and in a movement, he beckons to me and in a moment, the memories are all that remain and all the wounds are reopening again we are blood brothers and as you look all around at the world in dismay what do you see, do you think we have learned not if you are taking a look at the war-torn affray out in the streets where the babies are burned there are times when i feel i am afraid for the world there are times i am ashamed of us all when you are floating on all the emotion you feel and reflecting the good and the bad will we ever know what the answer to life really is? can you really tell me what life is? maybe all the things that you know that are precious to you could be swept away by fate's own hand when you think that we have used all our chances and the chance to make everything right keep on making the same old mistakes makes untipping the balance so easy when we are living our lives on the edge say a prayer on the book of the dead

song: The Number Of The Beast 2015 Remaster
lyrics: woe to you, oh earth and sea for the devil sends the beast with wrath because he knows the time is short let him who hath understanding reckon the number of the beast for it is a human number its number is six hundred and sixty six i left alone, my mind was blank i needed time to think to get the memories from my mind what did i see? can i believe that what i saw that night was real and not just fantasy? just what i saw, in my old dreams were they reflections of my warped mind staring back at me? because in my dreams it is always there the evil face that twists my mind and brings me to despair yeah! night was black, was no use holding back because i just had to see, was someone watching me? in the mist, dark figures move and twist was all this for real or just some kind of hell? six six six, the number of the beast hell and fire was spawned to be released torches blazed and sacred chants were praised as they start to cry, hands held to the sky in the night, the fires are burning bright the ritual has begun, satan's work is done sacrifice is going on tonight this can not go on, i must inform the law can this still be real, or just some crazy dream? but i feel drawn towards the chanting hordes seem to mesmerize, can not avoid their eyes six six six, the one for you and me i am coming back, i will return and i will possess your body and i will make you burn i have the fire, i have the force i have the power to make my evil take its course

if you are feelin' down depressed and lonely i know a place where we can go 22 acacia avenue meet a lady that i know, so if you are looking for a good time and you are prepared to pay the price fifteen quid is all she asks for, everybody's got their vice if you are waiting for a long time for the rest to do their piece you can tell her that you know me and you might even get it free so any time you are down the east end, do not you hesitate to go you can take my honest word for it she will teach you more than you can know charlotte can not you get out from all this madness? can not you see it only brings you sadness? when you entertain your men do not know the risk of getting disease some day when you are reach the age of forty i bet you will regret the days when you were laying nobody then will want to know you will not have any beautiful wares to show, any more 22, the avenue that is the place where we all go you will find it is warm inside the red light's burning bright tonight charlotte is not it time you stopped this mad life do not you ever think about the bad times why do you have to live this way? do you enjoy your lay or is it the pay? sometimes when your strolling down the avenue the way you walk it make men think of having you when you are walking down the street everybody stops and turns to stare at you beat her, mistreat her, do anything that you please bite her, excite her, make her get down on her knees abuse her, misuse her, she can take all that you have got caress her, molest her, she always does what you want? you are running away, do not you know what you are doing? can not you see it will lead you to ruin? charlotte you have taken your life and you have thrown it away you believe that because what you are earning? your life's good do not you know that it is hurting? all the people that love you do not cast them aside all the men that are constantly drooling it is no life for you stop all that screwing you are packing your bags, you are coming with me

as the sun breaks above the ground an old man stands on the hill as the ground warms to the first rays of light a birdsong shatters the still his eyes are ablaze see the madman in his gaze fly on your way, like an eagle fly as high as the sun on your way, like an eagle fly, touch the sun, yeah now the crowd breaks and a young boy appears looks the old man in the eye as he spreads his wings and shouts at the crowd in the name of god my father, i fly his eyes seem so glazed as he flies on the wings of a dream now he knows his father betrayed now his wings turn to ashes, to ashes his grave fly on your way like an eagle fly, touch the sun yeah, fly on your way like an eagle fly!

another time, another place a hollow universe in space i took a trip to see the sights i will be blacker than the night one way ticket, no return my shooting star so fast it burns on the edge that you can not see let us shoot the moon you and me i am not particular you see just a lonesome galaxy shadows in the stars we will not return humanity will not save us at the speed of light we slip into the night i will say a mass for you and wave shooting plasma from my grave event horizon lost in space running in a human race i do not know where, i do not know when but somehow back there time again i am on the edge that you can not see i am not particular at night a single particle of me you will not be tracking me by sight

maybe one day i will be an honest man up till now i am doing the best i can long roads, long days, of sunrise to sunset of sunrise to sunset dream on brothers, while you can dream on sisters, i hope you find the one all of our lives, covered up quickly by the tides of time spend your days full of emptiness spend your years full of loneliness wasting love, in a desperate caress rolling shadows of night sands are flowing and the lines are in your hand in your eyes i see the hunger and the desperate cry that tears the night

i was born into a scene of angriness and greed of dominance and persecution my mother was a queen my dad i have never seen i was never meant to be now i spend my time looking all around for a man that is nowhere to be found until i find him i am never going to stop searching i am going to find my man going to travel round because i am a wrathchild well i am a wrathchild yeh i am a wrathchild i am coming to get you oh, yeah yeah some say it should not matter are not nothing going to alter the course of my destination but i know i have got to find some serious peace of mind or i know i will just go crazy

hand of fate is moving and the finger points to you he knocks you to your feet and so what are you going to do your tongue has frozen now you have got something to say the piper at the gates of dawn is calling you his way you watch the world exploding every single night dancing in the sun a newborn in the light say goodbye to gravity and say goodbye to death hello to eternity and live for every breath your time will come the ferryman wants his money you are not going to give it back he can push his own boat as you set up off the track nothing you can contemplate will ever be the same every second is a new spark, sets the universe aflame brothers and their fathers joining hands and make a chain the shadow of the wicker man is rising up again

here is the soul of a man here in this place for the taking clothen in white stand in the light time to speak with the shaman again conjure the jester again black dog in the ruins is howling my name so here is the soul of a man when the world was virgin before the coming of man just a solemn witness the beginning of the end from a world of magma to a cold rock face the ascent of madness and the human race we are strange believers all of us there are stranger truths in molten rust we rise from slumber it calls our name recalls our number how bad we come reefing a sail on the edge of the world if eternity should fail waiting in line for the ending of time to god's illusion which i recall was our delusion before the fall the angels come and angels go but the lord of light shining below eternal blackness beyond the stars we think our wisdom will get that far at the master's table the table's bare no line of plenty devastation, despair waiting in line for the ending of your time waiting in line for the ending your time good day my name is necropolis i am formed of the dead i am the harvester of the soul and i suck the lives from my bed i own two sons, i gave them breath and i fill their living corpses with my bile what humanity i knew i have long forgotten for me, eternity is nothing but a short while

c'mon yeah i have been looking so long for you now you will not get away from my grasp you have been living so long in hiding in hiding behind that false mask and you know and i know that you are not got long now to last your looks and your feelings are just the remains of your past you are standing in the wings there you wait for the curtain to fall knowing the terror and holding you have on us all yeah, i know that you are going to scratch me and maim me and maul you know i am helpless from your mesmerizing cat call keep your distance, walk away do not take his bait do not you stray do not fade away watch your step, he is out to get you come what may from the narrow way i am running and hiding in my dreams you are always there you are the phantom of the opera you are the devil, you are just out to scare you damaged my mind and my soul it just floats through the air you haunt me, you taunt me you torture me back at your lair

i am waiting in my cold cell, when the bell begins to chime reflecting on my past life and it does not have much time because at 5 of the clock they take me to the gallows pole the sands of time for me are running low running low when the priest comes to read me the last rites i take a look through the bars at the last sights of a world that has gone very wrong for me can it be that there is some sort of an error hard to stop the surmounting terror is it really the end not some crazy dream? somebody please tell me that i am dreaming it is not easy to stop from screaming but words escape me when i try to speak tears they flow but why am i crying? after all i am not afraid of dying do not i believe that there never is an end? as the guards march me out to the courtyard someone calls from a cell "god be with you" if there is a god then why has he let me go? as i walk all my life drifts before me and though the end is near i am not sorry catch my soul because it is willing to fly away mark my words believe my soul lives on do not worry now that i have gone i have gone beyond to seek the truth when you know that your time is close at hand maybe then you will begin to understand life down there is just a strange illusion yeah, yeah, yeah hallowed be thy name

o god of earth and altar bow down and hear our cry our earthly rulers falter our people drift and die the walls of gold entomb us the swords of scorn divide take not thy thunder from us but take away our pride just a babe in a black abyss no reason for a place like this the walls are cold and souls cry out in pain an easy way for the blind to go a clever path for the fools who know the secret of the hangman the smile on his lips the light of the blind you will see the venom that tears my spine the eyes of the nile are opening, you will see she came to me with a serpents kiss as the eye of the sun rose on her lips moonlight catches silver tears i cry so we lay in a black embrace and the seed is sown in a holy place and i watched and i waited for the dawn go! bind us all together ablaze with hope and free no storm or heavy weather will rock the boat you will see the time has come to close your eyes and still the wind and rain for the one who will be king is the watcher in the ring it is you, oh it is you

wake alone in the hills with the wind in your face it feels good to be proud and be free and a race that is part of a clan and to live on highlands and the air that you breathe so pure and so clean when alone on the hills with the wind in your hair with a longing to feel just to be free is it right to believe in the need to be free it is a time when you die and without asking why can not you see what they do they are grinding us down they are taking our land that belongs to the clans not alone with a dream just a want to be free with a need to belong i am a clansman freedom it is a time wrought with fear it is a land wrought with change ancestors could hear what is happening now they would turn in their graves they would all be ashamed that the land of the free has written in chains and i know what i want when the timing is right then i will take what is mine i am the clansman and i swear to defend and we will fight to the end and i swear that i will never be taken alive and i know that we will stand and we will fight for our land and i swear that my bairns will be born free then i will take what i want no, no we can not let them take anymore no we can not let them take anymore we have the land of the free

is this the end of the beginning? or the beginning of the end? losing control or are you winning? is your life real or just pretend? reanimation of the sequence rewind the future to the past. to find the source of the solution; the system has to be recast. release your mind. fast forward to the secrets of your code. your life's on overload. delete or save the units that make you an entity that is your identity if you do not know which way to go you may be lost and confused a second chance your turn to lose regeneration of your cyber sonic soul. transforming time and space beyond control; rise up resist and be the master of your fate. do not look back live for today - tomorrow is too late. you do not want to be a robot ghost occupied inside a human host analyzed and cloned relentlessly synthesized until they set you free. alright-okay alright till they set you free... alright-okay till they set you freeeee!! i do not want to see you yeah, yeah, yeah

have you ever though about your soul can it be saved or perhaps you think that when you are dead you just stay in your grave is god just a thought within your head or is he a part of you? is christ just a name that you read in a book when you were at school? when you think about death do you lose your breath or do you keep your cool? would you like to see the pope on the end of a rope do you think he is a fool? well i have seen the truth, yes i have seen the light and i have changed my ways and i will be prepared when you are lonely and scared at the end of our days could it be you are afraid of what your friends might say if they knew you believe in god above? they should realize before they criticize that god is the only way to love is your mind so small that you have to fall in with the pack wherever they run will you still sneer when death is near and say they may as well worship the sun? i think it was true it was people like you that crucified christ i think it is sad the opinion you had was the only one voiced will you be so sure when your day is near, say you do not believe? you had the chance but you turned it down, now you can not retrieve perhaps you will think before you say that god is dead and gone open your eyes just realize that he is the one the only one who can save you now from all this sin and hate or will you still jeer at all you hear? yes! i think it is too late.

he is just a loner. he never says hello. a friend to no one. he is got no place to go. he do not look happy. he looks through furtive eyes. he are not got nothing. no one to sympathize. he hides himself away. his secrets not revealed. as life just passes by he keeps himself concealed. a solitary man. an enigmatic child. a riddle never solved. a prisoner exiled. i wonder if the loner can assimilate. a life less lived alone plays devil's advocate. has he ever tried to be happy? reached out from inside. someone on who he can depend. it is getting too late to recover. he will not stand a chance and into his own hell he will descend. do not descend. no understanding of things we already know. he has to live his life and just learn how to let go. communication's an impossibility. his own best friend but he is his own worst enemy. the secrets of his past locked deep inside his head. i wonder if he will be happy when he is dead. come on you!

i will be damned, here comes your ghost again but that is not unusual it is just that the moon is full and you decided to come and here i sit, hand on the telephone hearing the voice i would known a couple of light years ago heading straight for a fall but we both know what memories can bring they bring diamonds and rust yes we both know what memories can bring now i see you standing all around and snow in your hair now we are smiling out the window of the crummy hotel over washington square and then comes that white clouds, mingles and hangs in the air speaking strictly for me we both could have died then and there now you are telling me you are not nostalgic then give me another word for it you were so good with words and at keeping things paid because i need some of that vagueness now, it is all come back too clearly yes, i love you dearly and if you are offering me diamonds and rust i have already paid diamonds, diamonds and rust

i carry with me all the love that you give you brought me serenity, a reason to live our life is a journey that we took from the start we made all these memories together i can remember the first time that we met the feelings you gave to me, i will never forget i knew from that moment when our love first began we would last 'til the end of time, forever and though there were bad times we stood by each other and did what we had to get through you live in my heart when you are far away i see you in dreams where i hear you say "i am with you forever, in true love by light of the day and stars above." and when there were bad times we held on each other to face what we had to get through "look up to heaven and i will be there still guiding your heart, still saying our prayer."

what about sunrise? what about rain? what about all the things that you said we were to gain? what about killing fields? is there a time? that you said was yours and mine? did you ever stop to notice all the blood we have she would before? this crying earth, these weeping shores? ah-ah-ah-ah-ah ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh what have we done to the world? look what we have done what about all the peace that you pledge your only son? what about flowering fields? what about all the dreams all the children dead from war? i used to dream i used to glance beyond the stars now i do not know where we are although i know we have drifted far hey, what about yesterday? (what about us?) what about the seas? the heavens are falling down i can not even breathe what about apathy? i need you what about nature's worth? (ooh) it is our planet's womb what about animals? (what about it?) we have turned kingdoms to dust what about elephants? have we lost their trust what about crying whales? we are ravaging the seas what about forest trails? burnt despite our pleas what about the holy land? torn apart by creed what about the common man? can not we set him free what about children dying? can not you hear them cry? where did we go wrong? someone tell me why what about baby boy? what about the days? what about all their joy? what about the man? what about the crying man? what about abraham? what about death again? do we give a damn?

as i drove across on the highway my jeep began to rock i did not know what to do so i stopped and got out and looked down and noticed i have got a flat so i walked out, parked the car like sideways so i can find, what i can fix i looked around, there were no cars on the highway i felt a strange feeling. like a mist i walked down towards the end of the road and in the fog a woman appeared she said do not you worry my friend, i will take care take my hand, i will take you there woah-oh take me to a place without no name as she took me right through the fog i see a beautiful city appear where kids are playin' and people are laughin' and smiling and nothing to fear she said this is the place where no people have pain with love and happiness she turned around looked down at my eyes and started cryin' and grabbed my hand, you have got a friend (a place without no name) oh, lord, yeah oh she started likin' me kissin' me and huggin' me she did not really, really want me to leave she showed me places i have never seen and things i have never done this really looks like a lot of fun i seen the grass and the sky and the birds and the flowers surrounded by the trees this place is filled with love and happiness how in the world, could i want to leave? so then i went in my pocket took my wallet on out with my pictures of my family and girl this is the place that you choose to be with me when you thought you could be in another world oh-oh-oh-oh take me to a place without no name (no name) la-la-la-la-la-la la-la-la
