do you remember when we fell in love we were young and innocent then how it all began it just seemed like heaven, so why did it end? do you remember (i bet you remember) back in the fall (i bet you remember) we would be together all day long (i bet you remember) us holding hands (i bet you remember) in each other's eyes, we would stare (i bet you remember) tell me do you remember the time? when we first met, girl do you remember the time? (oh, i) do you remember how we used to talk? you know, we would stay on the phone at night 'til dawn do you remember all the things we said? like, "i love you so, i will never let you go" back in the spring? (i bet you remember) every morning, birds would sing (i bet you remember) those special times? (i bet you remember) they will just go on and on in the back of my mind those sweet memories will always be dear to me and girl no matter what was said i will never forget what we had now baby do you remember the time? (do you remember?) do you remember the time? (remember, my baby) do you remember the time? (because i remember) do you remember the time? (all in my mind, girl) remember the time (ooh!) remember the time do you remember, girl? on the phone, you and me 'til dawn, two or three what about us, girl? do you, do you, do you? remember the time (do you, do you?) in the park, on the beach you and me, in spain what about, what about ooh! in the park after dark, do you, do you, do you? remember the time (do you, do you) do you, did you? yeah, yeah, woo! remember the time, remember the time

i watch the snowflakes fall against my window pane and wonder if you are watchin' snowflakes too i take a walk downtown to where you used to meet me there is joy everywhere but all that is waiting there is just a little christmas tree (little christmas tree) lookin' sorta sad and lonely just like me no one seems to care (no one seems to care) they just went away and left it standing there all alone on christmas eve i hear the christmas bells (bum, bum, bum) the happy people singing the songs of good cheer that only brings me tears i sadly close my eyes and say a little prayer you will be waiting there for me i look, but all i see is just a little christmas tree (little christmas tree) this is the season of love (this is the season of love) but i am as sad as i can be (but i am as sad as can be) why did you have to leave me (why did you have to leave me) ooh, little christmas tree (little christmas tree)

we are takin' over we have the truth this is the mission to see it through do not point your finger not dangerous this is our planet you are one of us we are sendin' out a major love and this is our message to you (message to you) the planets are linin' up we are bringin' brighter days they are all in line waitin' for you can not you see you are just another part of me out from a nation i feel the truth the final message we will bring to you there is no danger to feel the truth so come again we need you bringin' brighter days so know the truth another part of me this is the truth baby

every night she walks right in my dreams since i met her from the start i am so proud i am the only one who is special in her heart the girl is mine the doggone girl is mine i know she is mine because the doggone girl is mine i do not understand the way you think saying that she is yours not mine sending roses and your silly dreams really just a waste of time because she is mine do not waste your time i love you more than he (take you anywhere) but i love you endlessly (loving we will share) so come and go with me to one town but we both cannot have her so it is one or the other and one day you will discover that she is my girl forever and ever do not build your hopes to be let down because i really feel it is time i know she will tell you i am the one for her because she said i blow her mind she is mine, she is mine no, no, no, she is mine the girl is mine, the girl is mine the girl is mine, yep she is mine michael, we are not going to fight about this, okay paul, i think i told you, i am a lover not a fighter i have heard it all before, michael, she told me that i am her forever-lover you know, do not you remember well, after loving me, she said she could not love another is that what she said? yes, she said it, you keep dreaming i do not believe it she is mine, mine, mine

i do not need no dreams when i am by your side every moment takes me to paradise darling, let me hold you warm you in my arms and melt your fears away show you all the magic that a perfect love can make i need you night and day so baby, be mine baby you got to be mine and girl i will give you all i got to give so baby, be my girl (all the time) and we can share this ecstasy as long as we believe in love i will not give you reason to change your mind i can not sit still, you thrill me, baby, be mine you are all the future that i desire girl, i need to hold you share my feelings in the heat of love's embrace show you all the passion burning in my heart today it is never going to fade you are everything this world could be the reason that i live, oh will not you stay with me until the morning sun i promise you now that the dawn will be different lady can not you see that heaven's just begun it is living here inside our hearts there'll be no more mountains for us to climb i can not be still you thrill me, baby, be mine this will be a love lasting for all time girl, you got to hold me we can touch the sky and light the darkest day hold me, only you and i can make sweet love this way there is no more i can say so baby, be mine (baby be mine) and girl i will give you all i got to give (say you are thinking of me) so baby, be my girl (all the time, show me how it should be, hold me tight) you are everything this world could be (every night) the reason that i live (it is alright) baby be my girl (tell me that you love me all the time) so baby, be mine, baby, be mine (show me how it should be, hold me tight) you are everything this world could be to me (every night, it is alright) c'mon, girl, c'mon girl (tell me that you love all the time, say you are thinking of me) so baby, be mine (show me how it should be, hold me tight) c'mon, girl, c'mon girl (tell me that you love me all the time) baby be mine (all the time) baby be my girl

i would be complex i would be cool they would say i played the ﬁeld before i found someone to commit to and that would be ok for me to do every conquest i had made would make me more of a boss to you i would be a fearless leader i would be an alpha type when everyone believes ya what is that like? i am so sick of running as fast i can wondering if i would get there quicker if i was a man and i am so sick of them coming at me again because if i was a man then i would be the man i would be the man they would say i hustled put in the work they would not shake their heads and question how much of this i deserve what i was wearing if i was rude could all be separated from my good ideas and power moves? and they would toast to me, oh let the players play i would be just like leo in saint-tropez what is it like to brag about raking in dollars and getting bitches and models and it is all good if you are bad and it is okay if you are mad if i was out ﬂashing my dollars i would be a bitch, not a baller they paint me out to be bad so it is okay that i am mad i am so sick of running as fast as i can wondering if i would get there quicker if i was a man (you know that) and i am so sick of them coming at me again (coming at me again) because if i was a man (if i was a man) then i would be the man (then i would be the man) i am so sick of running as fast as i can (as fast as i can) wondering if i would get there quicker if i was a man (hey) because if i was a man (if i was a man), then i would be the man i would be the man (oh) i would be the man (yeah) i would be the man (i would be the man)

i think he knows his footprints on the sidewalk lead to where i can not stop go there every night i think he knows his hands around a cold glass make me want to know that body like it is mine he got that boyish look that i like in a man i am an architect, i am drawing up the plans it is like i am 17 nobody understands no one understands he got my heartbeat skipping down 16th avenue i got that uhh, i mean want to see what is under that attitude like i want you, bless my soul and i are not got to tell him i think he knows when we get all alone i will make myself at home and he will want me to stay he would better lock it down or i will not stick around because good ones never wait (ha) he is so obsessed with me and boy, i understand boy, i understand he got my heartbeat (heartbeat) got that, oh, i mean (i mean) want to see what is under that attitude like and i are not got to tell him, i think he knows i want you, bless my lyrical smile, indigo eyes, hand on my thigh we could follow the sparks, i will drive "so where we going to go?" i whisper in the dark "where we going to go?" skipping down 16th avenue (baby) want to see what is under that attitude like (yeah) i want you, bless my (oh, baby) i want you, bless my soul (he got my heartbeat) i want you, bless my (skipping down 16th avenue, baby)

saying goodbye is death by a thousand cuts flashbacks waking me up i get drunk, but it is not enough because the morning comes and you are not my baby i look through the windows of this love even though we boarded them up chandelier's still flickering here because i can not pretend it is ok when it is not it is death by a thousand cuts i dress to kill my time i take the long way home i ask the traffic lights if it will be all right they say "i do not know" and what once was ours is no one's now i see you everywhere the only thing we share is this small town you said it was a great love one for the ages if the story's over why am i still writing pages? chandelier still flickering here because i can not pretend it is okay when it is not my heart, my hips, my body, my love trying to find a part of me that you did not touch gave up on me like i was a bad drug now i am searching for signs in a haunted club our songs, our films, united we stand our country, guess it was a lawless land quiet my fears with the touch of your hand paper cut stings from our paper thin plans my time, my wine, my spirit, my trust trying to find a part of me you did not take up gave you too much but it was not enough but i will be all right, it is just a thousand cuts i get drunk but it is not enough because you are not my baby no, it is not my body, my love my trust but it was not enough, it was not enough, no, no

it feels like a perfect night to dress up like hipsters and make fun of our exes ah-ah, ah-ah for breakfast at midnight to fall in love with strangers yeah, we are happy, free, confused and lonely at the same time it is miserable and magical, oh yeah tonight's the night when we forget about the deadlines it is time, oh-oh i do not know about you but i am feeling 22 everything will be alright if you keep me next to you you do not know about me but i will bet you want to we just keep dancing like we are 22, 22 it seems like one of those nights this place is too crowded too many cool kids (who is taylor swift anyway? ew) ah-ah, ah-ah we ditch the whole scene and end up dreamin' instead of sleeping, yeah we are happy, free, confused and lonely in the best way tonight's the night when we forget about the heartbreaks we just keep dancing like we are 22 (oh, oh, oh, oh) 22 22, 22 it feels like one of those nights we will not be sleeping you look like bad news i got to have you ooh, ooh, yeah, yeah everything will be alright if (ooh) we just keep dancing like we are 22 22 (dancing like) 22 (yeah, yeah) 22 (yeah, yeah, yeah)

nice to meet you, where you been? i could show you incredible things magic, madness, heaven, sin saw you there and i thought "oh, my god, look at that face!" you look like my next mistake love's a game, want to play? new money, suit and tie i can read you like a magazine are not it funny? rumors fly and i know you heard about me so hey, let us be friends i am dying to see how this one ends grab your passport and my hand i can make the bad guys good for a weekend so it is going to be forever or it is going to go down in flames you can tell me when it is over if the high was worth the pain got a long list of ex-lovers they will tell you i am insane because you know i love the players and you love the game because we are young and we are reckless we will take this way too far it will leave you breathless or with a nasty scar but i have got a blank space, baby and i will write your name cherry lips, crystal skies stolen kisses, pretty lies you are the king, baby, i am your queen find out what you want be that girl for a month wait, the worst is yet to come, oh no screaming, crying, perfect storms i can make all the tables turn rose garden filled with thorns keep you second guessing like "oh, my god, who is she?" i get drunk on jealousy but you will come back each time you leave because, darling, i am a nightmare dressed like a daydream boys only want love if it is torture do not say i did not say, i did not warn ya

the moon is high like your friends were the night that we first met went home and tried to stalk you on the internet now i have read all of the books beside your bed the wine is cold like the shoulder that i gave you in the street cat and mouse for a month or two or three now i wake up in the night and watch you breathe (ayy) kiss me once because you know i had a long night (oh) kiss me twice because it is going to be alright (uh) three times because i have waited my whole life (1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4) i like shiny things, but i would marry you with paper rings uh huh, that is right darling, you are the one i want, and i hate accidents, except when we went from friends to this paper rings and picture frames and dirty dreams oh, you are the one i want in the winter, in the icy outdoor pool when you jumped in first, i went in too i am with you, even if it makes me blue which takes me back to the color that we painted your brother's wall honey, without all the exes, fights, and flaws we would not be standing here so proud, so kiss you once because i know you had a long night (oh) kiss you twice because it is going to be alright (uh) three times because you waited your whole life (1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4) ah i hate accidents except when we went from friends to this i want to drive away with you i want your complications too i want your dreary mondays wrap your arms around me, baby boy uh huh you are the one i want ah-ah, darling, you are the one i want paper rings and picture frames and all my dreams you are the one i want, and you are the one i want, one i want paper rings

you know i adore you i am crazier for you than i was at 16 lost in a film scene waving homecoming queens marching band playing i am lost in the lights american glory faded before me now i am feeling hopeless ripped up my prom dress running through rose thorns i saw the scoreboard and ran for my life no cameras catch my pageant smile i counted days, i counted miles to see you there, to see you there it is been a long time coming, but it is you and me that is my whole world they whisper in the hallway, "she is a bad, bad girl" (okay) the whole school is rolling fake dice you play stupid games you win stupid prizes there is nothing like this miss americana and the heartbreak prince (okay) we are so sad, we paint the town blue voted most likely to run away with you my team is losing battered and bruising i see the high fives between the bad guys leave with my head hung you are the only one who seems to care american stories burning before me i am feeling helpless the damsels are depressed boys will be boys then where are the wise men? darling, i am scared no cameras catch my muffled cries and now the storm is coming, but and i do not want you to (go) i do not really want to (fight) because nobody's going to (win) i think you should come home i just think you should know and i will never let you (go) because i know this is a (fight) that someday we are going to (win) they whisper in the hallway, "she is a bad, bad girl" oh, i just thought you should know you should know there is nothing like this (like this) we are so sad, we paint the town blue (paint it blue) that one day we are going to (win) "she is a bad, bad girl"

we were crazy to think crazy to think that this could work remember how i said i would die for you? we were stupid to jump in the ocean separating us remember how i would fly to you? and i can not talk to you when you are like this staring out the window like i am not your favorite town i am new york city i still do it for you, babe they all warned us about times like this they say the road gets hard and you get lost when you are led by blind faith blind faith but we might just get away with it religion's in your lips even if it is a false god we would still worship we might just get away with it the altar is my hips we would still worship this love i know heaven's a thing i go there when you touch me honey hell is when i fight with you but we can patch it up good make confessions and we are begging for forgiveness got the wine for you and you can not talk to me when i am like this daring you to leave me just so i can try and scare you you are the west village you still do it for me, babe we would still worship this love, ah still worship this love

you are somebody that i do not know but you are taking shots at me like it is patrón and i am just like "damn, it is 7 am" say it in the street, that is a knock-out but you say it in a tweet, that is a cop-out and i am just like, "hey, are you ok?" and i are not trying mess with your self-expression but i have learned the lesson that stressin' and obsessin' 'bout somebody else is no fun and snakes and stones never broke my bones so oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh you need to calm down you are being too loud and i am just like oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh you need to just stop like, can you just not step on my gown? you need to calm down you are somebody that we do not know but you are coming at my friends like a missile why you mad? when you could be glaad? (you could be glaad) sunshine on the street at the parade but you would rather be in the dark ages making that sign, must have taken all night you just need to take several seats and then try to restore the peace and control your urges to scream about all the people you hate because shade never made anybody less gay so like, can you just not step on his gown? and we see you over there on the internet comparing all the girls who are killing it but we figured you out we all know now, we all got crowns you need to calm down (you need to calm down) you are being too loud (you are being too loud) you need to just stop (can you stop?) like can you just not step on our gowns?

you are on the phone with your girlfriend, she is upset she is going off about something that you said because she does not get your humor like i do i am in the room, it is a typical tuesday night i am listening to the kind of music she does not like and she will never know your story like i do but she wears short skirts i wear t-shirts she is cheer captain, and i am on the bleachers dreaming about the day when you wake up and find that what you are looking for has been here the whole time if you could see that i am the one who understands you been here all along so, why can not you see? you belong with me walk in the streets with you in your worn-out jeans i can not help thinking this is how it ought to be laughing on a park bench thinking to myself hey, is not this easy? and you have got a smile that can light up this whole town i have not seen it in a while since she brought you down you say you are fine, i know you better than that hey, what you doing with a girl like that? she wears high heels i wear sneakers standing by and waiting at your backdoor all this time how could you not know, baby? oh, i remember you driving to my house in the middle of the night i am the one who makes you laugh when you know you are 'bout to cry and i know your favorite songs and you tell me 'bout your dreams think i know where you belong think i know it is with me can not you see that i am the one who understands you? have you ever thought just maybe you belong with me?

the buttons of my coat were tangled in my hair in doctor's office lighting, i did not tell you i was scared that was the first time we were there holy orange bottles, each night, i pray to you desperate people find faith, so now i pray to jesus too and i say to you... ooh-ah soon, you will get better you will get better soon because you have to i know delusion when i see it in the mirror you like the nicer nurses, you make the best of a bad deal i just pretend it is not real i will paint the kitchen neon, i will brighten up the sky i know i will never get it, there is not a day that i will not try and i hate to make this all about me but who am i supposed to talk to? what am i supposed to do if there is no you? this will not go back to normal, if it ever was it is been years of hoping, and i keep saying it because because i have to you will get better

he said, "let us get out of this town drive out of the city, away from the crowds" i thought heaven can not help me now nothing lasts forever, but this is going to take me down he is so tall and handsome as hell he is so bad but he does it so well i can see the end as it begins my one condition is say you will remember me standing in a nice dress staring at the sunset, babe red lips and rosy cheeks say you will see me again even if it is just in your wildest dreams, ah-ha wildest dreams, ah-ha i said, "no one has to know what we do" his hands are in my hair, his clothes are in my room and his voice is a familiar sound nothing lasts forever but this is getting good now and when we have had our very last kiss my last request is you will see me in hindsight tangled up with you all night burnin' it down someday when you leave me i bet these memories follow you around even if it is just pretend even if it is just in your (just pretend, just pretend) in your wildest dreams, ah-ha (even if it is just in your)

i never trust a narcissist but they love me so i play  them like a violin and i make it look, oh, so easy because for every lie i tell them they tell me three this is how the world works now all he thinks about is me i can feel the flames on my skin crimson red paint on my lips if a man talks shit, then i owe him nothing i do not regret it one bit, because he had it comin' they say i did something bad then why is it feel so good? most fun i ever had and i would do it over and over and over again if i could it just felt so good, good i never trust a playboy so i fly  them all around the world and i let them think they saved me they never see it coming what i do next you got to leave before you get left he says, "do not throw away a good thing" but if he drops my name, then i owe him nothing and if he spends my change, then he had it comin' it just felt so good they are burning all the witches even if you are not one they got their pitchforks and proof their receipts and reasons so light me up, light me up (light me up, light me up) light me up, go ahead and light me up (light me up, light me up) light me up, light me up (light me up, light me up) light me up, light me up (light me up) then why is it feel so good? (good) most fun i ever had (most fun i ever had) and i would do it over and over, and over again if i could oh, they say i did something bad (they say i did something bad) then why is it feel so good, good? so bad, why is it feel so good? why is it feel, why is it feel so good? (bad)

we were in the backseat drunk on something stronger than the drinks in the bar "i rent a place on cornelia street" i say casually in the car we were a fresh page on the desk filling in the blanks as we go as if the streetlights pointed in an arrowhead leading us home and i hope i never lose you hope it never ends i would never walk cornelia street again that is the kind of heartbreak time could never mend and baby, i get mystiﬁed by how this city screams your name and baby, i am so terriﬁed of if you ever walk away windows ﬂung right open autumn air, jacket round my shoulders is yours we bless the rains on cornelia street memorise the creaks in the ﬂoor back when we were card sharks, playing games i thought you were leading me on i packed my bags, left cornelia street before you even knew i was gone but then you called showed your hand i turned around before i hit the tunnel sat on the roof, you and i i hope i never lose you you hold my hand on the street walk me back to that apartment years ago we were just inside barefoot in the kitchen sacred new beginnings that became my religion listen... oh, never again and baby, i get mystiﬁed by how this city screams your name i do not want to lose you (hope it never ends) i do not want to lose you (yeah) i said casually in the car

because, baby, now we have got bad blood you know it used to be mad love so take a look what you have done because, baby, now we have got bad blood, hey! i can not take it back, look where i am at we was og like d.o.c., remember that? my tlc was quite od, id my facts now pov of you and me, similar iraq i do not hate you, but i hate to critique, overrate you these beats of a dark heart, use basslines to replace you take time and erase you, love do not hear no more no, i do not fear no more better yet, respect are not quite sincere no more oh, it is so sad to think about the good times you and i now we have got problems and i do not think we can solve  them you made a really deep cut and, baby, now we have got bad blood, hey! remember when you tried to write me off? remember when you thought i would take a loss? do not you remember? you thought that i would need ya follow procedure, remember? oh, wait, you got amnesia it was my season for battle wounds battle scars, body bumped, bruised stabbed in the back; brimstone, fire jumping through still, all my life, i got money and power and you got to live with the bad blood now band-aids do not fix bullet holes you say sorry just for show you live like that, you live with ghosts you forgive, you forget, but you never let it go if you live like that, you live with ghosts if you love like that, blood runs cold

took a deep breath in the mirror he did not like it when i wore high heels but i do turn the lock and put my headphones on he always said he did not get this song but i do, i do walked in expecting you would be late but you got here early and you stand and wave i walk to you you pull my chair out and help me in and you do not know how nice that is and you throw your head back laughing like a little kid i think it is strange that you think i am funny, because he never did i have been spending the last eight months thinking all love ever does is break and burn, and end but on a wednesday in a cafe i watched it begin again you said you never met one girl who had as many james taylor records as you we tell stories and you do not know why i am coming off a little shy but you throw your head back laughing and we walked down the block, to my car and i almost brought him up but you start to talk about the movies that your family watches every single christmas and i want to talk about that and for the first time what is past is past because you throw your head back laughing

no, nothing good starts in a getaway car it was the best of times, the worst of crimes i struck a match and blew your mind but i did not mean it and you did not see it the ties were black, the lies were white in shades of gray and candlelight i wanted to leave him i needed a reason x marks the spot where we fell apart he poisoned the well, i was lying to myself i knew it from the first old fashioned, we were cursed we never had a shotgun shot in the dark you were driving the getaway car we were flying, but we would never get far do not pretend it is such a mystery think about the place where you first met me riding in a getaway car there were sirens in the beat of your heart should have known i would be the first to leave in a getaway car (ooh) no, they never get far (ooh, oh) it was the great escape, the prison break the light of freedom on my face but you were not thinking and i was just drinking well, he was running after us, i was screaming, "go, go, go!" but with three of us, honey, it is a sideshow and a circus are not a love story and now we are both sorry (we are both sorry) he poisoned the well, every man for himself it hit you like a shotgun shot to the heart we were jet set, bonnie and clyde (ooh) until i switched to the other side, to the other side it is no surprise, i turned you in (ooh) because us traitors never win i am in a getaway car i left you in the motel bar i put the money in a bag and i stole the keys that was the last time you ever saw me driving the getaway car we were flying, but we would never get far (do not pretend) there were sirens in the beat of your heart (should have known) i was riding in a getaway car i was crying in a getaway car i was dying in a getaway car said "goodbye" in a getaway car

we could leave the christmas lights up 'til january this is our place, we make the rules and there is a dazzling haze, a mysterious way about you dear have i known you 20 seconds or 20 years? can i go where you go? can we always be this close forever and ever? and ah, take me out, and take me home you are my, my, my, my lover we could let our friends crash in the living room this is our place, we make the call and i am highly suspicious that everyone who sees you wants you i have loved you three summers now, honey, but i want  them all and ah, take me out, and take me home (forever and ever) ladies and gentlemen, will you please stand? with every guitar string scar on my hand i take this magnetic force of a man to be my lover my heart's been borrowed and yours has been blue all's well that ends well to end up with you swear to be overdramatic and true to my lover and you will save all your dirtiest jokes for me and at every table, i will save you a seat, lover you are my, my, my, my oh, you are my, my, my, my darling, you are my, my, my, my lover

combat i am ready for combat i say i do not want that, but what if i do? because cruelty wins in the movies i have got a hundred thrown out speeches i almost said to you easy they come, easy they go i jump from the train, i ride off alone i never grew up, it is getting so old help me hold onto you i have been the archer i have been the prey who could ever leave me, darling? but who could stay? dark side i search for your dark side but what if i am all right, right, right, right here? and i cut off my nose just to spite my face then hate my reflection, for years and years i wake in the night, i pace like a ghost the room is on fire, invisible smoke and all of my heroes die all alone screaming, who could ever leave me, darling? because they see right through me they see right through me they see right through can you see right through me? i see right through me all the king's horses and all the king's men could not put me together again because all of my enemies started out friends and who could stay? who could stay? you could stay

we were both young when i first saw you i close my eyes and the flashback starts i am standing there, on a balcony, in summer air see the lights, see the party, the ball gowns see you make your way through the crowd and say "hello," little did i know that you were romeo, you were throwing pebbles and my daddy said, "stay away from juliet" and i was crying on the staircase begging you, please do not go and i said, "romeo take me somewhere we can be alone i will be waiting, all there is left to do is run you will be the prince and i will be the princess it is a love story, baby, just say yes" so i sneak out to the garden to see you we keep quiet because we are dead if they knew so close your eyes escape this town for a little while because you were romeo, i was a scarlet letter but you were everything to me i was begging you, please do not go and i said, "romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone romeo, save me, they are trying to tell me how to feel this love is difficult, but it is real do not be afraid, we will make it out of this mess it is a love story, baby, just say "yes" i got tired of waiting wondering if you were ever coming around my faith in you was fading when i met you on the outskirts of town and i said, "romeo, save me, i have been feeling so alone i keep waiting for you, but you never come" is this in my head? i do not know what to think he knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring and said, "marry me, juliet, you will never have to be alone i love you, and that is all i really know i talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress because we were both young when i first saw you

i blew things out of proportion now you are blue put you in jail for something you did not do i pinned your hands behind your back, oh thought i had reason to attack, but no fighting with a true love is boxing with no gloves chemistry 'til it blows up, 'til there is no us why'd i have to break what i love so much? it is on your face and i am to blame i need to say hey, it is all me, in my head i am the one who burned us down but it is not what i meant sorry that i hurt you i do not want to do, i do not want to do this to you i do not want to lose, i do not want to lose this with you i need to say, hey, it is all me, just do not go meet me in the afterglow it is so excruciating to see you low just want to lift you up and not let you go this ultraviolet morning light below tells me this love is worth the ﬁght, oh i lived like an island punished you with silence went off like sirens, just crying why'd i have to break what i love so much do not walk away, i need to say i am sorry that i hurt you tell me that you are still mine tell me that we will be just ﬁne even when i lose my mind tell me that it is not my fault tell me that i am all you want even when i break your heart

i am so glad you made time to see me how is life, tell me how is your family i have not seen them in a while you have been good, busier then ever we small talk, work and the weather your guard is up and i know why because the last time you saw me is still burned in the back of your mind you gave me roses and i left them there to die so this is me swallowing my pride standing in front of you saying i am sorry for that night and i would go back to december all the time it turns out freedom are not nothing but missing you wishing i would realized what i had when you were mine i would go back to december, turn around and make it all right i would go back to december all the time these days i have not been sleeping staying up playing back myself leaving when your birthday passed and i did not call and i think about summer, all the beautiful times i watched you laughing from the passenger side and realized i loved you in the fall and then the cold came, the dark days when fear crept into my mind you gave me all your love and all i gave you was goodbye i would go back to december, turn around and change my own mind i miss your tan skin, your sweet smile, so good to me, so right and how you held me in your arms that september night the first time you ever saw me cry maybe this is wishful thinking probably mindless dreaming if we loved again i swear i would love you right i would go back in time and change it but i can not so if the chain is on your door, i understand but this is me swallowing my pride standing in front of you saying i am sorry for that night and i would go back to december i would go back to december, turn around and make it alright all the time

song: Only The Young ured in Miss Americana
lyrics: it keeps me awake, the look on your face the moment you heard the news you are screaming inside, and frozen in time you did all that you could do the game was rigged, the ref got tricked the wrong ones think they are right you were outnumbered, this time but only the young only the young only the young can run can run, so run and run and run so everyday now, you brace for the sound you have only heard on tv you go to class, scared, wondering where the best hiding spot would be and the big bad man and his big bad clan their hands are stained with red oh, how quickly they forget they are not going to help us too busy helping themselves they are not going to change this we got to do it ourselves they think that it is over but it is just begun only one thing can save us only the young (only the young) only the young (do not say you are too tired to fight) only the young (it is just a matter of time) only the young (up there is the finish line) do not say you are too tired to fight it is just a matter of time (can run) up there is the finish line so run and run and run it is just a matter of time (so run) and run and run and run

walking through a crowd, the village is aglow kaleidoscope of loud heartbeats under coats everybody here wanted something more searching for a sound we had not heard before and it said welcome to new york it is been waiting for you it is a new soundtrack i could dance to this beat, beat forevermore the lights are so bright but they never blind me, me when we first dropped our bags on apartment floors took our broken hearts, put them in a drawer everybody here was someone else before and you can want who you want boys and boys and girls and girls welcome to new york (new york) like any great love, it keeps you guessing like any real love, it is ever-changing like any true love, it drives you crazy but you know you would not change anything, anything, anything i could dance to this beat but they never blind me new soundtrack so bright, they never blind me

elevator buttons and morning air strangers' silence makes me want to take the stairs if you were here we would laugh about their vacant stares but right now my time is theirs seems like there is always someone who disapproves they will judge it like they know about me and you and the verdict comes from those with nothing else to do the jury's out, but my choice is you so do not you worry your pretty, little mind people throw rocks at things that shine and life makes love look hard the stakes are high, the water's rough but this love is ours you never know what people have up their sleeves ghosts from your past going to jump out at me lurking in the shadows with their lip gloss smiles but i do not care because right now you are mine and you will say do not you worry your pretty, little mind and it is not theirs to speculate if it is wrong, and your hands are tough but they are where mine belong, and i will fight their doubt and give you faith with this song for you because i love the gap between your teeth and i love the riddles that you speak and any snide remarks from my father about your tattoos will be ignored because my heart is yours and do not you worry your pretty, little mind but they can not take what is ours they can not take what is ours

how many days did i spent thinking 'bout how you did me wrong, wrong, wrong? lived in the shade you were throwing 'til all of my sunshine was gone, gone, gone and i could not get away from you in my feelings more than drake, so yeah your name on my lips, tongue-tied free rent, living in my mind but then something happened one magical night i forgot that you existed and i thought that it would kill me, but it did not and it was so nice so peaceful and quiet it is not love, it is not hate, it is just indifference i forgot that you... got out some popcorn as soon as my rep started going down, down, down laughed on the school yard as soon as i tripped up and hit the ground, ground, ground and i would have stuck around for you would have fought the whole town, so yeah would have been right there, front row even if nobody came to your show but you showed who you are then one magical night sent me a clear message taught me some hard lessons i just forget what they were it is all just a blur i did, i did, i did it is not hate, it is just indifference oh yeah

i, i loved you in secret first sight, yeah, we love without reason oh, 25 years old oh, how were you to know? and my, my love had been frozen deep blue, but you painted me golden oh, and you held me close oh, how was i to know? i could have spent forever with your hands in my pockets picture of your face in an invisible locket you said there was nothing in the world that could stop it i had a bad feeling and darling, you had turned my bed into a sacred oasis people started talking, putting us through our paces i knew there was no one in the world who could take it but we were dancing dancing with our hands tied, hands tied yeah, we were dancing like it was the first time, first time and i had a bad feeling i, i loved you in spite of deep fears that the world would divide us so, baby, can we dance oh, through an avalanche? and say, say that we got it i am a mess, but i am the mess that you wanted oh, because it is gravity oh, keeping you with me (knew, we had our hands tied) i would kiss you as the lights went out swaying as the room burned down i would hold you as the water rushes in if i could dance with you again hands tied, hands tied

loving him is like driving a new maserati down a dead end street faster than the wind, passionate as sin, ending so suddenly loving him is like trying to change your mind once you are already flying through the free fall like the colors in autumn, so bright, just before they lose it all losing him was blue, like i would never known missing him was dark gray, all alone forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met but loving him was red loving him was red touching him was like realizing all you ever wanted was right there in front of you memorizing him was as easy as knowing all the words to your old favorite song fighting with him was like trying to solve a crossword and realizing there is no right answer regretting him was like wishing you never found out that love could be that strong oh, red burning red remembering him comes in flashbacks and echoes tell myself it is time now got to let go but moving on from him is impossible when i still see it all in my head in burning red burning, it was red oh, losing him was blue, like i would never known because loving him was red yeah, yeah, red and that is why he is spinning 'round in my head comes back to me, burning red yeah, yeah his love was like driving a new maserati down a dead end street

i am at a payphone trying to call home all of my change i spent on you where have the times gone, baby? it is all wrong where are the plans we made for two? yeah, i, i know it is hard to remember the people we used to be it is even harder to picture that you are not here next to me you say it is too late to make it but is it too late to try? and in our time that you wasted all of our bridges burned down i have wasted my nights you turned out the lights now i am paralyzed still stuck in that time when we called it love but even the sun sets in paradise if happy ever afters did exist i would still be holding you like this all those fairy tales are full of it one more stupid love song, i will be sick oh, you turned your back on tomorrow because you forgot yesterday i gave you my love to borrow but you just gave it away you can not expect me to be fine i do not expect you to care i know i have said it before but all of our bridges burned down i have wasted my nights, now i am at a payphone man, f- that sh- i will be out spending all this money while you are sitting round wondering why it was not you who came up from nothing? made it from the bottom now when you see me i am stunting and all of my cars start with a push of a button telling me the chances i blew up or whatever you call it switch the number to my phone so you never could call it do not need my name on my show you can tell it i am ballin' swish, what a shame could have got picked had a really good game but you missed your last shot so you talk about who you see at the top or what you could have saw but sad to say it is over for phantom pulled up valet open doors wiz like go away, got what you was looking for now it is me who they want, so you can go and take that little piece of sh- with you

i was so high i did not recognize the fire burning in her eyes the chaos that controlled my mind whispered goodbye as she got on a plane never to return again but always in my heart, oh this love has taken its toll on me she said goodbye too many times before and her heart is breakin' in front of me and i have no choice, because i will not say goodbye anymore whoa i tried my best to feed her appetite keep her coming every night so hard to keep her satisfied, oh kept playing love like it was just a game pretending to feel the same then turn around and leave again, but uh-oh i will fix these broken things, repair your broken wings and make sure everything's all right (it is all right, it is all right) my pressure on your hips, i am sinking my fingertips every inch of you because i know that is what you want me to do her heart is breakin' in front of me and my heart is breakin' in front of me and she said goodbye too many times before this love

cold enough to chill my bones it feels like i do not know you anymore i do not understand why you are so cold to me with every breath you breathe i see there is something going on i do not understand why you are so cold are we taking time or a time out? i can not take the in between asking me for space here in my house you know how to fuck with me acting like we are not together after everything that we have been through sleeping up under the covers how am i so far away from you? distant when we are kissing feel so different baby tell me how did you get so... i do not understand why you are so cold, yeah whoa yeah what you holdin' on, holdin' on for? if you want to leave just leave why you want to bite your tongue for? the silence is killing me if you do not want this, then what is the use? distant (oh) when we are kissing (yeah) feel so different (yeah) (so cold it is colder) whoa yeah (so cold it is colder) never thought that you were like this i took the tag off and made you priceless i just spent half a mill' on a chandelier now you tryna cut me off like a light switch, yeah tryna stay, and i leave saying that you need some time to breath thinking that i am sleeping on the four letter word but the four letter word do not sleep we going two separate ways you are not been acting the same you got to go, but the way your ass used to be you gold dig every day i split the four talk to the two talk because i can not let my job be hear what you say girl i tried to give you space baby tell me how did you get so cold enough to chill my bones

song: If I Never See Your Face Again
lyrics: now as the summer fades, i will let you slip away you say i am not your type, but i can make you sway it makes you burn to learn you are not the only one i will let you be if you put down your blazing gun now you have gone somewhere else far away i do not know if i will find you (find you, find you) but you feel my breath on your neck can not believe i am right behind you (right behind you) because you keep me coming back for more (coming back for more) and i feel a little better than i did before if i never see your face again, i do not mind because we got much further than i thought we would get tonight sometimes you move so well it is hard not to give in i am lost; i can not tell where you end and i begin it makes you burn to learn you are with another man i wonder if he is half the lover that i am because you keep me coming back for more baby, baby, please believe me find it in your heart to reach me promise not to leave me behind (promise not to leave me behind) take me back, but take it easy make me think, but do not deceive me talk to me by taking your time (talk to me, talk to me) because we got much further than i thought we would get tonight (talk to me, talk to me) because we got much further than i thought we would get tonight.

you push me i do not have the strength to resist or control you so take me down, take me down you hurt me but do i deserve this? you make me so nervous calm me down, calm me down wake you up in the middle of the night to say i will never walk away again i am never going to leave this bed so come here and never leave this place perfection of your face slows me down, slows me down so fall down i need you to trust me go easy, do not rush me help me out, why do not you help me out? so you say go, it is not workin' and i say no, it is not perfect so i stay instead take it, take it all, take all that i have i would give it all away just to get you back and fake it, fake it, i will take what i can get knocking so loud, can you hear me yet? try to stay awake, but you can not forget you say go, it is not workin' i am never going to leave this bed, oh

i wake up with blood-shot eyes struggled to memorize the way it felt between your thighs pleasure that made you cry feels so good to be bad not worth the aftermath, after that, after that try to get you back i still do not have a reason and you do not have the time and it really makes me wonder if i ever gave a fuck about you give me something to believe in because i do not believe in you anymore, anymore i wonder if it even makes a difference to try yeah, so, this is goodbye god damn, my spinning head decisions that made my bed now i must lay in it and deal with things i have left unsaid i want to dive into you forget what you are going through i get behind, make your move forget about the truth i wonder if it even makes a difference it even makes a difference to try and you told me how you are feeling but i do not believe it is true anymore, anymore i wonder if it even makes a difference to cry oh, no, so, this is goodbye ooh, i have been here before one day i will wake up and it will not hurt anymore you caught me in a lie, i have no alibi the words you say do not have a meaning because i still do not have a reason if i ever gave a fuck about you and i and so, this is goodbye it even makes a difference to try, yeah oh, no, yeah, so, this is goodbye

you must think that i am stupid you must think that i am a fool you must think that i am new to this but i have seen this all before i am never going to let you close to me even though you mean the most to me because every time i open up, it hurts so i am never going to get too close to you even when i mean the most to you in case you go and leave me in the dirt and every time you hurt me, the less that i cry and every time you leave me, the quicker these tears dry and every time you walk out, the less i love you baby, we do not stand a chance, it is sad but it is true i am way too good at goodbyes (i am way too good at goodbyes) no way that you will see me cry (no way that you will see me cry) i know you are thinkin' i am heartless i know you are thinkin' i am cold i am just protectin' my innocence i am just protectin' my soul no no, no, no, no, no (i am way too good at goodbyes) no, no, no, no no, no, no (i am way too good at goodbyes) ah-ah-ah because every time you hurt me, the less that i cry

song: I m Not the Only One
lyrics: you and me, we made a vow for better or for worse i can not believe you let me down but the proof is in the way it hurts for months on end i have had my doubts denying every tear i wish this would be over now but i know that i still need you here you say i am crazy because you do not think i know what you have done but when you call me "baby" i know i am not the only one you have been so unavailable now sadly i know why your heart is unobtainable even though lord knows you kept mine i have loved you for many years maybe i am just not enough you have made me realize my deepest fear by lying and tearing us up and i know, and i know, and i know and i know, and i know, and i know, know

song: Fire On Fire From Watership Down
lyrics: my mother said i am too romantic she said, you are dancing in the movies i almost started to believe her then i saw you and i knew maybe it is because i got a little bit older maybe it is all that i have been through i would like to think it is how you lean on my shoulder and how i see myself with you i do not say a word but still, you take my breath and steal the things i know there you go, saving me from out of the cold fire on fire would normally kill us but this much desire, together, we are winners they say that we are out of control and some say we are sinners but do not let them ruin our beautiful rhythms because when you unfold me and tell me you love me and look in my eye you are perfection, my only direction it is fire on fire, mmm it is fire on fire when we fight, we fight like lions but then we love and feel the truth we lose our minds in a city of roses we will not abide by any rules it is fire on fire, oh

my mind runs away to you with the thought i hope you will see can not see where it is wandered to but i know where it wants to be i am waiting patiently though time is moving slow i have one vacancy and i wanted you to know that you are the one designed for me a distant stranger that i will complete i know you are out there we are meant to be so keep your head up and make it to me and make it to me so sick of this lonely air it seems such a waste of breath so much that i need to say so much to get off my chest make it to me

holy father, we need to talk i have a secret that i can not keep i am not the boy that you thought you wanted please do not get angry, have faith in me say i should not be here but i can not give up his touch it is him i love, it is him do not you try and tell me that god does not care for us it is him i love, it is him i love i walk the streets of mississippi i hold my lover by the hand i feel you staring when he is with me how can i make you understand? oh, oh oh, i love no, no, i love i love him i love holy father, judge my sins i am not afraid of what they will bring i love him

you must think that i am stupid you must think that i am a fool you must think that i am new to this but i have seen this all before i am never going to let you close to me even though you mean the most to me because every time i open up, it hurts so i am never going to get too close to you even when i mean the most to you in case you go and leave me in the dirt but every time you hurt me, the less that i cry and every time you leave me, the quicker these tears dry and every time you walk out, the less i love you baby, we do not stand a chance, it is sad but it is true i am way too good at goodbyes (i am way too good at goodbyes) i know you are thinkin' i am heartless i know you are thinkin' i am cold i am just protectin' my innocence i am just protectin' my soul no way that you will see me cry (no way that you will see me cry) no no, no, no, no, no (i am way too good at goodbyes) no, no, no, no no, no, no (i am way too good at goodbyes) ah-ah-ah (i am way too good at goodbyes) because every time you hurt me, the less that i cry

he could be a sinner, or a gentleman he could be your preacher when your soul is damned he could be your lawyer on a witness stand but he will never love you like i can, can he could be a stranger, you gave a second glance he could be a trophy, of a one night stand he could have your humour, but i do not understand, because he will never love you like i can, can, can why are you looking down all the wrong roads? when mine is the heart and the salt of the soul there may be lovers who hold out their hands, but they will never love you like i can, can, can they will never love you like i can, can a chance encounter of circumstance baby, he is a mantra, keeps your mind entranced he could be a silence in this mayhem but then again we both have demons, that we can not stand i love your demons, like devils can if you are still seeking an honest man then stop deceiving, lord, please

i have been burning, yes, i have been burning such a burden, this flame on my chest no insurance to pay for the damage yeah, i have been burning up since you left i have been smoking, oh more than twenty a day blame it on rebellion do not blame it all on me wish i was younger back to the nineteenth of may i had an open mind swore to never change funny how time goes by had respect for myself that river ran dry you reached the limit i was not enough it is like the fire replaced all the love oh, if you ever called i would run straight back give you my forgiveness and the shirt off my back no friends to turn to yeah, i messed up that wish we could smoke again just for a day, oh and it is like the fire replaced all the love oh, i have been burning up since you left

when i signed my deal i felt pressure do not want to see the numbers i want to see heaven you say could you write a song for me i said i am sorry i will not do that happily when i go home i tend to close the door i never wanted more so sing with me can not you see i do not have money on my mind i do it for i do it for the love please do not get me wrong i want to keep it moving i know what that requires i am not foolish please can you make this work for me because i am not a puppet i will work against your strings when the sun will set do not you fret no i have no money on my mind no money on my mind no i have have money on my mind just love

i have been here before but always hit the floor i have spent a lifetime running and i always get away but with you i am feeling something that makes me want to stay i am prepared for this i never shoot to miss but i feel like a storm is coming if i am going to make it through the day then there is no more use in running this is something i got to face if i risk it all could you break my fall? how do i live? how do i breathe? when you are not here i am suffocating i want to feel love, run through my blood tell me is this where i give it all up? for you i have to risk it all because the writing's on the wall a million shards of glass that haunt me from my past as the stars begin to gather and the light begins to fade when all hope begins to shatter know that i will not be afraid the writing's on the wall

i had a dream i was mugged outside your house i had a dream in a panic you came running out for a moment you were sure i would die on you for a moment i believed you loved me too but life is never like this and you are never strong too much of a good thing will not be good for long although you made my heart sing, to stay with you would be wrong too much of a good thing will not be good anymore watch where i tread before i fall we would talk maybe 20 times a day and still i would never say what i want to say i thought i would not need to i guess i read you wrong you refuse to see this, do not see it anymore i have made the decision not to answer your calls because i put everything out there and i got nothing at all too much of a good thing is not good and you know i watch where i walk before i fall before i fall

i am young and i am foolish, i have made bad decisions i block out the news, turn my back on religion do not have no degree, i am somewhat naïve i have made it this far on my own but lately, that shit are not been gettin' me higher i lift up my head and the world is on fire there is dread in my heart and fear in my bones and i just do not know what to say maybe i will pray, pray maybe i will pray i have never believed in you, no but i am going to pray you will not find me in church (no) reading the bible (no) i am still here and i am still your disciple i am down on my knees, i am beggin' you, please i am broken, alone, and afraid i am not a saint, i am more of a sinner i do not want to lose, but i fear for the winners when i tried to explain, the words ran away that is why i am stood here today and i am going to pray (lord) pray (lord), maybe i will pray pray for a glimmer of hope maybe i will pray (lord), pray (lord), maybe i will pray i have never believed in you, no, but i am going to will not you call me? can we have a one-on-one, please? let us talk about freedom everyone prays in the end oh, will not you call me? oh, i am going to pray, i am going to pray i am going to pray maybe i will pray, pray, maybe i will pray i have never believed in you, no, but i am going to pray

it is if everyone dies alone does that scare you? i do not want to be alone i look for you every day, every night i close my eyes from the fear, from the light as i wander down the avenue, so confused guess i will try and force a smile pink lemonade sippin' on a sunday couples holding hands on a runway they are all posing in a picture frame whilst my world's crashing down solo shadow on a sidewalk just want somebody to die for sunshine livin' on a perfect day while my world's crashing down i just want somebody to die for i long for you just a touch (does that scare you?) of your hand you do not leave my mind lonely days, i am feeling like a fool for dreaming i just want somebody to die for (to die for) (does that scare you?) (i do not want to be alone) couples holding hands on a runway (oh)

song: Omen feat Sam Smith Radio edit

one look in your eyes and there i see just what you mean to me here in my heart i believe your love is all i will ever need holdin' you close through the night i need you, yeah i look in your eyes and there i see what happiness really mean the love that we share makes life so sweet together we will always be this pledge of love feels so right and, oh, i need you here and now i promise to love faithfully (faithfully) you are all i need i vow to be one with thee (you and me) your love is all (i need) i need say, yeah, yeah when i look in your eyes, there i see all that a love should really be and i need you more and more each day nothing can take your love away more than i dare to dream, i need you (you and me) yeah your love is all i need starting here (oh and i am) starting now (i believe) i believe in love (i believe) starting here (i am starting right here) starting now (right now because i believe in your love) i am so in love (so i am glad to take the vow, here and now) here and now (oh) here and now, yeah i-i, love is all i need

he works hard to give her all he thinks she wants but it tears her apart because nothing's for her heart he pulls in late to wake her up with a kiss goodnight if he could only read her mind, she would say buy me a rose call me from work open a door for me what would it hurt? show me you love me by the look in your eyes these are the little things i need the most in my life yeaaah now the days have grown to years of feeling all alone as she sits and wonders if all she is doin is wrong cos lately she would try anything just to turn his head would it make a difference if she would say, if she would say: open the door for me what would it hurt? and the more that he lives the less that he tries to show her the love that he holds inside and the more that she gives the more that he sees this is the story of you and me so i bought you a rose on the way home from work to open the door to a heart that i hurt and i hoped you noticed this look in my eyes because i am going to make things right for the rest of your life(rest of your life) and i am going to hold you tonight, tonight do all those little things for the rest of your life (oh your life)

yeah, yeah, oh yeah here it is she called me by surprise, i must say because i never have seen such a pretty face with such a warm and beautiful smile it was not hard for me to notice her style i was fascinated, surely she took my heart and held it for me i would not let her get away not until she heard me say excuse me miss, but what is your name, where are you from? and can i come and possibly, can i take you out tonight? to a movie, to the park, i will have you home before it is dark so let me know, can i take you out tonight? do not care if i get rejected, at least then i will not regret it regret the fact, i missed the chance for romance at least i will walk away knowing, i tried my best and i am going i am going on with my day, because at least she heard me say that is why i had to come over and introduce myself to you because you never going to know where you will find love and hopefully i have found it in you to the movie, to the park, i will have you home before it is dark so let me know, can i take you out to-tonight? yeah

ooh, every year at christmas time i hear the people laughin' smilin', bein' happy again ooh, at christmas time (merry, merry christmas) merry christmas to the world i wish happiness and love for every boy and every girl because the holiday makes me feel this way what a joy it is to find happy people joined together for the love of christmas time ooh, and they feel that way every christmas day ooh, i wish that everyday of the year could have the love that we feel on christmas day every year at christmas time at christmas time every day of the year at christmas time (merry, merry christmas) christmas time merry, merry, merry merry, merry, merry christmas time (merry, merry christmas) ooh have a merry, merry a merry, merry, merry, merry christmas time (merry, merry christmas) a christmas time ooh... (fade)

song: Superstar Until You Come Back to Me That s What I m Gonna Do
lyrics: i want to tell you, baby the changes i have been going through missin' you, missin' you, oh... oh... till you come back to me i do not know what i am going to do n-n-n-no, n-n-no do not you remember you told me you loved me, baby you said you would be comin' back this way again, baby baby, baby, baby, baby, baby, oh, baby i love you yeah... i really do long ago and oh, so far away i fell in love with you before the second show and your guitar and you sound so sweet and clear but you are not really here it is just the radio baby, baby, baby, baby, oh, baby, yeah i really do (to belong) yeah... hey... eah... yeah... hey... hey (to belong) whoa... ho... oh... whoa... ho... ho... yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah yeah, yeah you looked for me to be yours you want my love, but you are on the road do not you remember me anymore loneliness is such a sad affair a sad affair and i can hardly wait to be with you again and what to say, to say to make you come again oh, honey come on back to me again, yeah, hey i want to be, i want to be anywhere you are baby, baby, baby, woo, baby, oh, baby yes, i love you yeah, hey... yeah, yeah... eah... yeah... ooh... play it easy, play it easy keep it right there, keep it right there, keep it right there yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah what are you going to say it is alright, it is alright ooh, baby, it is alright, it is alright alright now keep it right there, keep it right there yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah say it is alright, it is alright say, ooh, baby, it is alright, it is alright eah... l-l-l-l-love yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah eah... ooh... ooh... yeah... hea... i used to be sad but now it is alright, it is alright i wonder, i wonder where are you again tonight are you holdin' someone else real tight i wonder, i wonder, i wonder

say you, say me say it for always that is the way it should be say it together, naturally i had a dream i had an awesome dream people in the park playing games in the dark and what they played was a masquerade and from behind of walls of doubt a voice was crying out as we go down life's lonesome highway seems the hardest thing to do is to find a friend or two that helping hand, some one who understands that when you feel you have lost your way you have got some one there to say "i will show you" so you think you know the answers - oh no 'couse the whole world has got you dancing that is right - i am telling you it is time to start believing - oh yes believing who you are: you are a shining star

wooh i look at you you look at me (you can not help it yeah we are feeling butterflies) it is obvious we got some chemistry (i think i know what it feels so right) now i wanted so long to know now you are telling me you got to let it go (do not tell me i have to start all over again) i never thought this day would come (this is something that i have wanted in my life) i realize that you are the one (and you are telling me it is time to say goodbye) what is inside of my heart it are not going to change so it should not be so easy to walk away (you feel it i feel it let us not pretend let us not pretend) maybe i do not know what love is maybe i am a fool i just know what i am feeling and it is all because of you do not tell me i do not know i want the truth because they call it we call it you call it i call it love it is so clear for you to see (do not let nobody tell you what to do) why they can not they just let us be happy (i do not want to find somebody new) if you know what is really in your heart then do not let  them tear us apart (because you feel it i feel it let us think it through) maybe i do not know what love is (maybe i am a fool) and it is all because of you (please do not) because they call it (yeah) we call it (yeah) you call it (wooh) we have a bond that is unbreakable and it is not time to let it go (we are in love) and now that we know it is real we are going to let it show to the whole world that i am yours forever and you are my girl you are my everything ooh, i do not know maybe i am a fool (maybe i am a fool) and it is all because of you (it is all because of you) i want the truth (i want the truth) because they call it (they call) maybe i am a fool (i call it) and it is all because of you (all because of you) i do not know (baby) we call it (we call) you call it (you call) i call it love (i call it) love they call it love i call it

(ah-ah, ah-ah, ah-ah) girl it was so right girl was so right (so right so right...) so right

stuck on you i have got this feeling down deep in my soul that i just can not lose guess i am on my way needed a friend and the way i feel now i guess i will be with you 'til the end mighty glad you stayed i am stuck on you been a fool too long i guess it is time for me to come on home so hard to see that a woman like you could wait around for a man like me oh, i am leaving on that midnight train tomorrow and i know just where i am going i have packed up my troubles and i have thrown them all away because this time little darlin' i am coming home to stay i am mighty glad you stayed

lady i am your knight in shining armor and i love you you have made me what i am, and i am yours my love there is so many ways i want to say, i love you let me hold you in my arms forever more you have gone and made me such a fool i am so lost in your love and oh, we belong together will not you believe in my song for so many years i thought i would never find you you have come into my life and made me whole forever, let me wake to see you each and every morning let me hear you whisper softly in my ear in my eyes i see no one else but you there is no other love like our love and oh yes, girl i will always want you near me i have waited for you, for so long your love's the only love i need and beside me is where i want you to be because my love there is something i want you to know you are the love of my life of my life you are my lady

the ashen grey muse commissions a new verse a song to while away the long sojourn in the hearse yet all of us who danse macabre to these dour, dismal tunes become cold, grim and hard as the dirt upon the tomb in darkened dirges death's knell peals out it is toll as another cadaver is consigned six feet down to its hole but ere the last shovel of dirt falls on the wall of the box we gravely offer a salute to those about to rot so lift up your severed heads, in a song for the dead life's course ever runs red, so let no lyric remain unsaid as from our mouths the melody is bled, in a symphony scripted in red like rats by the piper we are led, to join in this song for the dead the humor of the gallons never fails to ring true in this dead, bleak, sick world that we are hung, drawn and quartered though as each internecine instrument plays its own bloody part the hammering of coffin nails outpaces the beating of our hearts symphonic surgery orchestrated, a cleaver conducts the execrable epiphany comes too late, just to reduce us to chunks rising up from the sod heaves a gross, putrid breath as the chorus is joined in this song for the dead truncated toccatas deranged, raked across barbed strings and hacked eviscerated etudes for the de-brained, plucked upon heartstring stretched on the rack medicinal movements decomposed regurgitating oratorios obscene forensic fugues and de-boned, mutilating the melody's method and means the crepitated coda dies in mid-refrain as the sheet-music is obscured by a sanguine scarlet stain shattered stave lodged in your split-open splattered brain the ruptured meter falters as the bow is fretted once again acrid arias are screeched the bloated thorax is breached abrading viscera with bleach grotesquely gavage the deceased cleaving the clef broken notes bleed into a mess falling on ears so deaf so it ever is in death carbonized cantatas corrupt ringing out, sewing seeds of dischord and dismay suppurated sonatas erupt, purulent pizzicatos slicing every which way the truncated cadence is sundered, bloody scraps of sheet music unintellibly scrawled threnodies resonate six feet under, to where all life's fractured melodies will finally resolve the symphonic slaughter's swells without restraint as the cacophonous cadenza splits your eardrums clean in twain the repugnant orchestra pit an abattoir of death and pain the hatchet falls in sharp staccato until everyone is slain
