song: The Best Is Yet to Come
lyrics: across the desert plains where nothing dares to grow i taught you how to sing you taught me everything i know and thought the night is young and we do not know if we will live to see the sun the best is yet to come i know, you know that we have only just begun through the highs and lows and how can i live without you you are such a part of me and you have always been the one keeping me forever young and the best is yet to come hey ah eh oh do not look now, the best is yet to come take my hand, the best is yet to come thinking of the times how we laughed and cried i would not change a thing i could not even if i tried through the wind and rain the spirit of our song remains the same oh can you feel it in the air it is in your heart and everywhere we got to keep that dream alive we cross another road and face another day soldiers never die they only fade away how can we grow old when the soundtrack of our lives is rock and roll

i have got sunshine in my stomach like i just rocked my baby to sleep but i can not keep me from creeping sleep sleep, deep in the deep rockface moves to press my skin white liquids turn sour within turn fast-turn sour turn sweat-turn sour must tell myself that i am not here i am drowning in a liquid fear bottled in a strong compression my distortion shows obsession in the cave get me out of this cave if i keep my self-control i will be safe in my soul and the childhood belief brings a moment's relief but my cynic soon returns and the lifeboat burns my spirit just never learns stalactites, stalagmites shut me in, lock me tight lips are dry, throat is dry feel like burning, stomach churning i am dressed up in a white costume padding out leftover room body stretching, feel the wretching in the cage get me out of the cage in the glare of a light i see a strange kind of sight of cages joined to form a star each person can not go very far all tied to their things they are netted by their strings free to flutter in memories of their wasted wings outside the cage i see my brother john he turns his head so slowly round i cry out help before he can be gone and he looks at me without a sound and i shout 'john, please help me' but he does not even want to try to speak i am helpless in my violent rage and a silent tear of blood dribbles down his cheek and i watch him turn away and leave the cage my little runaway in a trap, feel a strap holding still, pinned for kill chances narrow that i will make it in the cushioned straight-jacket just like 22nd street when they got me by my neck and feet pressures building, can not take any more my headaches charge, my earaches roar in the pain get me out of this pain if i could change to liquid i could fill the cracks up in the rock but i know that i am solid and i am my own bad luck outside john disappears and my cage dissolves without any reason my body revolves keep on turning turning around spinning around

song: I Know What I Like In Your Wardrobe
lyrics: it is one of the clock and time for lunch, when the sun beats down and i lie on the bench i can always hear them talk there is always been ethel: "jacob, wake up! you have got to tidy your room now." and then mister lewis: "is not it time that he was out on his own?" over the garden wall, two little lovebirds - cuckoo to you! keep them mowing blades sharp... i know what i like, and i like what i know; getting better in your wardrobe, stepping one beyond your show sunday night, mr farmer called, said: "listen son, you are wasting your time; there is a future for you in the fire escape trade. come up to town!" but i remebered a voice from the past; "gambling only pays when you are winning" - i had to thank old miss mort for schooling a failure when the sun beats down and i lie on the bench, i can always hear them talk. me, i am just a lawnmower - you can tell me by the way i walk

all i need is a tv show, that and the radio down on my luck again, down on my luck again i can show you, i can show you some of the people in my life it is driving me mad just another way of passing the day i, i get so lonely when she is not there i, i, i, i you are just another face that i know from the tv show i have known you for so very long i feel you like a friend can not you do anything for me? can i touch you for a while? can i meet you on another day and we will fly away? it is driving me mad it is just another way of passing the day turn it on, turn it on, turn it on again (i can see another face)

all that time i was searching nowhere to run to, it started me thinking wondering what i could make of my life and who'd be waiting asking all kinds of questions, to myself but never finding the answers crying at the top of my voice and no one listening all this time i still remember everything you said there is so much you promised how could i ever forget listen, you know i love you, but i just can not take this you know i love you, but i am playing for keeps although i need you, i am not going to make this you know i want to, but i am in too deep so listen, listen to me ooh you must believe me i can feel your eyes go thru me but i do not know why ooh i know you are going, but i can not believe it is the way that you are leaving it is like we never knew each other at all it may be my fault i gave you too many reasons, being alone when i did not want to i thought you would always be there i almost believed you i still remember everything you said, oh it seems i have spent too long only thinking about myself, oh now i want to spend my life just caring bout somebody else you know i love you, but i just can not take this

just as i thought it was going alright i find out i am wrong, when i thought i was right it is always the same, it is just a shame, that is all i could say day, and you would say night tell me it is black, when i know that it is white always the same, it is just a shame and that is all i could leave but i will not go though my heart might tell me so i can not feel a thing from my head down to my toes but why does it always seem to be me looking at you and you looking at me turning me on, turning me off making me feel like i want too much living with you is just putting me through it all of the time running around, staying out all night taking it all instead of taking one bite but it would be easier i know me looking at you, you looking at me truth is i love you more than i wanted to there is no point in trying to pretend there is been no-one who makes me feel like you do say we will be together till the end but i could leave but i will not go it would be easier i know so why does it always seem to be but i love you there is been no-one who makes me feel like you do but just as i thought it was going alright i find out i am wrong when i thought i was right well i could say day, you would say night tell me it is black when i know that it is white that is all

stay with me my love, i hope you will always be right here by my side, if ever i need you oh my love in your arms i feel so safe, and so secure everyday, is such a perfect day to spend alone with you i will follow you, will you follow me? all the days and nights that we know will be i will stay with you, will you stay with me? just one single tear in each passing year with the dark oh i see so very clearly now all my fears, are drifting by me so slowly now fading away i can say the night is long, but you are here close at hand, oh i am better for the smile you give and while i live just one single tear in each passing year there will be

song: I Know What I Like In Your Wardrobe 2008 Remaster
lyrics: it is one of the clock and time for lunch hum de dum de dum when the sun beats down and i lie on the bench i can always hear them talk there is always been ethel "jacob, wake up, you have got to tidy your room now" and then mister lewis "is not it time that he was out on his own?" over the garden wall, two little lovebirds, cuckoo to you keep them mowing blades sharp i know what i like and i like what i know getting better in your wardrobe stepping one beyond your show, show sunday night, mr farmer called, said "listen son, you are wasting your time there is a future for you in the fire escape trade come up to town" but i remembered a voice from the past "gambling only pays when you are winning" i had to thank old miss mort for schooling a failure stepping one beyond your show yeah, i know what i like me, i am just a lawnmower you can tell me by the way i walk

i must have dreamed a thousand dreams been haunted by a million screams but i can hear the marching feet they are moving into the street now did you read the news today? they say the danger's gone away but i can see the fire's still alight burning into the night there is too many men too many people making too many problems and not much love to go 'round can not you see this is a land of confusion? ooh this is the world we live in (oh-oh-oh) and these are the hands we are given (oh-oh-oh) use them and let us start trying (oh-oh-oh) to make it a place worth living in ooh superman, where are you now? when everything's gone wrong somehow the men of steel, men of power are losing control by the hour this is the time, this is the place so we look for the future but there is not much love to go round tell me why, this is a land of confusion this is the world we live in (oh-oh-oh) i remember long ago ooh, when the sun was shining yes and the stars were bright all through the night and the sound of your laughter as i held you tight so long ago i will not be coming home tonight my generation will put it right we are not just making promises that we know, we will never keep too many men there is too many people now this is the world we live in (oh-oh-oh) to make it a place worth fighting for and these are the names we are given (oh-oh-oh) stand up and let us start showing (oh-oh-oh) just where our lives are going to

no use saying that it is alright, it is alright where were you after midnight, midnight? heard a bang, bang, bang, and down they go it is just a job you do because the harder they run, the harder they fall i am coming down hard on you no one saw what you looked like, what you looked like like a stranger you came out of the night, out of the night because someone put the word on you, i hope my aim is true i got a name, i got a number, i got to line on you i got a name, and i got a number, i am coming after you now, do not keep saying that it is alright, it is alright it seems you went just a little too far this time heard a bang, bang, bang, and down you go it is just a job i do because the harder you run and the harder you fall i am coming down hard on you, hard on you i hope my aim is true i got a name, i got a number, i got a line on you i got a name, and i got a number, and i am coming after you keep running, keep running city to city, even if you are innocent you can because too much embarrassment and now your heart is aching and you know there is no mistaking because you feel your life line breaking (keep running, keep running) can feel your hands are shaking (keep running, keep running) no one answers the telephone you can never, never, never go home alone the footsteps close behind now, do not pretend that you sleep at night, well, sleep tight and can not you feel that the time is right? it is alright with a bang, bang, bang, down you go no one really cares because the harder you run, and the harder you fall (hard on you) i got a name, and i got a number, i got a line on you i got a name, i got a number, i am coming after you i got a name, and i got a number, i got a job to do

well the key to my survival was never in much doubt the question was how i could keep sane trying to find a way out things were never easy for me peace of mind was hard to find and i needed a place where i could hide somewhere i could call mine i did not think much about it 'til it started happening all the time soon i was living with the fear everyday of what might happen that night i could not stand to hear the crying of my mother and i remember when i swore that that would be the last they would see of me and i never went home again they say that time is a healer and now my wounds are not the same i rang the bell with my heart in my mouth i had to hear what he would say he sat me down to talk to me he looked me straight in the eyes he said you are no son, you are no son of mine you walked out, you left us behind and you are no son, you are no son of mine oh, his words how they hurt me i will never forget it and as the time, it went by i lived to regret it but where should i go and what should i do? but i came here for help oh i came here for you well the years they passed so slowly i thought about him everyday what would i do, if we passed on the street would i keep running away? in and out of hiding places soon i would have to face the facts we would have to sit down and talk it over and that would mean going back but i rang that bell with my heart in my mouth and he looked me straight in the eyes when you walked out you left us behind but where should i go and what should i do? well i came here for help oh i was looking for you you are no son, you are no son of mine oh you are no son ha yeah, ha yeah, ha yeah, ha yeah, ha yeah oh, oh you are no son of mine

hot sun beating down burning my feet just walking around hot sun making me sweat 'gators getting close, has not got me yet i can not dance, i can not talk only thing about me is the way i walk i can not dance, i can not sing i am just standing here selling everything blue jeans sitting on the beach her dog's talking to me, but she is out of reach she is got a body under that shirt but all she wants to do is rub my face in the dirt cos, i can not dance, i can not talk i am just standing here selling oh and checking everything is in place you never know who is looking on young punk spilling beer on my shoes fat guy's talking to me trying to steal my blues thick smoke, see her smiling through i never thought so much could happen just shooting pool but i can not dance, i can not talk the only thing about me is the way that i walk a perfect body with a perfect face - uh-huh no, i can not dance, i can not talk the only thing about me is the way i walk no, i can not dance, i can not sing but i can walk no i can not dance no no no i can not dance no i said i can not sing

i wandered lonely as a cloud till i came upon this dirty street i have never seen a stranger crowd slubberdegullions on squeaky feet continually pacing with nonchalant embracing each orifice disgracing and one facing me moves to say, "hellay" his skin's all covered in slimy lumps with lips that slide across each chin his twisted limbs like rubber stumps are waved in welcome say, "please join in" my grip must be flipping 'cos his handshake keeps slipping my hopes keep on dipping and his lips keep on smiling all the time we, like you, have tasted love do not be alarmed at what you see you yourself are just the same as what you see in me me, like you? like that? you better watch it son your sentence has only just begun you better run and join your brother john you are in the colony of slipper men there is no who? why? what? or when? you get out if you have got the gripe to see, doktor dyper, reformed sniper he will whip off your windscreen wiper john and i are able to face the doktor and his marble table he said, "understand rael, that is the end of your tail" do not delay, dock the dick i watch his countdown timer tick he places the number into a tube it is a yellow plastic 'shoobedoobe' it says, "though your fingers may tickle, you will be safe in our pickle" suddenly, black cloud come down from the sky it is a super sized black bird that sure can fly the raven brings on darkness and night he flies right down, gives me one hell of a fright he take the tube right out of my hands man, i have got to find out where that black bird lands look here john, i have got to run i need you now, you going to come? he says to me,"now can not you see where the raven flies there is jeopardy" "we have been cured on the couch now you are sick with your grouch i will not risk my honey pouch which my slouch will wear slung very low" he walks away and leaves me once again even though i never learn i would hoped he would show just some concern some concern ooh i am in the agony of slipper pain i pray my undercarriage will sustain the chase is on, the pace is hot but i am running so very hard with everything that i have got he leads me down an underpass though it narrows, he still flies very fast when the tunnel stops catch sight of the tube, just as it drops i am on top of a bank too steep to climb i see it hit the water just in time to watch it float away watch it float away

song: The Battle of Epping Forest 2008 Remaster
lyrics: (taken from a news story concerning two rival gangs fighting over east-end protection rights) along the forest road, there is hundreds of cars - luxury cars each has got its load of convertible bars, cutlery cars - superscars! for today is the day when they sort it out, sort it out because they disagree on a gangland boundary yes, they disagree on a gangland boundary there is willy wright and his boys one helluva noise, that is billy's boys! with fully-fashioned mugs, that is little john's thugs the barking slugs - supersmugs! yes these christian soldiers fight to protect the poor east end heroes got to score in... the battle of epping forest yes it is the battle of epping forest right outside your door you are not seen nothing like it no, you are not seen nothing like it not since the civil war coming over the hill are the boys of bill and johnny's lads stand very still with the thumpire's shout, they all start to clout there is no guns in this gentleman's bout georgie moves in on the outside left with a chain flying round his head and harold demure, from art literature nips up the nearest tree (here come the cavalry!) admidst the battle roar accountants keep the score: 10-4 they have never been alone, after getting a radiophone the bluebells are ringing for sweetmeal sam, real ham handing out bread and jam just like any picnic picnic, picnic, picnic it is 5-4 on william wright; he made his pile on derby night when billy was a kid, walking the streets the other kids hid - so they did! and now, after working hard in security trade, he is got it made the shops that need aid are those that have not paid "i do my double-show quick!" said mick the prick, fresh out of the nick "i sell cheap holiday, the minute they leave then a visit i pay - and does it pay!" and his friend, liquid len by name of wine, women and wandsworth fame said "i am breaking the legs of the bastard that got me framed!" "i am breaking the legs of the bastard that got me framed!" they called me the reverend when i entered the church unstained my employers have changed but the name has remained it all began when i went on a tour hoping to find some furniture i followed a sign - it said "beautiful chest" it led to a lady who showed me her best she was taken by surprise when i quickly closed my eyes so she rang the bell, and quick as hell bob the nob came out on his job to see what the trouble was "louise, is the reverend hard to please?" "you are telling me!" "perhaps, sir, if it is not too late we could interest you in our old-fashioned staffordshire plate?" "oh no, not me, i am a man of repute." but the devil caught hold of my soul and a voice called out "shoot!" to save my steeple, i visited people for this i would gone when i met little john his name came, i understood when the judge said "you are a robbing hood." he told me of his strange foundation conceived on sight of the woodstock nation he would had to hide his reputation when poor, 'twas salvation from door to door but now, with a pin-up guru every week it was love, peace and truth incorporated for all who seek he employed me as a karma mechanic, with overall charms his hands were then fit to receive, receive alms that is why we are in we guard your souls for peanuts and we guard your shops and houses for just a little more in with a left hook is the bethnal green butcher but he is countered on the right by mick's chain-gang fight and liquid len, with his smashed bottle men is lobbing bob the nob across the gob with his kisser in a mess, bob seems under stress but jones the jug hits len right in the mug and harold demure, who is still not quite sure fires acorns from out of his sling up, up above the crowd inside their silver cloud, done proud the bold and brazen brass, seen darkly through the glass the butler's got jam on his rolls; roy doles out the lot with tea from a silver pot just like any picnic along the forest road, it is the end of the day and the clouds roll away each has got its load - they will come out for the count at the break-in of day when the limos return for their final review, it is all through all they can see is the morning goo "there is no-one left alive - must be a draw." so the blackcap barons toss a coin to settle the score

i can not see you mama but i can hardly wait ooh to touch and to feel you mama oh i just can not keep away in the heat and the steam of the city oh its got me running and i just can not brake so say you will help me mama cos its getting so hard now i can not keep you mama but i know you are always there you listen, you teach me mama and i know inside you care so get down, down here beside me oh you are not going nowhere no i will not hurt you mama but its getting so hard can not you see me here mama mama mama mama please can not you feel my heart can not you feel my heart oh now listen to me mama mama mama you are taking away my last chance do not take it away it is hot, too hot for me mama my eyes they are burning mama and i can feel my body shake do not stop, do not stop me mama oh make the pain, make it go away now i can not see you mama you taunt, you tease me mama but i never never can keep away it is the heat and the steam of the city oh got me running and i just can not brake so stay do not leave me mama

you see the face on the tv screen coming at you every sunday see that face on the billboard that man is me on the cover of the magazine there is no question why i am smiling you buy a piece of paradise you buy a piece of me i will get you everything you wanted i will get you everything you need do not need to believe in hereafter just believe in me because jesus he knows me and he knows i am right i have been talking to jesus all my life oh yes he knows me and he is been telling me everything is alright i believe in the family with my ever loving wife beside me but she do not know about my girlfriend or the man i met last night do you believe in god because that is what i am selling and if you want to go to heaven i will see you right you will not even have to leave your house or get outta your chair you do not even have to touch that dial because i am everywhere and jesus he knows me well he is been telling me everything's going to be alright will not find me practicing what i am preaching will not find me making no sacrifice but i can get you a pocketful of miracles if you promise to be good, try to be nice god will take good care of you just do as i say, do not do as i do i am counting my blessings, i have found true happiness because i am getting richer, day by day you can find me in the phone book just call my toll free number you can do it anyway you want just do it right away there'll be no doubt in your mind you will believe everything i am saying if you want to get closer to him get on your knees and start paying oh,yes he knows me ooh,yes he knows me and he knows i am right and he is been telling me everything's going to be alright, alright jesus he knows me, jesus he knows, know

there is lambswool under my naked feet the wool is soft and warm gives off some kind of heat a salamander scurries into flame to be destroyed imaginary creatures are trapped in birth on celluloid the fleas cling to the golden fleece hoping they will find peace each thought and gesture are caught in celluloid there is no hiding in my memory there is no room to void the crawlers cover the floor in the red ochre corridor for my second sight of people, they have more lifeblood than before they are moving. they are moving in time to a heavy wooden door where the needle's eye is winking, closing in on the poor the carpet crawlers heed their callers we have got to get in to get out there is only one direction in the faces that i see it is upward to the ceiling, where the chambers said to be like the forest fight for sunlight, that takes root in every tree they are pulled up by the magnet, believing that they are free mild mannered supermen are held in kryptonite and the wise and foolish virgins giggle with their bodies glowing bright through a door a harvest feast is lit by candlelight it is the bottom of a staircase that spirals out of sight the carpet crawlers heed their callers: the porcelain mannikin with shattered skin fears attack the eager pack lift up their pitchers- the carry all they lack the liquid has congealed, which has seeped out through the crack and the tickler takes his stickleback. we have got to get in to get out.

need i say i love you need i say i care need i say that emotions are something we do not share i do not want to be sitting here, trying to deceive you because you know i know baby that i do not want to go we cannot live together we cannot live apart and that is the situation i have known it from the start everytime that i look at you, i can see the future just throwing it all away throwing it all away is there nothing i can say to make you change your mind i watch the world go round and round and see mine turning upside down. now who will light up the darkness and who will hold your hand who will find you the answers when you do not understand why should i have to be the one who has to convince you someday you will be sorry someday when you are free, memories will remind you that our love was meant to be but late at night when you call my name, the only sound you will hear, is the sound of your voice calling, calling out to me and there is nothing that i can say we are throwing it all away

dark night, planets are set creator prepares for the dawn of man you are waking up, the day of incarnation said you are waking up to life images he made to love images of gods in flesh man is wonderful, very wonderful look at him beware the future here is my world and it is waiting for me paradise before my eyes i am alive in a new born world this heaven will always be mine i am waking up, the day of man has come and god created man from dust with a soul inside his mould and god created womankind the vessel of satan's hold creator made the serpent wise evil in his tempting eyes here i stand a child in a lonely world, oh no watch the serpent tempting me to evil the guiding hand will help me on guiding hand will help me on

can you tell me where my country lies? said the unifaun to his true love's eyes it lies with me, cried the queen of maybe for her merchandise, he traded in his prize paper late!, cried a voice in the crowd old man dies! the note he left was signed old father thames it seems he is drowned selling england by the pound citizens of hope and glory time goes by it is 'the time of your life' easy now, sit you down chewing through your wimpey dreams they eat, without a sound digesting england by the pound young man says you are what you eat - eat well old man says you are what you wear - wear well you know what you are, you do not give a damn bursting your belt that is your homemade sham the captain leads his dance right on through the night join the dance... follow on! till the grail sun sets in the mould follow on! till the gold is cold dancing out with the moonlit knight knights of the green shield stamp and shout there is a fat old lady outside the saloon laying out the credit cards she plays fortune the deck is uneven right from the start all of their hands are playing apart follow on! a round table-talking down we go you are the show! off we go with - you play the hobbyhorse i will play the fool we will tease the bull ringing round and loud, loud and round follow on! with a twist of the world we go

i am coming down, coming down like a monkey but it is alright like a load on your back that you can not see ooh but it is alright try to shake it loose, cut it free, just let it go get it away from me cos tonight, tonight, tonight, ooh i am going to make it right tonight, tonight, tonight, ooh i am going down, going down, like a monkey try to pick yourself up, carry that weight that you can not see do not you know it is alright it is like a helter skelter, going down and down, round and round but just get it away from me, ooh because tonight, tonight, tonight, ooh we are going to make it right i got some money in my pocket about ready to burn i do not remember where i got it i got to get it to you so please answer the phone cos i keep calling but you are never home what am i going to do you keep telling me i have got everything you say i have got everything i want you keep telling me you are going to help me you are going to help me but you do not but now i am in too deep you see it is got me so that i just can not sleep oh get me out of here please get me out of here just help me i will do anything anything if you will just help me get out of here it is like a load on your back that you can not see ooh do not you know that it is alright just try to shake it loose, cut it free, let it go maybe we will make it right someone get me out of here if you will just help get me out of here tonight, ooh yes tonight, tonight, tonight, ooh yes i am going to make it right, tonight, tonight, tonight, ooh

home from work our juliet clears her morning meal she dabs her skin with pretty smells concealing to appeal i will make my bed she said, but turned to go can she be late for her cinema show? romeo locks his basement flat and scurries up the stair with head held high and floral tie a weekend millionaire with her tonight, he cries can he fail armed with his chocolate surprise? take a little trip back with father tiresias listen to the old one speak of all he has lived through i have crossed between the poles, for me there is no mystery once a man, like the sea i raged once a woman, like the earth i gave but there is in fact more earth than sea take a little trip back with father tiresias

well, i have been waiting waiting here so long but thinking nothing nothing could go wrong well, now i know she has a built-in ability to take everything she sees and now it seems i am falling, falling for her she seems to have an invisible touch, yeah she reaches in, and grabs right hold'a your heart it takes control and slowly tears you apart well i do not really know her i only know her name ooh, but she crawls under your skin you are never quite the same and now i know she is got something you just can not trust and it is something mysterious it takes control and soon it tears you apart well, she do not like losing to her it is still a game and though she will mess up your life you will want her just the same and now it seems i have fallen, fallen for her she seems to have an invisible, oh-oh-oh she seems to have an invisible touch yeah

there must be some misunderstanding there must be some kind of mistake i waited in the rain for hours, you were late now it is not like me to say the right thing but you could have called to let me know i checked your number twice, do not understand it so i went home well i would been waiting for this weekend i thought that may be we could see a show never dreamed i would have this feeling oh but seeing you is believing that is why i do not know why you did not show up that night i was waiting in the rain for hours, you were late since then i have been runnin' around tryin' to find you i went to the places that we always go i rang your home but got no answer jumped in my car, i went round there still do not believe it, he was just leavin' (there must be, there must be, ohh) misunderstanding

the path is clear, though no eyes can see the course laid down long before and so with gods and men, the sheep remain inside their pen though many times they have seen the way to leave he rides majestic, past homes of men who care not or gaze with joy to see reflected there, the trees, the sky, the lily fair the scene of death is lying just below the mountain cuts off the town from view like a cancer growth is removed by skill let it be revealed a waterfall, his madrigal an inland sea, his symphony undinal songs urge the sailors on 'till lured by the siren's cry... now as the river dissolves in sea so neptune has claimed another soul until the shepard leads his flock away the sands of time were eroded by the river of constant change

song: Dancing With the Moonlit Knight 2008 Remaster
lyrics: "can you tell me where my country lies?" said the uniform to his true love's eyes "it lies with me!" cried the queen of maybe for her merchandise, he traded in his prize "paper late!" cried a voice in the crowd "old man dies!" the note he left was signed "old father thames" - it seems he is drowned selling england by the pound citizens of hope and glory time goes by - it is "the time of your life" easy now, sit you down chewing through your wimpy dreams they eat without a sound digesting england by the pound young man says "you are what you eat" - eat well old man says "you are what you wear" - wear well you know what you are, you do not give a damn bursting your belt that is your homemade sham the captain leads his dance right on through the night join the dance follow on! till the grail sun sets in the mould follow on! till the gold is cold dancing out with the moonlit knight knights of the green shield stamp and shout there is a fat old lady outside the saloon laying out the credit cards she plays fortune the deck is uneven right from the start and all of their hands are playing a part follow on! round table-talking down we go you are the show! off we go with: you play the hobbyhorse i will play the fool we will tease the bull ringing round and loud, loud and round follow on! with a twist of the world we go

from a dense forest of tall dark pinewood mount ida rises like an island. within a hidden cave, nymphs had kept a child: hermaphroditus, son of gods, so afraid of their love. as the dawn creeps up the sky, the hunter caught sight of a doe. in desire for conquest, he found himself within a glade he would not beheld before. where are you, my father? then he could go no further give wisdom to your son now lost, the boy was guided by the sun and as his strength began to fail, he saw a shimmering lake. a shadow in the dark green depths disturbed the strange tranquility. the waters are disturbed some creature has been stirred naiad queen salmacis has been stirred as he rushed to quench his thirst, a fountain spring appeared before him. and as his heated breath brushed through the cool mist a liquid voice called, "son of gods, drink from my spring." the water tasted strangely sweet. behind him the voice called again. he turned and saw her, in a cloak of mist alone, and as he gazed, her eyes were filled with the darkness of the lake. we shall be one she wanted them as one we shall be joined as one' yet he had no desire to be one' away from me, cold-blooded woman. your thirst is not mine. nothing will because us to part. hear me, o gods!" unearthly calm ascended from the sky and then their flesh and bones were strangely merged. forever to be joined as one. the creature crawled into the lake. a fading voice was heard: and i beg, yes i beg, that all who touch this spring may share my fate. we are the one the two are now made one, demi-god and nymph are now made one both had given everything they had a lover's dream had been fulfilled at last forever still beneath the lake

here today the red sky tells his tale but the only listening eyes are mine there is peace amongst the hills and the night will cover all my pride blest are they who smile from bodies free seems to me like any other crowd who are waiting to be saved wait, there still is time for washing in the pool wash away the past moon, my long-lost friend is smiling from above smiling at my tears come we will walk the path to take us to my home keep outside the night the ice-cold knife has come to decorate the dead somehow and each will find a home and there will still be time for loving my friend you are there and will i wait for ever, beside the silent mirror and fish for bitter minnows amongst the weeds and slimy water i, i, i, i, i, i, i, i i want to sit down i want a drink to take all the dust and the dirt from my throat to wash out the filth that is deep in my guts then let us drink then let us smile then let us go

song: The Lamb Lies Down on Broadway
lyrics: and the lamb lies down on broadway. early morning manhattan, ocean winds blow on the land. the movie-palace is now undone, the all-night watchmen have had their fun. sleeping cheaply on the midnight show, it is the same old ending-time to go. get out! it seems they cannot leave their dream. there is something moving in the sidewalk steam, nightime's flyers feel their pains. drugstore takes down the chains. metal motion comes in bursts, but the gas station can quench that thirst. suspension cracked on unmade road the trucker's eyes read 'overload' and out on the subway, rael imperial aerosol kid exits into daylight, spraygun hid, the lamb seems right out of place, yet the broadway street scene finds a focus in its face. somehow it is lying there, brings a stillness to the air. though man-made light, at night is very bright, there is no whitewash victim, as the neons dim, to the coat of white. rael imperial aerosol kid, wipes his gun-he is forgotten what he did, suzanne tired her work all done, thinks money-honey-be on-neon. cabman's velvet glove sounds the horn and the sawdust king spits out his scorn. wonder women draw your blind! do not look at me! i am not your kind. i am rael! something inside me has just begun, lord knows what i have done, on broadway- they say the lights are always bright on broadway. they say there is always magic in the air.

play me old king cole that i may join with you, all your hearts now seem so far from me it hardly seems to matter now. and the nurse will tell you lies of a kingdom beyond the skies. but i am lost within this half-world, play me my song. here it comes again. just a little bit, just a little bit more time, time left to live out my life. old king cole was a merry old soul, and a merry old soul was he. so he called for his pipe, and he called for his bowl, and he called for his fiddlers three. but the clock, tick-tock, on the mantlepiece - and i want, and i feel, and i know, and i touch, her warmth... she is a lady, she is got time, brush back your hair, and let me get to know your face. she is a lady, she is mine. brush back your hair, and let me get to know your flesh. i have been waiting here for so long and all this time has passed me by it does not seem to matter now you stand there with your fixed expression casting doubt on all i have to say. why do not you touch me, touch me, touch me now, now, now, now, now...

song: I Ain t Mad at Cha

a motherfuck, hehe yeah, niggaz now we was once two niggaz of the same kind quick to holla at a hoochie with the same line you was just a little smaller but you still roll got stretched to y.a. and where is my snare? i have no snare on my headphones there you go yeah yo have you ever been hated or discriminated against? i have i have been protested and demonstrated against picket signs for my wicked rhymes look at the times sick as the mind of the motherfucking kid that is behind all this commotion, emotions run deep as oceans explodin' tempers flarin' from parents, just blow  them off and keep going not takin' nothing from no one, give  them hell long as i am breathin' keep kickin' ass in the mornin' and takin' names in the evenin' leavin' with a taste as sour as vinegar in their mouth see they can trigger me but they never figure me out look at me now i betcha probably sick of me now are not you, mama? imma make you look so ridiculous now i am sorry mama i never meant to hurt you i never meant to make you cry but tonight i am cleanin' out my closet one more time i said i am sorry mama ah i got some skeletons in my closet and i do not know if no one knows it so before they throw me inside my coffin and close it imma expose it i will take you back to '73 before i ever had a multi-platinum sellin' cd i was a baby maybe i was just a couple of months my faggot father must have had his panties up in a bunch because he split i wonder if he even kissed me goodbye no, i do not owe him a second thought i just fuckin' wished he would die i look at hailie and i could not picture leavin' her side even if i hated kim i would grit my teeth and i would try to make it work with her, at least for hailie's sake i maybe made some mistakes but i am only human but i am man enough to face  them today what i did was stupid no doubt it was dumb but the smartest shit i did was take the bullets outta that gun because i would have killed  them shit, i would have shot kim and them both it is my life i would like to welcome ya'll to the eminem show now i would never diss my own mama just to get recognition take a second to listen 'fore you think this record is dissin' but put yourself in my position just try to envision witnessin' your mama poppin' prescription pills in the kitchen bitchin' that someone's always going through hear purse and shit's missin' going through public housin' systems, victim of munchhausen's syndrome my whole life i was made to believe i was sick when i was not 'til i grew up, now i blew up, it makes you sick to your stomach, does not it? was not it the reason you made that cd for me, ma? so you could try to justify the way you treated me, ma? but guess what? you are gettin' older now and it is cold when you are lonely and nathan's growin' up so quick he is going to know that you are phony and hailie's getting' so big now you should see her, she is beautiful but you will never see her she will not even be at your funeral see, what hurts me the most is you will not admit you was wrong bitch, do your song keep tellin' yourself that you was a mom but how dare you try to take what you did not help me to get? you selfish bitch i hope you fuckin' burn in hell for this shit remember when ronnie died and you said you wished it was me? well, guess what? i am dead, dead to you as can be!

(yeah) invite  them in like a one a day i am not done (preach!) because i feel like the beast of burden that line in the sand, was it even worth it? because the way i see people turning's makin' it seem worthless, it is startin' to defeat the purpose i am watchin' my fan base shrink to thirds and i was just tryin' to do the right thing, but word has the court of public opinion reached a verdict or still yet to be determined? because i am determined to be me, critiqued or worshipped but if i could go back, i would at least reword it and say i empathize with the people this evil serpent sold the dream to that he is deserted but i think it is workin' these verses are makin' him a wee bit nervous and he is too scurred to answer me with words because he knows that he will lyrically get murdered but i know at least he is heard it because agent orange just sent the secret service to meet in person to see if i really think of hurtin' him or ask if i am linked to terrorists i said, only when it comes to ink and lyricists but my beef is more media journalists (hold up, hold up, hold up) i said my beef is more meaty, a journalist can get a mouthful of flesh and yes, i mean eatin' a penis because they been pannin' my album to death so i been givin' the media fingers do not want to turn this to a counseling sesh but they been puttin' me through the ringer so i are not ironin' shit out with the press but i just took this beat to the cleaners

because sometimes you just feel tired, feel weak and when you feel weak, you feel like you want to just give up but you got to search within you, and try to find that inner strength and just pull that shit out of you and get that motivation to not give up, and not be a quitter no matter how bad you want to just fall flat on your face and collapse 'till i collapse i am spilling these raps long as you feel  them 'til the day that i drop you will never say that i am not killing  them because when i am not, then i'mma stop penning  them and i am not hip-hop and i am just not eminem subliminal thoughts, when i'mma stop sending  them? women are caught in webs, spin  them and hock venom adrenalin shots, the penicillin could not get the illing to stop amoxicillin's just not real enough the criminal cop-killing hip hop villain a minimal swap to cop millions of pac listeners you are coming with me, feel it or not you are going to fear it like i showed you the spirit of god lives in us you hear it a lot, lyrics to shock is it a miracle or am i just product of pop fizzing up? for shizzle my wizzle, this is the plot, listen up you bizzles forgot, slizzle does not give a fuck! 'till the roof comes off, 'till the lights go out 'till my legs give out, can not shut my mouth 'till the smoke clears out, am i high? perhaps i'mma rip this shit, 'till my bone collapse music is like magic, there is a certain feeling you get when you real and you spit and people are feeling your shit this is your moment, and every single minute you spend tryna hold on to it because you may never get it again so while you are in it, try to get as much shit as you can and when your run is over just admit when it is at its end because i am at the end of my wits with half the shit gets in i got a list, here's the order of my list that it is in it goes reggie, jay-z, 2pac and biggie andre from outkast, jada, kurupt, nas and then me but in this industry i am the because of a lot of envy so when i am not put on this list, the shit does not offend me that is why you see me walking 'round like nothing's bothering me even though half you people got a fuckin' problem with me you hate it but you know respect you got to give me the press's wet dream like bobby and whitney, nate, hit me soon as a verse starts, i eat at an mc's heart what is he thinking? how not to go against me, smart and it is absurd, how people hang on every word i will probably never get the props i feel i ever deserve but i will never be served, my spot is forever reserved if i ever leave earth, that would be the death of me first because in my heart of hearts i know nothing could ever be worse that is why i am clever when i put together every verse my thoughts are sporadic, i act like i am an addict i rap like i am addicted to smack like i am kim mathers but i do not want to go forth and back in constant battles the fact is i would rather sit back and bomb some rappers so this is like a full blown attack i am launching at  them the track is on some battling raps who want some static? because i do not really think that the fact that i am slim matters a plaque and platinum status is wack if i am not the baddest, so until the roof (until the roof) the roof comes off (the roof comes off) until my legs (until my legs) give out from underneath me i will not fall, i will stand tall feels like no one can beat me

obie trice, real name no gimmicks two trailer park girls go round the outside round the outside, round the outside guess who is back back again shady's back tell a friend guess who is back, guess who is back i have created a monster because nobody wants to see marshall no more they want shady, i am chopped liver well if you want shady, this is what i will give you a little bit of weed mixed with some hard liquor some vodka that'll jump start my heart quicker than a shock when i get shocked at the hospital by the doctor when i am not co-operating when i am rockin' the table while he is operating you waited this long, now stop debating because i am back, i am on the rag and ovulating i know that you got a job, ms. cheney but your husband's heart problem's complicating so the fcc will not let me be or let me be me, so let me see they try to shut me down on mtv but it feels so empty, without me so, come on and dip, bum on your lips fuck that, cum on your lips, and some on your tits and get ready, because this shit's about to get heavy i just settled all my lawsuits, fuck you debbie! now this looks like a job for me so everybody, just follow me because we need a little, controversy because it feels so empty, without me i said "this looks like a job for me" little hellions, kids feelin' rebellious embarrassed their parents still listen to elvis they start feelin' like prisoners helpless 'til someone comes along on a mission and yells, bitch! a visionary, vision of scary could start a revolution, pollutin' the airwaves a rebel, so just let me revel and bask in the fact that i got everyone kissin' my ass and it is a disaster, such a catastrophe for you to see so damn much of my ass you asked for me? well i am back na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na fix your bent antenna tune it in and then i am going to enter in, endin' up under your skin like a splinter the center of attention, back for the winter i am interesting, the best thing since wrestling infesting in your kid's ears and nesting testing, attention please feel the tension, soon as someone mentions me here's my ten cents, my two cents is free a nuisance, who sent? you sent for me? i said, "this looks like a job for me" a-tisket a-tasket, i go tit for tat with anybody who is talkin' this shit, that shit chris kirk patrick, you can get your ass kicked worse than them little limp bizkit bastards and moby? you can get stomped by obie you thirty-six year old baldheaded fag, blow me you do not know me, you are too old, let go it is over, nobody listen to techno now let us go, just give me the signal i will be there with a whole list full of new insults i been dope, suspenseful with a pencil ever since prince turned himself into a symbol but sometimes the shit just seems everybody only wants to discuss me so this must mean i am disgusting but it is just me, i am just obscene no i am not the first king of controversy i am the worst thing since elvis presley to do black music so selfishly and used it to get myself wealthy there is a concept that works twenty million other white rappers emerge but no matter how many fish in the sea it will be so empty, without me kids!

step by step, heart to heart left right left, we all fall down like toy soldiers bit by bit, torn apart we never win but the battle wages on for toy soldiers i am supposed to be the soldier who never blows his composure even though i hold the weight of the whole world on my shoulders i am never supposed to show it my crew are not supposed to know it even if it means going toe to toe with a benzino it do not matter, i would never drag them in battles that i can handle 'less i absolutely have to, i am supposed to set an example i need to be the leader, my crew looks for me to guide  them if some shit ever just pop off, i am supposed to be beside  them that ja shit i tried to squash it, it was too late to stop it there is a certain line you just do not cross and he crossed it i heard him say hailie's name on a song and i just lost it it was crazy, this shit went way beyond some jay-z and nas shit and even though the battle was won, i feel like we lost it i spent too much energy on it, honestly i am exhausted and i am so caught in it i almost feel i am the one who caused it this are not what i am in hip-hop for, it is not why i got in it that was never my object for someone to get killed why would i want to destroy something i help build? it was not my intentions, my intentions was good i went through my whole career without ever mentionin' and that was just outta respect, for not runnin' my mouth and talkin' about something that i knew nothing about plus dre told me stay out, this just was not my beef so i did, i just fell back, watched and gritted my teeth while he is all over tv, down-talkin' the man who literally saved my life, like fuck it, i understand this is business, and this shit just is not none of my business but still knowin' this shit could pop off at any minute because we never win, but the battle wages on there used to be a time when you could just say a rhyme and would not have to worry about one of your people dyin' but now it is elevated because once you put someone's kids in it the shit gets escalated, it are not just words no more, is it? it is a different ball game, callin' names and you are not just rappin' we actually tried to stop the 50 and ja beef from happenin' me and dre had sat with him, kicked it and had a chat with him and asked him not to start it he was not going to go after him until ja started yappin' in magazines how we stabbed him fuck it 50 smash  them, mash  them and let him have it meanwhile my attention's pulled in another direction some receptionist at the source who answers phones at his desk has an erection for me and thinks that i will be his resurrection tries to blow the dust off his mic and make a new record but now he is fucked the game up because one of the ways i came up was through that publication the same one that made me famous now the owner of it has got a grudge against me for nothing well fuck it, that motherfucker can get it too, fuck him then but i am so busy being pissed off i do not stop to think that we just inherited 50's beef with murder inc and he is inherited mine which is fine are not like either of us mind we still have soldiers that is on the front line that is willin' to die for us as soon as we give the orders never to extort us, strictly to show they support us we will maybe shout  them out in a rap or up in a chorus to show  them we love  them back and let  them know how important it is to have runyon avenue soldiers up in our corners their loyalty to us is worth more than any award is but i are not tryna have none of my people hurt or murdered it are not worth it, i can not think of a perfecter way to word it then to just say that i love you all too much to see the verdict i will walk away from it all before i let it go any further but do not get it twisted, it is not a plea that i am coppin' i am just willin' to be the bigger man if you all can quit poppin' off at your jaws well then i can because frankly i am sick of talkin' i am not going to let someone else's coffin rest on my conscience because

i am friends with the monster that is under my bed get along with the voices inside of my head you are tryin' to save me, stop holdin' your breath and you think i am crazy, yeah, you think i am crazy i wanted the fame but not the cover of newsweek oh well, guess beggars can not be choosey wanted to receive attention for my music wanted to be left alone in public, excuse me for wantin' my cake, and eat it too, and wantin' it both ways fame made me a balloon because my ego inflated when i blew, see, but it was confusing because all i wanted to do's be the bruce lee of loose leaf abused ink, used it as a tool when i blew steam ooh! hit the lottery, ooh-wee! but with what i gave up to get it was bittersweet it was like winnin' a used mink ironic because i think i am gettin' so huge i need a shrink i am beginnin' to lose sleep: one sheep, two sheep going coo-coo and kooky as kool keith but i am actually weirder than you think, because i am— well, that is nothing (ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh) (ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh) (ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh) now, i are not much of a poet but i know somebody once told me to seize the moment and do not squander it because you never know when it all could be over tomorrow so i keep conjurin' sometimes i wonder where these thoughts spawn from yeah, ponderin' will do you wonders no wonder you are losing your mind, the way it wanders yodel-odel-ay-hee-hoo! i think it went wanderin' off down yonder and stumbled onto jeff vanvonderen because i need an interventionist to intervene between me and this monster and save me from myself and all this conflict because the very thing that i love's killing me and i can not conquer it my ocd is conkin' me in the head, keep knockin' nobody's home, i am sleepwalkin' i am just relayin' what the voice in my head's sayin' do not shoot the messenger, i am just friends with the— call me crazy, but i have this vision one day that i will walk amongst you a regular civilian but until then, drums get killed and i am comin' straight at mc's, blood gets spilled and i will take it back to the days that i would get on a dre track give every kid who got played that pumped-up feelin' and shit to say back to the kids who played him i are not here to save the fuckin' children but if one kid out of a hundred million who are going through a struggle feels it and relates, that is great it is payback, russell wilson falling way back in the draft turn nothing into something, still can make that straw into gold chump, i will spin rumpelstiltskin in a haystack maybe i need a straight jacket, face facts i am nuts for real, but i am okay with that it is nothing, i am still friends with the—

"baby, daddy are not leavin' no more" "daddy you are lyin'" "you always say that, you always say this is the last time" "but you are not leavin' no more, daddy you are mine" she is pilin' boxes in front of the door tryin' to block it "daddy please, daddy do not leave, daddy, no, stop it" goes in her pocket, pulls out a tiny necklace locket, it is got her picture "this'll keep you safe daddy, take it with ya" i look up, it is just me standin' in the mirror these fuckin' walls must be talkin' because man i can hear  them they are sayin' you got one more chance to do right and it is tonight now go out there and show  them that you love  them 'fore it is too late and just as i go to walk out of my bedroom door it turns to a stage they are gone, and the spotlight is on and i am singin' sixty thousand people, all jumpin' out their seats the curtain closes, they are throwin' roses at my feet i take a bow and thank you all for comin' out they are screamin' so loud i will take one last look at the crowd i glance down, i do not believe what i am seein' "daddy it is me, help mommy, her wrists are bleedin'" but baby we are in sweden, how did you get to sweden? "i followed you daddy, you told me that you were not leavin'" "you lied to me dad, and now you made mommy sad" "and i bought you this coin, it says 'number one dad'" "that is all i wanted, i just want to give you this coin" "i get the point, fine, me and mommy are going" but baby, wait! "it is too late, dad, you made the choice" "now go out there and show  them that you love  them more than us" "that is what they want, they want you marshall they keep" "screamin' your name, it is no wonder you can not go to sleep" "just take another pill, yeah, i bet that you will" "you rap about it" "yeah, word, k-k-keep it real" i hear applause, all this time i could not see how could it be that the curtain is closin' on me? i turn around, find a gun on the ground, cock it put it to my brain, scream "die, shady!" and pop it the sky darkens, my life flashes the plane that i was supposed to be on crashes and burns to ashes that is when i wake up, alarm clocks ringin' there is birds singin' it is spring and hailie's outside swingin' i walk right up to kim and kiss her, tell her i miss her hailie just smiles and winks at her little sister almost as if to... say do not feel no pain just smile back

lyrics: i got a song filled with shit for the strong-willed when the world gives you a raw deal sets you off 'til you scream, "piss off! screw you!" when it talks to you like you do not belong or tells you you are in the wrong field when something's in your mitochondrial because it latched on to you, like— knock knock, let the devil in manevolent as i have ever been, head is spinnin' this medicine's screamin', "l-l-l-let us in!" l-l-l-like a salad bowl, edgar allan poe bedridden, shoulda been dead a long time ago liquid tylenol, gelatins, think my skeleton's meltin' wicked, i get all high when i think i have smelled the scent of elephant manure—hell, i meant kahlúa screw it, to hell with it, i went through hell with accelerants and blew up my-my-myself again volkswagen, tailspin, bucket matches my pale skin mayo and went from hellmann's and being rail thin filet-o-fish, scribble jam, rap olympics '97 freaknik how can i be down? me and bizarre in florida proof's room slept on the floor of 'da motel then dr. dre said, "hell yeah!" and i got his stamp like a postcard, word to mel-man and i know they are going to hate but i do not care, i barely can wait to hit  them with the snare and the bass square in the face, this fuckin' world better prepare to get laced because they are going to taste my— venom, (i got that) adrenaline momentum and i am not knowin' when i am ever going to slow up and i am ready to snap any moment i am thinkin' it is time to go get  them they are not going to know what hit  them (w-w-when they get bit with the—) i said knock knock, let the devil in shotgun p-p-pellets in the felt pen cocked, fuck around and catch a hot one it-it is evident i am not done v-venomous, the thoughts spun like a web and you just caught in  them held against your will like a hubcap or mud flap beat strangler attack so this are not going to feel like a love tap eat painkiller pills, fuck up the track like, what is her name's at the wheel? danica patrick threw the car into reverse at the indy, a nut crashin' into ya, the back of it just mangled steel my mustang and the jeep wrangler grill with the front smashed, much as my rear fender, assassin slim be a combination of an actual kamikaze and gandhi (gandhi) translation, i will probably kill us both when i end up backin' into ya you are not going to be able to tell what the fuck's happenin' to ya when you are bit with the— venom, adrenaline momentum alien, e-e-elliott phone home are not no telling when this chokehold on this game will end, i am loco became a symbiote, so my fangs are in your throat, ho you are snake-bitten with my—venom with the ballpoint pen i am gun cocked, bump stock, double-aught, buckshot tire thumper, a garrote, tie a couple knots fired up and caught fire, juggernaut punk rock, bitch, it is going down like yung joc because the doc put me on like sunblock why the fuck not, you only get one shot ate shit 'til i can not taste it chased it with straight liquor then paint thinner, then drank 'til i faint and awake with a headache and i take anything in rectangular shape then i wait to face the demons i am bonded to because they are chasin' me but i am part of you so escapin' me is impossible i latch onto you like a—parasite and i probably ruined your parents' life and your childhood too because if i am the music that you all grew up on i am responsible for you retarded fools i am the super villain dad and mom was losin' their marbles to you marvel that? eddie brock is you and i am the suit, so call me—

look if you had one shot, or one opportunity to seize everything you ever wanted one moment would you capture it or just let it slip? yo his palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy there is vomit on his sweater already, mom's spaghetti he is nervous, but on the surface he looks calm and ready to drop bombs but he keeps on forgetting what he wrote down, the whole crowd goes so loud he opens his mouth, but the words will not come out he is choking how, everybody's joking now the clock's run out, time's up, over, bloah! snap back to reality oh, there goes gravity oh, there goes rabbit, he choked he is so mad, but he will not give up that easy, no he will not have it, he knows his whole back's to these ropes it do not matter, he is dope he knows that but he is broke he is so stagnant, he knows when he goes back to his mobile home, that is when it is back to the lab again, yo this whole rhapsody he better go capture this moment and hope it do not pass him you better lose yourself in the music, the moment you own it, you better never let it go you only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow this opportunity comes once in a lifetime you better the soul's escaping, through this hole that is gaping this world is mine for the taking make me king, as we move toward a new world order a normal life is boring, but superstardom's close to post mortem it only grows harder, homie grows hotter he blows, it is all over these hoes is all on him coast to coast shows, he is known as the globetrotter lonely roads, god only knows he is knows is grown farther from home, he is no father he goes home and barely knows his own daughter but hold your nose because here goes the cold water his hoes do not want him no more, he is cold product they moved on to the next schmoe who flows he nose dove and sold nada so the soap opera is told and unfolds i suppose it is old partner but the beat goes on da da dum da dum da da no more games, i'ma change what you call rage tear this motherfucking roof off like two dogs caged i was playing in the beginning, the mood all changed i have been chewed up and spit out and booed off stage but i kept rhyming and stepped right into the next cypher best believe somebody's paying the pied piper all the pain inside amplified by the fact that i can not get by with my 9 to 5 and i can not provide the right type of life for my family because man, these goddamn food stamps do not buy diapers and it is no movie, there is no mekhi phifer, this is my life and these times are so hard, and it is getting even harder trying to feed and water my seed, plus teeter totter caught up between being a father and a prima donna baby mama drama's screaming on and too much for me to want to stay in one spot, another day of monotony has gotten me to the point, i am like a snail i have got to formulate a plot or i end up in jail or shot success is my only motherfucking option, failure's not mom, i love you, but this trailer's got to go i cannot grow old in salem's lot so here i go it is my shot feet, fail me not, this may be the only opportunity that i got lose yourself in the music, the moment you can do anything you set your mind to, man

well if it can, and the next time you assault a dude just tell the judge it was my fault, and i will get sued see what these kids do is hear 'bout us toting pistols and they want to get one because, they think the shit's cool not knowing we really just protecting ourselves we entertainers, of course the shit's affecting our sales you ignoramus, but music is reflection of self we just explain it, and then we get our checks in the mail it is fucked up are not it? how we can come from practically nothing to being able to have any fucking thing that we wanted that is why we, sing for these kids who do not have a thing except for a dream and a fucking rap magazine who post pin-up pictures on they walls all day long idolize their favorite rappers and know all their songs or for anyone who is ever been through shit in they lives so they sit and they cry at night wishing they would die 'til they throw on a rap record and they sit and they vibe we are nothing to you, but we are the fucking shit in their eyes that is why we, seize the moment try to freeze it and own it squeeze it and hold it, because we consider these minutes golden and maybe they will admit it when we are gone just let our spirits live on through our lyrics that you hear in our songs and we can
